original: ngan song gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs @179a *//üîΩpa'i ngan song thams cad du gnas par spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: ngan song gcig tu ji lta ba de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs @179a *// pa'i ngan song thams cad du gnas par spro bar bya'o //
translated: Just as in one hell, so also in all the hells in all the world-realms.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: kyi hud sems can 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi gnas su lhung ba bas ni /
analyzed: kyi hud sems can 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi gnas su lhung ba bas ni /
translated: Alas, all these beings are fallen into the realm of suffering.

original: bdag gcig pu sdug bsngal myong yang bla'i //
analyzed: bdag gcig pu sdug bsngal myong yang bla'i //
translated: It would be better if I alone were to experience suffering.üîΩThere I will throw myself down and redeem all beings from the wilderness of the hells, animal wombs, and the world of Yama.

original: bdag gis der bdag nyid gtar bcug ste sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi dgon pa nas 'gro ba thams cad blus te bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du sdug bsngal tshor ba'i phung po 'di dag thams cad bdag gi lus 'dis myong bar bya'o //üîΩbdag gis ni /
analyzed: bdag gis der bdag nyid gtar bcug ste sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi dgon pa nas 'gro ba thams cad blus te bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi don du sdug bsngal tshor ba'i phung po 'di dag thams cad bdag gi lus 'dis myong bar bya'o // bdag gis ni /
translated: I will experience all these heaps of suffering for the sake of all beings with this very body of mine.üîΩI will be a true friend to all beings,

original: sems can rnams kyi gnya' bden par smra ba dang / yid ches shing mi blu bar spro bar bya'i /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi gnya' bden par smra ba dang / yid ches shing mi blu bar spro bar bya'i /
translated: speaking the truth, trustworthy, and reliable.

original: bdag la ni /
analyzed: bdag la ni /
translated: I will not deceive the world,

original: sems can thams cad kyis ma yin te /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyis ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case for all sentient beings.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sems can thams cad la dmigs pa skyes te /üîΩbdag nyid 'dod pa'i phyir ni /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems sems can thams cad la dmigs pa skyes te / bdag nyid 'dod pa'i phyir ni /
translated: I have given rise to the mind of omniscience that focuses on all sentient beings in order to liberate all beings.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs so //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs so //
translated: I have not entered into unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening for the sake of my own self.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' zhing spyod pa'i phyir yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' zhing spyod pa'i phyir yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not for the sake of delighting in and enjoying the five sense pleasures.

original: 'dod pa'i yul la bsnyen pa'i phyir yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yul la bsnyen pa'i phyir yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not for the sake of approaching the objects of desire.

original: 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i dga' ba mang po gzhan blang pa'i phyir yang byang chub kyi spyod pa la mi spyod do //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i dga' ba mang po gzhan blang pa'i phyir yang byang chub kyi spyod pa la mi spyod do //
translated: I do not practice the conduct of awakening in order to take up other kinds of abundant delights that belong to the desire realm.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: 'jig rten gyi dga' ba 'di thams cad ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi dga' ba 'di thams cad ni /
translated: All these worldly delights

original: dgra yin no //
analyzed: dgra yin no //
translated: are enemies.

original: 'dod pa la brten @179b pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa la brten @179b pa 'di ni /
translated: Relying on desire

original: bdud kyi yul lo //
analyzed: bdud kyi yul lo //
translated: is the domain of MƒÅra.

original: 'dod pa la brten pa de ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa la brten pa de ni /
translated: Relying on desire

original: blo ngan pas bstan pa'i lam mo //
analyzed: blo ngan pas bstan pa'i lam mo //
translated: It is the path taught by evil people.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis smad pa'i yul lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis smad pa'i yul lo //
translated: It is the object of contempt by all the Buddhas.

original: de dag la brten pa de las sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag la brten pa de las sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: All suffering arises from relying on them.

original: de las sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: From them arise all the hells, animal realms, and worlds of Yama.

original: de las sems can rnams 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / gnad la 'bebs pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / kun tu 'khrug pa rnams kyang rab tu 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de las sems can rnams 'thab pa dang / mtshang 'dru ba dang / rtsod pa dang / gnad la 'bebs pa dang / 'khrug pa dang / kun tu 'khrug pa rnams kyang rab tu 'byung ngo //
translated: From them arise all the quarrels, disputes, conflicts, and strife of sentient beings.

original: sems can 'di dag ni /
analyzed: sems can 'di dag ni /
translated: These sentient beings

original: 'dod pa la brten pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las ring du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa la brten pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las ring du gyur pa ste /
translated: are far from the Blessed Buddhas because of their reliance on desire.

original: 'dod pa de dag ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa de dag ni /
translated: Those desires

original: mtho ris su skye ba la yang bar du gcod na /
analyzed: mtho ris su skye ba la yang bar du gcod na /
translated: are an obstacle to being reborn in the higher realms,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
translated: let alone to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: sems can thams cad kyi bde ba dang / dga' ba thams cad kyi yang bar chad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bde ba dang / dga' ba thams cad kyi yang bar chad du 'gyur ro //
translated: and all the happiness and joy of all sentient beings.

original: de ltar bdag gis 'dod pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar bdag gis 'dod pa ni /
translated: ‚ÄúI see that my desires

original: ro chung zhing tshad med pa'i nyes pa can du mthong na /
analyzed: ro chung zhing tshad med pa'i nyes pa can du mthong na /
translated: are of little taste and have immeasurable faults.

original: ci de yang de dag spyod pa'i phyir 'jug gam /
analyzed: ci de yang de dag spyod pa'i phyir 'jug gam /
translated: So why do I engage in them?

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: bdag ni / don 'di dag gi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bdag ni / don 'di dag gi phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs pa ma yin no //
translated: I have not set out for unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening for the sake of these things.

original: 'dod pa la dga' ba'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mi spyod de /
analyzed: 'dod pa la dga' ba'i phyir yang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mi spyod de /
translated: I do not engage in the bodhisattva practice for the sake of enjoying desires.

original: de bas na /
analyzed: de bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde par zhugs pa'i sems bskyed de /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde par zhugs pa'i sems bskyed de /
translated: I have set out for the sake of the benefit and happiness of all sentient beings.

original: bdag ni / 'di ltar sems can thams @180a *//
analyzed: bdag ni / 'di ltar sems can thams @180a *//
translated: I have set out for the sake of this goal,üîΩto fulfill the aspirations of those very sentient beings, to dedicate and accomplish

original: cad kyi don gyi phyir de dag nyid kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bsngo zhing bsgrub pa'i phyir don de la zhugs pa ste /üîΩde bas na /
analyzed: cad kyi don gyi phyir de dag nyid kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bsngo zhing bsgrub pa'i phyir don de la zhugs pa ste /üîΩde bas na /
translated: for the sake of all sentient beings,

original: bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal gyi zhags pas bcings pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi zhags pa bcad de /
analyzed: bdag gis sems can sdug bsngal gyi zhags pas bcings pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi zhags pa bcad de /
translated: I will cut the bonds of suffering of all those who are bound by the bonds of suffering.

original: sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: I will free them from all suffering.

original: sdug bsngal gyi rgyud las rnam par bzlog par bya'o //üîΩbdag gis ji lta ji ltar sems can 'di dag thams cad shin tu bde ba dang / phan par 'gyur ba'i bde ba dang / tshor ba med pa'i bde ba dang / zhi ba'i bde ba dang / mi gnas pa'i bde ba dang / mi g-yo ba'i bde ba dang /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi rgyud las rnam par bzlog par bya'o // bdag gis ji lta ji ltar sems can 'di dag thams cad shin tu bde ba dang / phan par 'gyur ba'i bde ba dang / tshor ba med pa'i bde ba dang / zhi ba'i bde ba dang / mi gnas pa'i bde ba dang / mi g-yo ba'i bde ba dang /
translated: I will turn them away from the stream of suffering.üîΩI will dedicate these roots of virtue in such a way that all these beings will attain the happiness of comfort, the happiness of benefit, the happiness of the absence of feeling, the happiness of peace, the happiness of non-abiding, the happiness of non-movement,

original: tshad med pa'i bde ba dang / ma nyams pa'i bde ba dang / mi 'gag pa'i bde ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bde ba rab tu thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa'i bde ba dang / ma nyams pa'i bde ba dang / mi 'gag pa'i bde ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bde ba rab tu thob par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: the happiness of the immeasurable, the happiness of the unimpaired, the happiness of the unceasing, and the happiness of omniscience.

original: bdag kha lo sgyur ba dang / bdag mgon po dang / bdag me sgron 'dzin pa dang / bdag lam bde ba ston pa dang / bdag khom pa rnyed pa dang / bdag thabs la mkhas pa dang / bdag don shes pa dang / bdag 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la thams cad mkhyen pa'i gru bo che'i mnyan par gyur pa dang /
analyzed: bdag kha lo sgyur ba dang / bdag mgon po dang / bdag me sgron 'dzin pa dang / bdag lam bde ba ston pa dang / bdag khom pa rnyed pa dang / bdag thabs la mkhas pa dang / bdag don shes pa dang / bdag 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la thams cad mkhyen pa'i gru bo che'i mnyan par gyur pa dang /
translated: I am the charioteer, I am the protector, I am the holder of the torch, I am the one who shows the pleasant path, I am the one who has found the opportunity, I am skilled in means, I know the goal, I am the captain of the ship of omniscience on the ocean of sa·πÉsƒÅra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsgribs pa med par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi yul rnams la mi gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i grogs po thams cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsgribs pa med par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi yul rnams la mi gnas par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa mi dge ba'i grogs po thams cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba dang /
translated: it pleases all the TathƒÅgatas; it is unobstructed in omniscience; it does not dwell in the sphere of MƒÅra; it abandons all evil, unwholesome friends;

original: dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la brten par 'gyur ba dang / las rnam par dag pa la kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ba dang / spyad pa chen po'i smon lam rnams yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad la brten par 'gyur ba dang / las rnam par dag pa la kha na ma tho ba med par 'gyur ba dang / spyad pa chen po'i smon lam rnams yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: it relies on all the spiritual friends, the bodhisattva great beings; it is irreproachable in the purification of karma; it accomplishes the great practices and aspirations;

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad khong du chud par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad khong du chud par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: it penetrates all the roots of virtue.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba na sems 'di snyam du bskyed de /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba na sems 'di snyam du bskyed de /
translated: ‚ÄúWhen the bodhisattvas dedicate those roots of virtue, they should arouse the following thought:

original: kye ma gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar bya ba'i phyir gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de snyed kyi nyi ma ni /
analyzed: kye ma gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar bya ba'i phyir gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de snyed kyi nyi ma ni /
translated: ‚ÄúOh! In order to illuminate the world systems of the four continents, the number of suns that rise is equal to the number of sentient beings in the world systems of the four continents.

original: mi 'char gyi /
analyzed: mi 'char gyi /
translated: But they do not rise.

original: gling bzhi'i 'jig rten snang bar bya ba'i phyir nyi ma 'di nyid gcig pu 'char te /
analyzed: gling bzhi'i 'jig rten snang bar bya ba'i phyir nyi ma 'di nyid gcig pu 'char te /
translated: In order to illuminate the world systems of the four continents, this very one sun rises.

original: sems can gling bzhir gtogs pa de dag rang rang gi lus las kyang snang ba gang gis de dag gi nyi ma'i grangs shes par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: sems can gling bzhir gtogs pa de dag rang rang gi lus las kyang snang ba gang gis de dag gi nyi ma'i grangs shes par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: The sentient beings who belong to the four continents, by the light from their own bodies, know the number of suns,

original: rang gi don sgrub par 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: rang gi don sgrub par 'gyur ba'am /
translated: accomplish their own aims,

original: lo tog yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'am /üîΩnyin gcig @181a *//
analyzed: lo tog yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'am / nyin gcig @181a *//
translated: and bring their crops to full maturity.

original: nyin gcig cing bza' shing gi ra ba dang / grong khyer dag tu dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: nyin gcig cing bza' shing gi ra ba dang / grong khyer dag tu dga' ba dang / rtse ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: Day by day, they experience the enjoyments of pleasure and play in the parks and cities.

original: phyogs snang bar 'gyur ba'am /
analyzed: phyogs snang bar 'gyur ba'am /
translated: The directions are illuminated.

original: grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / pho brang 'khor dang / rgyal po'i gnas dag tu 'gro ba dang / 'ong bar bya ba'am /
analyzed: grong dang / grong khyer dang / ljongs dang / pho brang 'khor dang / rgyal po'i gnas dag tu 'gro ba dang / 'ong bar bya ba'am /
translated: They do not appear to go or come in villages, towns, countries, palaces, or royal courts.

original: spyod pa'i don sbyar bar bya ba'i snang ba mi 'byung ste /
analyzed: spyod pa'i don sbyar bar bya ba'i snang ba mi 'byung ste /
translated: They do not appear to be engaged in the activities of the world.

original: sems can de dag rang rang gi lus la yang 'od gang gis de dag gi don sgrub pa'i 'od de lta bu mi gtong ste /
analyzed: sems can de dag rang rang gi lus la yang 'od gang gis de dag gi don sgrub pa'i 'od de lta bu mi gtong ste /
translated: They do not emit the light that would accomplish the aims of those beings.

original: 'di ltar lha'i bu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig pu gnyis su med pa de ni /
analyzed: 'di ltar lha'i bu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig pu gnyis su med pa de ni /
translated: In the same way, the light of the sun, which is one and not two,

original: gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can rnams la snang bar bya ba'i phyir 'char zhing rab tu 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gling bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sems can rnams la snang bar bya ba'i phyir 'char zhing rab tu 'byung ngo //
translated: arises and appears in the four-continent world system in order to illuminate beings.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba na sems 'di ltar skyes te /
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba na sems 'di ltar skyes te /
translated: In the same way, when a bodhisattva dedicates wholesome actions, this thought arises:

original: sems can 'di dag thams cad la gang gis de dag bdag nyid yongs su bskyab par bya ba de nyid kyang med na; gzhan bskyab pa lta ci smos kyi /
analyzed: sems can 'di dag thams cad la gang gis de dag bdag nyid yongs su bskyab par bya ba de nyid kyang med na; gzhan bskyab pa lta ci smos kyi /
translated: ‚ÄúThese beings have no one to protect them, and yet they are to be protected by me.

original: bdag nyid gcig pu gnyis su med pas sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'di ltar sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad snang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad gsal bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad shes par bya ba dang /
analyzed: bdag nyid gcig pu gnyis su med pas sems can thams cad kyi phyir 'di ltar sems can thams cad dgrol ba dang / sems can thams cad snang bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad gsal bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad shes par bya ba dang /
translated: I alone, without a second, will liberate all beings, illuminate all beings, reveal all beings, make all beings understand,

original: sems can thams @181b cad gzung bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bsdu bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bskyed par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad dad par bya ba dang sems can thams cad sim par bya ba dang /
analyzed: sems can thams @181b cad gzung bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bsdu bar bya ba dang / sems can thams cad bskyed par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad dad par bya ba dang sems can thams cad sim par bya ba dang /
translated: make all beings grasp, gather all beings, raise up all beings, make all beings have faith, make all beings happy,

original: sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcad pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bsdu'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcad pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rtsa ba rnams yang dag par bsdu'o //
translated: and cut through the doubts of all beings. For this purpose I gather the roots of virtue.‚Äù

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: I will dedicate the roots of virtue.

original: bdag gis ni /üîΩnyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de lta bur bya ste /üîΩgzhan las phan pa'i lan re bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis ni / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de lta bur bya ste / gzhan las phan pa'i lan re bar mi bya'o //
translated: I will not expectüîΩto receive any benefit in return.

original: gzhan gyis skabs mi rnyed par bya'o //üîΩsems can thams cad kyi phyir go cha mi 'dor bar bya'o //üîΩsems can thams cad kyi don du spro ba mi ldog par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan gyis skabs mi rnyed par bya'o // sems can thams cad kyi phyir go cha mi 'dor bar bya'o // sems can thams cad kyi don du spro ba mi ldog par bya'o //
translated: I will not give others an opportunity.üîΩI will not cast off my armor for the sake of any sentient being.üîΩI will not turn back from my enthusiasm for the sake of any sentient being.

original: sems can thams cad kyi bde ba sgrub pa'i yongs su bsngo ba las phyir ldog par mi bya'o; ;dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu yang bsdu bar bya ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bde ba sgrub pa'i yongs su bsngo ba las phyir ldog par mi bya'o; ;dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu yang bsdu bar bya ste /
translated: I will not turn back from my dedication to the happiness of all sentient beings.

original: yongs su bsngo ba chung ngus yongs su bsngo zhing dga' bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba chung ngus yongs su bsngo zhing dga' bar mi bya'o //
translated: I will not dedicate a small root of virtue with a small dedication and feel satisfied with that.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba phan par mi 'gyur ba rnams ni /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba phan par mi 'gyur ba rnams ni /
translated: I will not dedicate roots of virtue that will not be beneficial

original: sems can rnams la bsngo bar mi bya ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams la bsngo bar mi bya ste /
translated: to sentient beings.

original: ci nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la bde bar 'gyur ba de ltar bsngo'o //
analyzed: ci nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la bde bar 'gyur ba de ltar bsngo'o //
translated: I will dedicate those roots of virtue in such a way that they will be beneficial to all sentient beings.

original: mngon par chags pa med pa'i chos nyid la brten te yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
analyzed: mngon par chags pa med pa'i chos nyid la brten te yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //
translated: They should dedicate [their roots of virtue] in dependence upon the reality that is free from attachment.

original: sems can rnams kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su bsngo bar bya'o //üîΩzhes te / de ni /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi ngo bo nyid du yongs su bsngo bar bya'o // zhes te / de ni /
translated: They should dedicate [their roots of virtue] in the nature of sentient beings.

original: 'pho ba'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba la gnas pa ma yin /üîΩsrid pa la mngon par @182a *//
analyzed: 'pho ba'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba la gnas pa ma yin / srid pa la mngon par @182a *//
translated: They should not dedicate [their roots of virtue] in the manner of a transference.

original: chags pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la mi gnas so //
analyzed: chags pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la mi gnas so //
translated: They should not dedicate [their roots of virtue] while dwelling in attachment to existence.

original: mtshan ma'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su mi bsngo'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su mi bsngo'o //
translated: They should not dedicate [their roots of virtue] while dwelling in the signs of virtue.

original: dngos po la mngon par chags pa'i phyir las kyi rnam par smin pa la yongs su mi rtog go /
analyzed: dngos po la mngon par chags pa'i phyir las kyi rnam par smin pa la yongs su mi rtog go /
translated: They should not dedicate [their roots of virtue] while dwelling in the ripening of karma.

original: phung po rnams kyi 'du shes la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo'o //
analyzed: phung po rnams kyi 'du shes la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo'o //
translated: They should not dedicate [their roots of virtue] while dwelling in the perception of the aggregates.

original: phung po 'jig pa la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo'o /
analyzed: phung po 'jig pa la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo'o /
translated: They should not dedicate [their roots of virtue] while dwelling in the destruction of the aggregates.

original: las rnam par rtog pa la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo'o //
analyzed: las rnam par rtog pa la gnas shing yongs su mi bsngo'o //
translated: They should not dedicate [their roots of virtue] while dwelling in the conceptualization of karma.

original: rnam par smin pa la re bas ma yin no //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa la re bas ma yin no //
translated: They should not dedicate [their roots of virtue] while hoping for the ripening [of karma].

original: rten pas snyems shing ma yin no //
analyzed: rten pas snyems shing ma yin no //
translated: They do not dedicate with pride,üîΩwith the idea of a self,üîΩwith the idea of a sentient being,üîΩwith the idea of a life-form,üîΩwith the idea of a person,üîΩwith the idea of a human being,üîΩwith the idea of a man,üîΩwith the idea of a woman,üîΩwith the idea of a boy,üîΩwith the idea of a girl,üîΩwith the idea of a boy‚Äôs body,üîΩwith the idea of a girl‚Äôs body,üîΩwith the idea of a son,üîΩwith the idea of a daughter,üîΩwith the idea of a friend,üîΩwith the idea of a companion,

original: 'brel par 'byung ba la kun tu rtog pas ma yin no //üîΩgrags pa la gnas pas ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel par 'byung ba la kun tu rtog pas ma yin no // grags pa la gnas pas ma yin no //
translated: with the idea of a relative,üîΩwith the idea of a family member,üîΩwith the idea of a kinsman,üîΩwith the idea of a blood relative,üîΩwith the idea of a master,

original: gnas kyi 'du shes la gnas pas ma yin no //
analyzed: gnas kyi 'du shes la gnas pas ma yin no //
translated: with the idea of an employee,üîΩwith the idea of a mendicant,üîΩwith the idea of a brahmin,üîΩwith the idea of a renunciant,

original: gnas su rtog pa la gnas bas ma yin no //
analyzed: gnas su rtog pa la gnas bas ma yin no //
translated: with the idea of a householder,

original: chos la rnam par rtog pa la gnas pas ma yin no //
analyzed: chos la rnam par rtog pa la gnas pas ma yin no //
translated: with the idea of a monastic,üîΩwith the idea of a god,üîΩwith the idea of a demon,üîΩwith the idea of a human,üîΩwith the idea of a non-human,üîΩwith the idea of a ≈õrƒÅvaka,üîΩwith the idea of a pratyekabuddha,

original: sems can gyi 'du shes la gnas pas ma yin te /üîΩkhams kyi tshul rnam pa tha dad pa'i rjes su song bas yongs su mi bsngo'o //üîΩsems kyi kun tu rtog pa la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can gyi 'du shes la gnas pas ma yin te / khams kyi tshul rnam pa tha dad pa'i rjes su song bas yongs su mi bsngo'o // sems kyi kun tu rtog pa la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o //
translated: with the idea of a bodhisattva,üîΩwith the idea of a buddha,üîΩwith the idea of a buddha‚Äôs body,üîΩwith the idea of a buddha‚Äôs voice,üîΩwith the idea of a buddha‚Äôs mind,üîΩwith the idea of a buddha‚Äôs qualities,üîΩwith the idea of a buddha‚Äôs activity,

original: sems kyi phyin ci log la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o //üîΩ'du shes kyi phyin ci log la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems kyi phyin ci log la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o // 'du shes kyi phyin ci log la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o //
translated: with the idea of a buddha‚Äôs realm,üîΩwith the idea of a buddha‚Äôs teaching,üîΩwith the idea of a buddha‚Äôs wisdom,üîΩwith the idea of a buddha‚Äôs body of attributes,üîΩwith the idea of a buddha‚Äôs emanation body,

original: lta ba'i phyin ci log la gnas de yongs su mi bsngo'o //
analyzed: lta ba'i phyin ci log la gnas de yongs su mi bsngo'o //
translated: with the idea of a buddha‚Äôs enjoyment body,üîΩwith the idea of a buddha‚Äôs essential body,üîΩwith the idea of a buddha‚Äôs body of attributes,üîΩwith the idea of a buddha‚Äôs emanation body,üîΩwith the idea of a buddha‚Äôs enjoyment body,üîΩwith the idea of a buddha‚Äôs essential body,

original: tshig gi lam la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o //
analyzed: tshig gi lam la gnas te yongs su mi bsngo'o //
translated: with the idea of a buddha‚Äôs body of attributes,üîΩwith the idea

original: de ni / 'di ltar chos rnams la ji lta ba bzhin rnam par dpyod cing yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: de ni / 'di ltar chos rnams la ji lta ba bzhin rnam par dpyod cing yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate in such a way that all phenomena are analyzed and transformed just as they are.

original: sems can rnams kyi @182b mnyam pa nyid la sems shing yongs su bsngo'o //üîΩchos kyi dbyings kyi rgyas btab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi @182b mnyam pa nyid la sems shing yongs su bsngo'o // chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyas btab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate while contemplating the sameness of all sentient beings.üîΩThey dedicate those roots of virtue that are sealed by the realm of phenomena.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mnyam pa'i chos kyis yongs su brtags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba dang mnyam pa'i chos kyis yongs su brtags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate those roots of virtue that are examined by the Dharma of freedom from desire.

original: chos thams cad la sgro gdags pa med par dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rjes su rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad la sgro gdags pa med par dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag rjes su rtogs par byed do //
translated: They realize those roots of virtue without exaggerating any phenomena.

original: gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par lta zhing yongs su bsngo ba de dag la rab tu 'jug ste /üîΩchos gang yang skye ba'am /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par lta zhing yongs su bsngo ba de dag la rab tu 'jug ste / chos gang yang skye ba'am /
translated: They engage in that dedication that is the correct view of the nondual realm of phenomena.üîΩThey do not cause any phenomena to arise

original: 'gag par byed pa med do //
analyzed: 'gag par byed pa med do //
translated: or to cease.

original: de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: In the same way, they dedicate those roots of virtue.

original: gnyen pos yongs su dag pas bsngo ba de dag la yang dag par spyod do //
analyzed: gnyen pos yongs su dag pas bsngo ba de dag la yang dag par spyod do //
translated: They are dedicated to the purification of the antidotes.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa 'byams klas pa'i rjes su song ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mthong ste /üîΩgnyis kyi tshul gyis ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa 'byams klas pa'i rjes su song ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag mthong ste / gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni /
translated: They see those roots of virtue that are beyond the world and are infinite.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad khong du chud par mi byed do //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad khong du chud par mi byed do //
translated: They do not engage with those roots of virtue in a dualistic way.üîΩThey do not comprehend those roots of virtue in a nondualistic way.

original: las kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par mi spyod do //
analyzed: las kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par mi spyod do //
translated: They do not engage with omniscience through action.üîΩThey do not dedicate omniscience to anything other than action.

original: las las gzhan du yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su mi bsngo'o; ;las gang yin pa de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: las las gzhan du yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su mi bsngo'o; ;las gang yin pa de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not see omniscience in action.

original: las kyi lam dang bral bas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam thob par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: las kyi lam dang bral bas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam thob par mi 'gyur te /
translated: They do not attain the aspiration for omniscience through the absence of the path of action.

original: las kyi gzugs brnyan gyis rnam par smin pa'i gzugs brnyan yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las kyi gzugs brnyan gyis rnam par smin pa'i gzugs brnyan yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
translated: The reflection of action is the purification of the reflection of ripening.

original: rnam par smin pa'i gzugs brnyan yongs su dag pas thams cad mkhyen @183a *//
analyzed: rnam par smin pa'i gzugs brnyan yongs su dag pas thams cad mkhyen @183a *//
translated: and the pure reflection of the ripening of karma,

original: pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: he attains the wisdom of omniscience.

original: yongs su bsngo ba de g-yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / rnam par spyod pa dang bral bar yang rab tu shes so //
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba de g-yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / rnam par spyod pa dang bral bar yang rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows that dedication to be free of movement, conceit, and conceptualization.

original: des kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: des kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates those wholesome roots.

original: yongs su bsngo ba 'dis yongs su bsngos pas sems can rab tu dgrol ba rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba 'dis yongs su bsngos pas sems can rab tu dgrol ba rgyun chad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: By this dedication, he dedicates them in such a way that the liberation of beings is uninterrupted.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba 'dis yongs su bsngo ba na chos kyi mtshan nyid la gnas pa'ang mi gtong ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba 'dis yongs su bsngo ba na chos kyi mtshan nyid la gnas pa'ang mi gtong ste /
translated: When he dedicates those wholesome roots with this dedication, he does not abandon the state of the characteristics of phenomena.

original: las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i chos thams cad la nyon mongs pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis las dang rnam par smin ba sgrub pa la mngon par mkhas pa yin no //
analyzed: las dang rnam par smin pa med pa'i chos thams cad la nyon mongs pa med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis las dang rnam par smin ba sgrub pa la mngon par mkhas pa yin no //
translated: He is skilled in the accomplishment of the ripening of karma, by the method of the non-afflictive dedication to all phenomena that are without karma and ripening.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ni /
translated: In this way, the bodhisattvas dedicate those roots of virtue

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rjes su spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no //
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rjes su spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa yin no //
translated: to the practice of unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, and they do so without wrongdoing.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: ‚ÄúO children of the Victorious One!

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba sems can rnams kyi 'du shes 'gog cing; 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba sems can rnams kyi 'du shes 'gog cing; 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings‚Äô dedication called ‚ÄúStopping the Perceptions of Sentient Beings and Protecting All Beings,‚ÄùüîΩthe first.

original: dang po'o // de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
analyzed: dang po'o // de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis 'khor thams cad la rnam par bltas te /
translated: Then the bodhisattva Vajradhvaja looked at the entire assembly and said,üîΩ‚ÄúExcellent!

original: chos kyi dbyings la rnam par bltas nas don dang / tshig dang / yi ge la 'jug par bya ba dang / sems rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su sgom pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad snying rje chen pos @183b khyab par bya ba dang /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la rnam par bltas nas don dang / tshig dang / yi ge la 'jug par bya ba dang / sems rgya chen po mtha' dang dbus med pa yongs su sgom pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad snying rje chen pos @183b khyab par bya ba dang /
translated: They were looking at the realm of phenomena and engaging with the meaning, the words, and the letters. They were meditating on the vast mind that is without end or middle. They were pervading all beings with great compassion.

original: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi gdung la sems yang dag par 'brel bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang yon tan thams cad la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus yang dag par bskyed pa dang /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi gdung la sems yang dag par 'brel bar bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos dang yon tan thams cad la 'jug par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i lus yang dag par bskyed pa dang /
translated: They were connecting their minds with the lineage of the buddhas of the three times. They were engaging with all the qualities and attributes of the buddhas. They were producing bodies that were blessed by all the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rab tu dbye ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i dus la ji ltar 'bab pa yang dag par blta ba dang / chos kyi las dang mthun pa'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan par byed cing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rab tu dbye ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i dus la ji ltar 'bab pa yang dag par blta ba dang / chos kyi las dang mthun pa'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan par byed cing /
translated: They were discerning the thoughts of all beings. They were looking at the right time to plant the roots of virtue. They were teaching the pure form body that is in accord with the activity of the Dharma.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
translated: By the Buddha‚Äôs blessing, he looked in the ten directions

original: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
analyzed: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
translated: and at that time spoke these verses:

original: gang zhig bsam yas bskal par spyod pa dag /
analyzed: gang zhig bsam yas bskal par spyod pa dag /
translated: ‚ÄúThose who, for inconceivable eons,

original: sems can phan phyir rtag tu zhugs pa ste //
analyzed: sems can phan phyir rtag tu zhugs pa ste //
translated: always engage in conduct for the benefit of sentient beings,

original: de dag brtson brtan chags med yid ldan pa //
analyzed: de dag brtson brtan chags med yid ldan pa //
translated: they, with steadfast diligence and unattached minds,

original: sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu sbyor zhing tshol //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu sbyor zhing tshol //
translated: always apply themselves to and seek the qualities of the Buddha.

original: gang zhig mtshungs med skyes bu 'dul drung du //
analyzed: gang zhig mtshungs med skyes bu 'dul drung du //
translated: ‚ÄúThose who, in the presence of the incomparable guide of beings,

original: bsam pa dri ma med par rnam sbyangs shing //
analyzed: bsam pa dri ma med par rnam sbyangs shing //
translated: have purified their intentions with stainlessness,

original: chos mkhas 'gro ba skyob pa'i sems ldan pa //
analyzed: chos mkhas 'gro ba skyob pa'i sems ldan pa //
translated: and possess the mind skilled in the Dharma to protect beings,

original: de dag yongs bsngo mdzod du zhugs pa yin //
analyzed: de dag yongs bsngo mdzod du zhugs pa yin //
translated: they have entered the treasury of complete dedication.

original: brtson 'grus stobs dang de dag nyer ldan zhing //
analyzed: brtson 'grus stobs dang de dag nyer ldan zhing //
translated: ‚ÄúEndowed with the power of diligence and that which is near,

original: ye shes stobs kyis rnam dag yid gzhungs te //
analyzed: ye shes stobs kyis rnam dag yid gzhungs te //
translated: with the power of wisdom, pure and sharp,

original: bzod pa'i stobs ldan sgul bar mi nus pa //
analyzed: bzod pa'i stobs ldan sgul bar mi nus pa //
translated: with the power of patience, unshakable,

original: de dag 'gro ba kun skyab mngon par brtson //
analyzed: de dag 'gro ba kun skyab mngon par brtson //
translated: they strive to protect all beings.

original: shin tu yid brtan mtshungs pa med pa dang // bsam pa rnam dag dga' ba'i blo ldan pa //
analyzed: shin tu yid brtan mtshungs pa med pa dang // bsam pa rnam dag dga' ba'i blo ldan pa //
translated: And have pure intentions and joyful minds.

original: de dag sa dang / @184a *//
analyzed: de dag sa dang / @184a *//
translated: They are like the earth,

original: 'dra ba'i bzod stobs kyis //
analyzed: 'dra ba'i bzod stobs kyis //
translated: And with the power of acceptance,

original: 'gro ba kun la phan phyir mngon par brtson //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun la phan phyir mngon par brtson //
translated: They strive to benefit all beings.

original: bdag la bde ba tshol bar mi byed de //
analyzed: bdag la bde ba tshol bar mi byed de //
translated: They do not seek happiness for themselves,

original: snying rje can gyi bsam pa de 'dra'o //
analyzed: snying rje can gyi bsam pa de 'dra'o //
translated: Such is the intention of the compassionate ones.

original: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob sems can //
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob sems can //
translated: They have the intention to protect all beings,

original: chags med gyur par de dag zhugs pa yin //
analyzed: chags med gyur par de dag zhugs pa yin //
translated: And they are established in non-attachment.

original: phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed gang yang rung //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sems can ji snyed gang yang rung //
translated: Whatever beings there are in the ten directions,üîΩHaving gathered them all without exception,

original: 'gro ba kun nas ma lus bsdu byas te; ;de dag don du brtan sems ldan pa rnams //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun nas ma lus bsdu byas te; ;de dag don du brtan sems ldan pa rnams //
translated: For their sake, those with steadfast minds

original: de dag yongs su bsngo tshul bslab pa yin //
analyzed: de dag yongs su bsngo tshul bslab pa yin //
translated: Train in the way of dedicating.

original: dga' ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa gtong bar byed //
analyzed: dga' ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa gtong bar byed //

analyzed: de dag ye shes dge bas yongs su bsngo //

original: de dag blo gros yangs shing mtha' yas pa //

original: bsam gtan stobs la rjes su sems pas na //

original: mkhas pa de dag shes rab bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: mkhas pa de dag shes rab bsam mi khyab //

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun na gang yod pa'i //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten kun na gang yod pa'i //
translated: Whatever virtues there are in all the worlds of the ten directions,

original: dge ba de dag yang dag sgrub pa na //
analyzed: dge ba de dag yang dag sgrub pa na //
translated: When they are accomplished

analyzed: 'gro ba kun la phan dang bde sems kyis //

original: dge ba de dag gang la tshad med pa //
analyzed: dge ba de dag gang la tshad med pa //

analyzed: brtan pa de dag yongs su sdud pa'i tshe //

original: de la rtag brtson dam pa'i blo gros can //
analyzed: de la rtag brtson dam pa'i blo gros can //

analyzed: bsam yas ye shes la mi rab tu gzhog / de dag 'gro ba'i don du ma nar med par //
translated: They are fully dedicated to inconceivable wisdom.üîΩThey are dedicated to remaining for inconceivable eonsüîΩWithout weariness for the sake of beings.

analyzed: bskal ba bsam gyis mi khyab gnas pa @184b spro; ;de dag yid ni zhum par mi 'gyur te //

analyzed: de dag bsngo rtogs bsam pa'i yid dang ldan //

analyzed: gzugs tshol mi byed sgra dang dri ma yin //

analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol sems kyis //

analyzed: ye shes dam pa'i stobs ni rtag tu tshol //

original: mkhas pa de dag ye shes mkha' 'dra bas //
analyzed: mkhas pa de dag ye shes mkha' 'dra bas //

analyzed: mtha' dang dbus med spyad pa spyod pa byed // rgyal ba'i chos kyi chos nyid ci 'dra ba //

analyzed: de dag gang dang gang du 'dong byed pa //

analyzed: rtag tu mchog brtson dga' ba byed pa ste //

analyzed: ye shes dam pa mchog la rjes su sems //

analyzed: de dag bdag la bde bar mi /

analyzed: chos kyi grong rdal de na rab tu gnas //

original: gzugs dang tshor ba dag la mi gnas shing //

analyzed: srid pa gsum las yongs su yid bskyod de //

analyzed: bsod nams gter la de dag yongs su bsngo //

analyzed: 'gro ba kun nas ma lus bsdu byas te //

analyzed: skyes bu dam pa de dag @185a *//

original: dgrol ba'i phyir //
analyzed: dgrol ba'i phyir //

original: spyod pa'i mchog la gang zhig brtson byed pa //
analyzed: spyod pa'i mchog la gang zhig brtson byed pa //

analyzed: de dag rnam pa kun tu sems brtan te // de dag blo gros yangs pa gzhal du med //

original: de dag dran pa'i dbang po ma nyams pa //
analyzed: de dag dran pa'i dbang po ma nyams pa //

analyzed: gang du'ang de dag gnas 'chang mi byed de //

original: mkha' la rlung dang rlung mar ci 'dra ba //
analyzed: mkha' la rlung dang rlung mar ci 'dra ba //

analyzed: 'gro ba kun na de dag 'jigs pa med //

original: de dag srid gsum 'di na mu stegs byed //
analyzed: de dag srid gsum 'di na mu stegs byed //

analyzed: skye dang 'jig pa'i tshul la rjes su sems //

analyzed: gang rnams 'gro ba rnam par dag byed pa //

analyzed: de phyir de dag spyod la mi gnas so //

analyzed: 'gro ba kun gyi tshig lam ji snyed dang // skye rgu thams cad smra zhing mngon brjod pa //

analyzed: de dag smra yang rlom sems med pa yin //

analyzed: chags med yid ldan spyod pa 'di 'dra'o; ;bsod nams tshul la blo gros mtha' yas pa //

analyzed: de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ba na //

analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bzhugs pa ji snyed pa'i // mi yi dbang po de dag mnyes pa yin; ;'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa zhes bya ba ste /

original: yongs su bsngo ba dang po'o //
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba dang po'o //

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /

analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag / 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste /
translated: O sons of the victors,üîΩin this regard, bodhisattva great beings have unwavering faith in all the buddhas of the past, present, and future,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin /üîΩ'di lta ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin /üîΩ'di lta ste /
translated: in order to please all the thus-gone ones.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa gcig thob pa yan chad kun la yang mi phyed par dad pa yin /üîΩ'di lta ste /üîΩlhag pa'i bsam @186a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa gcig thob pa yan chad kun la yang mi phyed par dad pa yin / 'di lta ste / lhag pa'i bsam @186a *//
translated: It is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas‚Äô ways of being skilled in the applications of mindfulness.üîΩIt is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas‚Äô ways of being skilled in the right efforts.üîΩIt is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas‚Äô ways of being skilled in the bases of supernatural powers.üîΩIt is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas‚Äô ways of being skilled in the faculties.üîΩIt is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas‚Äô ways of being skilled in the powers.

original: pas rab tu zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin /üîΩ'di lta ste /
analyzed: pas rab tu zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin / 'di lta ste /
translated: It is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas‚Äô ways of being skilled in the branches of awakening.üîΩIt is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas‚Äô ways of being skilled in the path.üîΩIt is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas‚Äô ways of being skilled in the concentrations.üîΩIt is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas‚Äô ways of being skilled in the immeasurables.üîΩIt is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas‚Äô ways of being skilled in the formless absorptions.üîΩIt is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas‚Äô ways of being skilled in the liberations.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par gzung zhing bsrung ba'i phyir de dag dang de dag tu skyes pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa la mi phyed par dad pa yin /üîΩ'di lta ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan pa yang dag par gzung zhing bsrung ba'i phyir de dag dang de dag tu skyes pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa la mi phyed par dad pa yin /üîΩ'di lta ste /
translated: It is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas‚Äô ways of being skilled in the totalities.üîΩIt is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas‚Äô ways of being skilled in the aspects of emptiness.üîΩIt is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas‚Äô ways of being skilled in the aspects of the signless.üîΩIt is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas‚Äô ways of being skilled in the aspects of the wishless.üîΩIt is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas‚Äô ways of being skilled in the aspects of the aspirationless.üîΩIt is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas

original: sdang ba med pa'i mig rab tu 'thob pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin /üîΩ'di lta ste /
analyzed: sdang ba med pa'i mig rab tu 'thob pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin / 'di lta ste /
translated: It is to have undivided faith in all sentient beings in order to dedicate all one‚Äôs roots of virtue for the sake of all sentient beings.

original: mtha' yas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya zhing yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos dkar po thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin /üîΩ'di lta ste /
analyzed: mtha' yas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya zhing yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyir chos dkar po thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin / 'di lta ste /
translated: It is to have undivided faith in all virtuous qualities in order to create and accomplish infinite roots of virtue.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba la mi phyed par dad pa yin /üîΩ'di lta ste /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mos pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yongs su bsngo ba la mi phyed par dad pa yin / 'di lta ste /
translated: It is to have undivided faith in the dedication of all bodhisattvas in order to perfect one‚Äôs superior intention and resolve.

original: ston pa'i 'du shes yongs su ma rgyas pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir chos smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin /üîΩ'di lta ste /
analyzed: ston pa'i 'du shes yongs su ma rgyas pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir chos smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la mi phyed par dad pa yin /üîΩ'di lta ste /
translated: It is to have undivided faith in all bodhisattvas who teach the Dharma in order to perfect the perception of the Teacher.üîΩIt is to have undivided faith in all the bodhisattvas who are one‚Äôs spiritual friends in order to perfect the perception of the spiritual friend.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dad par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul la mi phyed par dad pa yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la dad par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul la mi phyed par dad pa yin /
translated: In order to have faith in the inconceivable thus-gone ones, they have undivided faith in the miracles and manifestations of all buddhas.

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'am / sems can rnams la dmigs pa gang dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs sam /

It is to strive to venerate the bodily remains of all those buddhas after they have passed into parinirvƒÅ·πáa. It is to venerate those thus-gone ones even though one may exhaust countless eons.

original: bsnyen @189b bkur ba'i rgyan dang / brjod pa yon tan mtha' yas pa bsngags pas bsgrubs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas bsgrubs pa de dag mthar thug par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: bsnyen @189b bkur ba'i rgyan dang / brjod pa yon tan mtha' yas pa bsngags pas bsgrubs pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya bas bsgrubs pa de dag mthar thug par ma gyur cig /
translated: May I never cease to accomplish the adornment of service, to accomplish the praise of the infinite qualities of expression, and to accomplish the ripening of all beings.

original: de ltar rim gro byed pa las phyir ldog par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: de ltar rim gro byed pa las phyir ldog par ma gyur cig /
translated: May I never turn back from such service.

original: rgyun gcod par ma gyur cig /
analyzed: rgyun gcod par ma gyur cig /
translated: May I never interrupt it.

original: sems yongs su skyo ba med pa yang thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems yongs su skyo ba med pa yang thob par gyur cig /
translated: May I attain an unwearied mind.

original: mngon par chags pa'i sems 'du shes rnam par spangs pa dang / mi gnas pa'i chos nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rlom sems thams cad bcom pas rlom sems med par gyur pa dang / chos 'gyur ba med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi rgyas btab pa'i chos kyi sgo dang /
analyzed: mngon par chags pa'i sems 'du shes rnam par spangs pa dang / mi gnas pa'i chos nyid dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rlom sems thams cad bcom pas rlom sems med par gyur pa dang / chos 'gyur ba med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin gyi rgyas btab pa'i chos kyi sgo dang /
translated: May I attain the Dharma gateway of the seal of the true reality of phenomena, which is the abandonment of the perception of attachment, the reality of nonabiding, and the absence of conceit due to the destruction of all conceit with regard to roots of virtue.

original: tshe dang skye ba thams cad du 'khor bar 'gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang / skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin la dbyod  cing dmigs pa'i chos kyi rgyas btab pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i yongs su bsngo ba dang /üîΩchos kyi rang bzhin la rab tu brtson pa'i yongs su bsngo ba mnyam pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul la zhugs pa'i mngon par 'du bya ba med par sgrub pa dang / dngos po thams cad kyi 'du shes dang bral ba'i bsngo ba'i tshul dang /
analyzed: tshe dang skye ba thams cad du 'khor bar 'gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa dang / skye ba med pa'i rang bzhin la dbyod  cing dmigs pa'i chos kyi rgyas btab pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i yongs su bsngo ba dang / chos kyi rang bzhin la rab tu brtson pa'i yongs su bsngo ba mnyam pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i tshul la zhugs pa'i mngon par 'du bya ba med par sgrub pa dang / dngos po thams cad kyi 'du shes dang bral ba'i bsngo ba'i tshul dang /
translated: the bodhicitta of the seal of the Dharma, which is the seal of the nature of nonarising, the bodhicitta of the dedication of the blessing of the tathƒÅgatas,üîΩthe dedication of the sameness of the nature of the Dharma, the dedication of the accomplishment of the absence of formation that is engaged in the way of the absence of formation, the way of dedication that is free of the perception of all things,

original: bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i rnam pa tshad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsngo ba srid pa kun las 'phags pa dang / sgom pa'i sgo mtshan ma la mkhas pas @190a *//
analyzed: bsngo ba la mkhas pa'i rnam pa tshad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bsngo ba srid pa kun las 'phags pa dang / sgom pa'i sgo mtshan ma la mkhas pas @190a *//
translated: the infinite aspects of the skill in dedication, the bodhisattva dedication that is superior to all existences, and the skill in the gateway of meditation through the signs of the gateway.

original: gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar len pa'i byin gyi rlabs can dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bsngo ba chen pos yongs su sbyangs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gnas pa'i mos pa yongs su rgyas par gnas thams cad yang dag par bcom par gyur cig /
analyzed: gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dge ba'i rtsa ba nye bar len pa'i byin gyi rlabs can dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bsngo ba chen pos yongs su sbyangs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gnas pa'i mos pa yongs su rgyas par gnas thams cad yang dag par bcom par gyur cig /
translated: and the blessing of taking up the roots of virtue of the bodhisattva conduct, and the generation of the mind of awakening that is purified by great dedication, and the vast aspiration to remain in all the roots of virtue, and the complete destruction of all abodes.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar ci nas kyang 'khor ba'i rgyud du chud zos par mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa chud zos par mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang srid pa'i 'du 'dzis chud zos par mi 'gyur pa dang /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar ci nas kyang 'khor ba'i rgyud du chud zos par mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa chud zos par mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang srid pa'i 'du 'dzis chud zos par mi 'gyur pa dang /
translated: should be like this with regard to those roots of virtue, so that they are not wasted in the continuum of sa·πÉsƒÅra, so that the generation of the mind of awakening is not wasted in omniscience, so that the activities of existence are not wasted in the midst of existence,

original: ci nas kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad bsgral ba dang / ci nas kyang skye ba dang / 'chi 'phos skyon du mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sgo stor bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyu zad par mi 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: ci nas kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad bsgral ba dang / ci nas kyang skye ba dang / 'chi 'phos skyon du mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sgo stor bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyu zad par mi 'gyur ba dang /
translated: in order to liberate all realms of sentient beings, in order that birth and death and transmigration will not be a fault, in order that the door of unattached wisdom will not be lost, in order that the cause of the succession of bodhisattva conduct will not be exhausted,

original: ci nas kyang 'jig rten gyi chos kyis kun tu blangs par mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: ci nas kyang 'jig rten gyi chos kyis kun tu blangs par mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: in order that they will not be taken over by worldly dharmas, in order that they will be purified by the perfections, and in order that they will be endowed with the power of omniscience.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa mun pa med pa dang ldan pa ni /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa mun pa med pa dang ldan pa ni /
translated: Thus, bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas endowed with the bodhisattvas‚Äô generation of the intention that is free from darkness

original: @190b chos dkar po snang bar gyur pas nye bar brtan cing yongs su bsngo ba'i mchog skyes bu dam pas spyad pa dang / yongs su ngag pa'i yid kyis yang dag par rtog pa dang / sems dang 'dra ba'i chos thams cad la zhugs pa dang /
analyzed: @190b chos dkar po snang bar gyur pas nye bar brtan cing yongs su bsngo ba'i mchog skyes bu dam pas spyad pa dang / yongs su ngag pa'i yid kyis yang dag par rtog pa dang / sems dang 'dra ba'i chos thams cad la zhugs pa dang /
translated: It is to be steadfast through the illumination of virtuous qualities and to be born from the supreme dedication of the practice of holy beings. It is to have a mind that is dedicated to the correct understanding of all phenomena.

original: sgyu ma dang 'dra ba'i las yongs su shes pa dang / mig yor lta bu'i las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa dang / sprul pa lta bu'i mngon par 'du byed pa la gnas pa dang / sgra brnyan lta bu'i las la brten pa dang /
analyzed: sgyu ma dang 'dra ba'i las yongs su shes pa dang / mig yor lta bu'i las kyi rnam par smin pa la mos pa dang / sprul pa lta bu'i mngon par 'du byed pa la gnas pa dang / sgra brnyan lta bu'i las la brten pa dang /
translated: It is to be engaged in all phenomena that are like the mind. It is to know that karma is like an illusion. It is to be inspired by the ripening of karma that is like a reflection. It is to abide in the creation of emanations. It is to rely on karma that is like an echo.

original: grib ma lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su song ba dang / chags pa med pa'i chos kyi mig rab tu skyes pa dang / bya ba med par 'byams klas pa'i rjes su song ba dang / zhi ba'i rigs rab tu thob pa dang /
analyzed: grib ma lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su song ba dang / chags pa med pa'i chos kyi mig rab tu skyes pa dang / bya ba med par 'byams klas pa'i rjes su song ba dang / zhi ba'i rigs rab tu thob pa dang /
translated: It is to follow the bodhisattva conduct that is like a shadow. It is to give rise to the unattached Dharma eye. It is to follow the infinite absence of action. It is to attain the family of peace.

original: gnyis su med pa dang ldan pa'i 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa dang / chos ma nor ba'i mtshan ma thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa dang ldan pa'i 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa dang / chos ma nor ba'i mtshan ma thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang /
translated: They are immersed in all conditioned and unconditioned phenomena, which are nondual; they attain the unmistaken characteristics of phenomena; they follow all the bodhisattva activities;

original: mtshan ma thams cad la zhen pa med pa dang / thun mong gi las la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba dang / chos dkar po thams cad rgyun ma chad pa dang / chags pa thams cad kyis mngon par ma zhen pa dang / chags pa med par 'gro ba la brten pa dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: mtshan ma thams cad la zhen pa med pa dang / thun mong gi las la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba dang / chos dkar po thams cad rgyun ma chad pa dang / chags pa thams cad kyis mngon par ma zhen pa dang / chags pa med par 'gro ba la brten pa dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: they are unattached to any characteristics; they follow the expertise in shared actions; they maintain the continuity of all virtuous qualities; they are not attached to any attachments; and they are endowed with the support of nonattachment.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu bsam pa'i blo dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu bsam pa'i blo dang ldan pa /
translated: Thus, bodhisattva great beings have extremely profound minds.

original: @191a *// dge ba'i rtsa ba la rmongs pa med pa /
analyzed: @191a *// dge ba'i rtsa ba la rmongs pa med pa /
translated: They are not confused about the roots of virtue.

original: chos thams cad dang 'gal ba med pa'i chos can /
analyzed: chos thams cad dang 'gal ba med pa'i chos can /
translated: They are not in conflict with any phenomena.

original: rgyu dang / las dang / bya ba dang 'gal ba med pa yang dag par mthong ba /
analyzed: rgyu dang / las dang / bya ba dang 'gal ba med pa yang dag par mthong ba /
translated: He saw that there was no contradiction between causes, actions, and deeds.

original: yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa /
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa /
translated: He was skilled in dedication.

original: ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi tshul dang / las rnam par smin pa mngon par sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad la rnam par lta zhing /üîΩrnam par dpyod pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyi chos kyi tshul dang / las rnam par smin pa mngon par sgrub pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad la rnam par lta zhing / rnam par dpyod pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa /
translated: He had the wisdom that observes and analyzes all phenomena, the perfection that accomplishes the way of the nature of phenomena and the ripening of karma.

original: yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes chen po mngon par shes pa las shin tu rig pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa /
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes chen po mngon par shes pa las shin tu rig pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa /
translated: He possessed the wisdom of great dedication, which is the knowledge of the superknowledges.üîΩHe had the roots of merit that are the virtuous mind of the practice of noncomposite activity.

original: mngon par 'du bya ba med par spyod pa'i sems dge ba dang ldan pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar ci nas kyang 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs bdud kyi las dang bral ba /
analyzed: mngon par 'du bya ba med par spyod pa'i sems dge ba dang ldan pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar ci nas kyang 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi rigs bdud kyi las dang bral ba /
translated: He dedicated those roots of merit in such a way that all beings would be liberated and that the family of the buddhas would be free from the actions of MƒÅra.

original: las kyi rnam pa yongs su byang ba'i bdag nyid can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo'o; ;bsngo ba de yang tshad med pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir yang dag parüîΩmthong bar byed de /
analyzed: las kyi rnam pa yongs su byang ba'i bdag nyid can thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo'o; ;bsngo ba de yang tshad med pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir yang dag par mthong bar byed de /
translated: I dedicate so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is completely pure,

analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'jig rten gyi yul dang rnam par bral ba /
translated: and so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is beyond the world.üîΩI dedicate so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is beyond all afflictions,

original: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang rnam par bral bar yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang rnam par bral bar yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: and so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is completely pure.üîΩI dedicate so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is beyond the world,üîΩand so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is beyond all afflictions.

original: sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par byang ba'i phyir yang yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par byang ba'i phyir yang yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: I dedicate so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is completely pure,üîΩand so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is beyond the world.üîΩI dedicate so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is beyond all afflictions,

original: ye shes rnam par dag @191b pa'i mthar thug par zab pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ci nas kyang 'khor ba'i chos kyis mi bskyod cing /
analyzed: ye shes rnam par dag @191b pa'i mthar thug par zab pa'i tshul gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag ci nas kyang 'khor ba'i chos kyis mi bskyod cing /
translated: and so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is completely pure.üîΩI dedicate so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is beyond the world,üîΩand so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is beyond all afflictions.üîΩI dedicate so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is completely pure,üîΩand so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is beyond the world.üîΩI dedicate so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is beyond all afflictions,üîΩand so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is completely pure.üîΩI dedicate so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is beyond the world,üîΩand so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is beyond all afflictions.

original: sangs rgyas kyi dge ba mngon par 'byung ba sems bskyed pa dang ldan par yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi dge ba mngon par 'byung ba sems bskyed pa dang ldan par yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may have the wisdom of the buddhas that is completely pure,üîΩand so that they may have the wisdom of the bud

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe'ang bdud kyi las thams cad las rnam par bzlog ste chos mnyam pa nyid kyi rgya yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su song ba las rgyas 'debs par byed do //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe'ang bdud kyi las thams cad las rnam par bzlog ste chos mnyam pa nyid kyi rgya yongs su bsngo ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su song ba las rgyas 'debs par byed do //
translated: When they dedicate those roots of virtue, they turn away from all the works of MƒÅra and seal them with the wisdom of dedication to the equality of phenomena.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi longs spyod kyi phyir yang chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das par khong du chud pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi longs spyod kyi phyir yang chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das par khong du chud pa'i yongs su bsngo bas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate all those roots of virtue to the enjoyment of omniscience, with a dedication that is beyond the world.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ni /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba ni /
translated: In that way, the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas dedicate those roots of virtue.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su grub pas 'gyod pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa yin te /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su grub pas 'gyod pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa yin te /
translated: They have roots of virtue that are free of regret, because they have perfected the ma·πá·∏çala of the vehicle to omniscience.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: ‚ÄúO sons of the victors!

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba mi phyed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba mi phyed pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is called ‚Äúthe bodhisattvas‚Äô indivisible dedication. ‚Äù

original: gnyis pa'o // yongs su bsngo ba de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: gnyis pa'o // yongs su bsngo ba de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: The bodhisattva who has this dedication

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo zhing /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo zhing /
translated: dedicates all roots of virtue

original: sangs rgyas grangs med pa mngon sum du bya ba thob par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas grangs med pa mngon sum du bya ba thob par 'gyur ro //
translated: and attains the presence of countless buddhas.

original: chos brjod du med pa yongs su dag pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do //üîΩsems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyang khong @192a *//
analyzed: chos brjod du med pa yongs su dag pa yang yongs su rdzogs par byed do // sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyang khong @192a *//
translated: He also perfects the inexpressible purity of the Dharma.

original: du chud par byed do //
analyzed: du chud par byed do //
translated: He also penetrates the sameness of all sentient beings.

original: chos thams cad la 'jug pa rmongs pa med pa la yang rab tu 'jug go /
analyzed: chos thams cad la 'jug pa rmongs pa med pa la yang rab tu 'jug go /
translated: He also enters the absence of confusion about engaging with all phenomena.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs bdud kyi las thams cad rab tu 'joms pa yang yongs su sgrub bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs bdud kyi las thams cad rab tu 'joms pa yang yongs su sgrub bo //
translated: He also accomplishes the blessings of all buddhas that overcome all the works of MƒÅra.

original: mngon par skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mngon par skyes pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: He also accomplishes the perfection of the bodhicitta that has arisen.

original: chags pa med pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'ang yang dag par 'grub bo //
analyzed: chags pa med pa la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa'ang yang dag par 'grub bo //
translated: He attains the state of not being led by others, because he enters into nonattachment.

original: chos thams cad kyi don mthong ba yang rab tu thob bo //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi don mthong ba yang rab tu thob bo //
translated: He attains the vision of the meaning of all the teachings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i 'du shes kyi gnas kyang rab tu rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i 'du shes kyi gnas kyang rab tu rtogs par byed do //
translated: He realizes the state of perception that goes to all buddha-fields.

original: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su snang bar bya ba'i yongs su dag pa yang yongs su sgrub bo //üîΩde nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /

analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba la yang rjes su slob bo //

analyzed: spro ba rab tu 'byung ba /
