analyzed: bsam pa 'jam par 'gyur ba / dbang po sim par 'gyur pa'i gzugs gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad mthong bar gyur te / de bde ba'i 'du shes de dag mthong ba'i tshe 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: They will have gentle thoughts.üîΩThey will have satisfied faculties.

original: bdag gi bde ba yongs su bsngo ba 'dis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang phyi phyir zhing yang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: bdag gi bde ba yongs su bsngo ba 'dis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang phyi phyir zhing yang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: ‚ÄúWhen they see all those forms, they will dedicate them toward omniscience, thinking, ‚ÄòThrough this dedication of my happiness may those lord buddhas always have the inconceivable happiness of the buddhas‚Äô conduct.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba mtshungs pa med pas yang dag par gzung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bde ba mtshungs pa med pas yang dag par gzung bar gyur cig /
translated: May they be sustained by the incomparable happiness of the buddhas‚Äô samƒÅdhi.

original: sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje chen po'i bde ba mtha' yas par phyir zhing yang shin tu brtan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi thugs rje chen po'i bde ba mtha' yas par phyir zhing yang shin tu brtan par gyur cig /
translated: May they always have the infinite happiness of the buddhas‚Äô great compassion.

original: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i bde ba tshad med pa yang dag par ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i bde ba tshad med pa yang dag par ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May they always have the immeasurable happiness of the buddhas‚Äô liberation.‚Äô

original: sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul tshad med pas shin tu bzung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul tshad med pas shin tu bzung bar gyur cig /
translated: May they be sustained by the limitless magical emanations of the buddhas.üîΩ

original: sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung @195a *//üîΩba'i bde ba rnyed par dka' bas shin tu khyab par gyur cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung @195a *// ba'i bde ba rnyed par dka' bas shin tu khyab par gyur cig /
translated: May they be well-guarded by the immeasurable magical powers of the Buddhas.üîΩMay they attain the bliss of the supreme power of the Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi stobs kyi bde ba tshad med pas shin tu bde bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi stobs kyi bde ba tshad med pas shin tu bde bar gyur cig /
translated: May they be very happy with the immeasurable bliss of the power of the Buddhas.

original: tshor ba thams cad zhi zhing skye ba med pa'i bde bas 'gyur ba med par bde bar gyur cig /
analyzed: tshor ba thams cad zhi zhing skye ba med pa'i bde bas 'gyur ba med par bde bar gyur cig /
translated: May they be happy without change, with the bliss of the non-arising of all feelings.

original: chags pa med par gnas pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba gnyis su med cing yang dag par spyod pas 'khrug pa med pa'i bde bar gyur cig /
analyzed: chags pa med par gnas pa rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba gnyis su med cing yang dag par spyod pas 'khrug pa med pa'i bde bar gyur cig /
translated: May they be happy without disturbance, with the bliss of the Tathagatas, who are always in equipoise, abiding without attachment, with the bliss of non-duality, and with the bliss of correct conduct.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yongs su bsngos nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su bsngo ba byed de /
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yongs su bsngos nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su bsngo ba byed de /
translated: In this way, the Bodhisattva, the great being, having dedicated those roots of virtue to the Tathagatas, makes the dedication to the Bodhisattvas.

original: 'di ltar bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //üîΩlhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams yongs su dag par bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems rdo rje lta bu shin tu brtan par bya ba dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar bsam pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa rnams kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o // lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa rnams yongs su dag par bya ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / byang chub kyi sems rdo rje lta bu shin tu brtan par bya ba dang /
translated: Thus, I dedicate so that the wishes of those whose wishes are not yet fulfilled may be fulfilled.üîΩI dedicate so that the superior intentions of those whose superior intentions are not yet pure may become pure, so that all the perfections that are not yet complete may be completed, so that the vajra-like mind of enlightenment may be well stabilized,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i go cha phyir mi ldog pa rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang / byang chub tu gzhol ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsrung ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i smon lam yongs @195b su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i go cha phyir mi ldog pa rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba dang / byang chub tu gzhol ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsrung ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i smon lam yongs @195b su rdzogs par bya ba dang /
translated: so that the armor of omniscience may be uninterrupted and irreversible, so that the roots of virtue that are directed toward enlightenment may be protected, and so that the aspirations to generate the mind of enlightenment equal to all beings may be fulfilled.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par spyod pa thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa shin tu rno bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thug par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste /üîΩde ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don du yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par spyod pa thob par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa shin tu rno bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du thug par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste / de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don du yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates so that all the bodhisattvas may attain the state of complete purity, so that they may attain the state of complete purity of the bodhisattvas, so that they may attain the state of complete purity of the Buddhas, so that they may attain the state of complete purity of the Dharma, so that they may attain the state of complete purity of the Sangha, so that they may attain the state of complete purity of the bodhisattvas‚Äô way of life, so that they may attain the state of complete purity of the bodhisattvas‚Äô faculties, so that they may attain the state of complete purity of the bodhisattvas‚Äô higher knowledges, so that they may attain the state of complete purity of the bodhisattvas‚Äô roots of virtue, and so that they may attain the state of complete purity of the knowledge of all things.üîΩIn this way, he dedicates all those roots of virtue to the bodhisattvas.

original: de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du na se gol gtogs pa tsam du sangs rgyas zhi ba'i sgra thos sam /üîΩchos nyan tam /üîΩ'phags pa'i dge 'dun bsnyen bkur byed dam /üîΩgang ci yang rung ste /üîΩdge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la bar chad med par yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba chung du na se gol gtogs pa tsam du sangs rgyas zhi ba'i sgra thos sam /üîΩchos nyan tam /üîΩ'phags pa'i dge 'dun bsnyen bkur byed dam /üîΩgang ci yang rung ste /üîΩdge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la bar chad med par yongs su bsngo'o //

original: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yongs su rdzogs par yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa yongs su rdzogs par yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that the recollection of the Buddha may be fulfilled.

original: chos rjes su dran pa rab tu sbyor bar yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: chos rjes su dran pa rab tu sbyor bar yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that the recollection of the Dharma may be applied.

original: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rim gro bya bar yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i dge 'dun rim gro bya bar yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that the noble Sangha may be served.

original: sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that there may be no separation from seeing the Buddha.

original: sems rnam par dag par yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems rnam par dag par yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that the mind may be purified.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that the qualities of the Buddha may be realized.

original: tshad med pa'i yon tan la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: tshad med pa'i yon tan la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that immeasurable qualities may be engaged.

original: mngon par shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that the superknowledges and the roots of virtue may be purified.

original: chos kyi the tshom rnam par bsal ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //üîΩji ltar @196a *//
analyzed: chos kyi the tshom rnam par bsal ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //üîΩji ltar @196a *//
translated: I dedicate so that doubts about the Dharma may be resolved.üîΩI dedicate so that the Dharma may be realized.üîΩI dedicate so that the Dharma may be realized.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnam par dag pa bstan pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la'ang yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnam par dag pa bstan pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la'ang yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: In the same way, the bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattva dedicates those wholesome roots to all sentient beings,

original: 'di ltar sems can dmyal ba'i lam rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar sems can dmyal ba'i lam rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: in order to turn back the path to the hells,

original: byol song gi skye gnas rgyun gcad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: byol song gi skye gnas rgyun gcad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: in order to cut off the stream of the animal realm,

original: gshin rje'i 'jig rten rtsa ba nas gcad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: gshin rje'i 'jig rten rtsa ba nas gcad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: in order to uproot the world of Yama,

original: ngan song gi rgyud thams cad ma lus par rgyun gcad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ngan song gi rgyud thams cad ma lus par rgyun gcad pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: in order to cut off the entire stream of the lower realms,

original: sems can de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mos shing phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu mos shing phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: and in order to inspire all those sentient beings with unsurpassed enlightenment and make them irreversible.

original: lhag pa'i bsam pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may attain the generation of the mind of supreme enlightenment.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi spang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mi spang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may not abandon any of the qualities of the Buddhas.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa shin tu bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa shin tu bde ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may attain the stage of the omniscient ones.

original: sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may attain complete purity.

original: sems can thams cad ye shes mtha' yas pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad ye shes mtha' yas pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they may attain infinite wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: The bodhisattvas

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yang rung ste /
translated: whatever roots of virtue they have

original: byang chub tu dmigs pa dang bral ba'i @196b sems dang / thams cad mkhyen par dmigs pa la brtson pa'i yid la byed pa dang / bdag gdul ba dang / pha rol gdul ba la gzhol ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / bdag dang gzhan yongs su smin par sbyor ba'i thabs mkhas pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub tu dmigs pa dang bral ba'i @196b sems dang / thams cad mkhyen par dmigs pa la brtson pa'i yid la byed pa dang / bdag gdul ba dang / pha rol gdul ba la gzhol ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / bdag dang gzhan yongs su smin par sbyor ba'i thabs mkhas pa dang /
translated: the mind free from the reference point of enlightenment, the mental activity of striving for the reference point of omniscience, the superior intention of being dedicated to subduing oneself and subduing others, the skillful means of applying oneself to ripening oneself and others,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul dang / ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang bas yongs su smin par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / sems bskyed pa gnas pa med pa dang 'grogs pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa dang / sngon snying rje chen po bskyed pas khyim na gnas pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul dang / ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang bas yongs su smin par byed pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / sems bskyed pa gnas pa med pa dang 'grogs pa'i mnyam par gzhag pa dang / sngon snying rje chen po bskyed pas khyim na gnas pa dang /
translated: the ripening of following the way of the bodhisattvas and wisdom, the liberation of ripening, the equipoise of the mind generation that is without reference point and without company, and the dwelling in the household through previously generating great compassion.

original: byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas rang gi chung ma'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / sbyor ba nyams pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam shin tu rnam par dag pas rtsom pa dang / yang dag par rtsom pa dang / sgrub pa dang /
analyzed: byams pa'i sems dang ldan pas rang gi chung ma'i rjes su 'brang ba dang / sbyor ba nyams pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam shin tu rnam par dag pas rtsom pa dang / yang dag par rtsom pa dang / sgrub pa dang /
translated: they are correct in their practice,üîΩthey are correct in their generation,üîΩthey are correct in their great focus,üîΩthey are correct in their accomplishment,üîΩthey are correct in their vastness,üîΩthey are correct in their completion,

original: yang dag par sgrub pa dang / skyed pa dang / yang dag par skyed pa dang / dmigs pa chen pos yang dag par sdud pa dang / grub par byed pa dang / rgya cher byed pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
analyzed: yang dag par sgrub pa dang / skyed pa dang / yang dag par skyed pa dang / dmigs pa chen pos yang dag par sdud pa dang / grub par byed pa dang / rgya cher byed pa dang / yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /
translated: and they are correct in their dwelling in the household.

original: khyim na gnas pa dang / bu dang 'grogs shing gnas pa na 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: khyim na gnas pa dang / bu dang 'grogs shing gnas pa na 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: When they dwell in the household with their children, they dedicate in the following way:

original: byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa'i tshe gang ci yang rung ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas pa'i tshe gang ci yang rung ste /
translated: ‚ÄúWhatever I have,

original: gos dang / zas dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / spyod pa dang / ldang ba dang / rten pa dang / skye mched 'byung ba'i las dang / spyod lam la gnas pa dang /üîΩspyod lam brtul @197a *//
analyzed: gos dang / zas dang / mal stan dang / nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / spyod pa dang / ldang ba dang / rten pa dang / skye mched 'byung ba'i las dang / spyod lam la gnas pa dang / spyod lam brtul @197a *//
translated: ‚ÄúThey are the activities of wearing clothes, eating food, using bedding, using medicine and equipment for illness, going and coming, conduct, rising, resting, and the arising of the sense sources.

original: ba dang / lus dang ngag gi las spyod pa dang / dbang po drug bsdams pa dang / rang gi lus phyi ba dang / mnye ba dang / khrus byed pa dang / zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / myangs pa dang /
analyzed: ba dang / lus dang ngag gi las spyod pa dang / dbang po drug bsdams pa dang / rang gi lus phyi ba dang / mnye ba dang / khrus byed pa dang / zos pa dang / 'thungs pa dang / 'chos pa dang / myangs pa dang /
translated: They are the activities of the body and speech, the restraint of the six senses, the care of one‚Äôs own body, massaging, bathing, eating, drinking, chewing, tasting,üîΩstretching, contracting, looking, looking around, turning, waking up, and stabilizing one‚Äôs own body.

original: brkyang ba dang / bskum pa dang / lta ba dang / kun tu lta ba dang / log pa dang / sad pa dang / rang gi lus brtan par bya ba de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: brkyang ba dang / bskum pa dang / lta ba dang / kun tu lta ba dang / log pa dang / sad pa dang / rang gi lus brtan par bya ba de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: All of these are the activities of bodhisattvas who possess the mind of omniscience,

original: thams cad mkhyen par dmigs pa la brtson pa /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen par dmigs pa la brtson pa /
translated: who are dedicated to the observation of omniscience,

original: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar sems pa; byang chub tu smon lam tshad med pa btab pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar sems pa; byang chub tu smon lam tshad med pa btab pa /
translated: They had the intention to benefit and bring happiness to all sentient beings. They had made immeasurable prayers for enlightenment.

original: sems tshad med pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sems tshad med pa dang ldan pa /
translated: They had immeasurable minds.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po yongs su sdud pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po yongs su sdud pa /
translated: They gathered vast roots of virtue.

original: 'gro ba thams cad skyob par brtson pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad skyob par brtson pa /
translated: They were dedicated to protecting all beings.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba la rtag tu brtson pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba la rtag tu brtson pa /
translated: They were always dedicated to roots of virtue.

original: rlom pa dang / bag med pa rnam par bzlog pa /
analyzed: rlom pa dang / bag med pa rnam par bzlog pa /
translated: They had turned away from pride and carelessness.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos nyid la rab tu brten pa /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos nyid la rab tu brten pa /
translated: They were fully dedicated to the nature of omniscience.

original: rnam par shes pa dang / sems bskyed pa dang / yid la byed pa gzhan med pa /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang / sems bskyed pa dang / yid la byed pa gzhan med pa /
translated: They had no other consciousness, thought, or attention.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub la mngon par gnas pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub la mngon par gnas pa /
translated: They were fully present in the enlightenment of all buddhas.

original: nyon mongs pa'i phyogs thams cad las phyir phyogs pa /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i phyogs thams cad las phyir phyogs pa /
translated: They were turned away from all the factors of affliction.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa la slob pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa la slob pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: They had the intention to train in the training of all bodhisattvas.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam nyams pa med pa /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam nyams pa med pa /
translated: They were never deficient in the path to omniscience.

original: ye shes kyis la brten pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyis la brten pa /
translated: They were based on wisdom.

original: bstan pa'i gnas dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bstan pa'i gnas dang ldan pa /
translated: They are the support of the teachings.

original: dge ba'i @197b rtsa bas shes rab che ba /
analyzed: dge ba'i @197b rtsa bas shes rab che ba /
translated: They have great wisdom through their roots of virtue.

original: bung ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs chen po gsog pa /
analyzed: bung ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs chen po gsog pa /
translated: They gather a great accumulation of roots of virtue like bees.

original: 'gro ba thams cad las rgyud shin tu 'phags pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad las rgyud shin tu 'phags pa /
translated: Their mindstreams are superior to all beings.

original: 'du byed la mngon par zhen pa med pa /
analyzed: 'du byed la mngon par zhen pa med pa /
translated: They are not attached to conditioned things.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdams ngag mthun par 'dzin pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ma bsngos pa gang yang med de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdams ngag mthun par 'dzin pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ma bsngos pa gang yang med de /
translated: They hold the instructions of all the tathƒÅgatas in harmony, and they do not dedicate anything to omniscience.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim na gnas pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par sdud cing sgrub bo //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim na gnas pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yang dag par sdud cing sgrub bo //
translated: In that way, when bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas are living in a home, they gather and accomplish those roots of virtue.

original: yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: They dedicate them.

original: de ltar de chung du na khyi'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byol song gi ris su gtogs pa la zas sna 'ga' ma /
analyzed: de ltar de chung du na khyi'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang / de ma yin pa'i byol song gi ris su gtogs pa la zas sna 'ga' ma /
translated: In that way, they give even a little food to those who are included in the class of dogs and to those who are included in the class of other animals.

original: kham 'ga' yongs su gtong ba byed kyang de thams cad de dag nyid la phan pa dang / de dag nyid la bde ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas de dag sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho de dag dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgyu de dag dang /
analyzed: kham 'ga' yongs su gtong ba byed kyang de thams cad de dag nyid la phan pa dang / de dag nyid la bde ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas de dag sdug bsngal gyi rgya mtsho de dag dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgyu de dag dang /
translated: And although he gives away a few morsels, he dedicates them all to the welfare of those very beings, to the happiness of those very beings, to the liberation of those very beings from the ocean of suffering, from the causes of suffering,

original: sdug bsngal gyi phung po de dag dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag dang / sdug bsngal bsags pa de dag dang / sdug bsngal mngon par 'du byed pa de dag dang / sdug bsngal gyi gter de dag dang / sdug bsngal gyi rtsa ba de dag dang /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi phung po de dag dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de dag dang / sdug bsngal bsags pa de dag dang / sdug bsngal mngon par 'du byed pa de dag dang / sdug bsngal gyi gter de dag dang / sdug bsngal gyi rtsa ba de dag dang /
translated: from the mass of suffering, from the feeling of suffering, from the accumulation of suffering, from the production of suffering, from the treasure of suffering, from the root of suffering,

original: sdug bsngal gyi skye mched de dag nas sems can de dag yongs su sgrol zhing rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi skye mched de dag nas sems can de dag yongs su sgrol zhing rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: from the source of suffering, in order to deliver and rescue those beings.

original: de la dmigs pas sems can thams cad mngon du byed do //üîΩdmigs par byed do //üîΩyid la byed do //
analyzed: de la dmigs pas sems can thams cad mngon du byed do //üîΩdmigs par byed do //üîΩyid la byed do //
translated: He focuses on that, and all beings become manifest to him.üîΩHe focuses on that, and all beings become manifest to him.üîΩHe focuses on that, and all beings become manifest to him.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang de dag la'ang sngon du @198a *//
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang de dag la'ang sngon du @198a *//
translated: He precedes all those roots of virtue.

original: 'gro bar byed de /
analyzed: 'gro bar byed de /
translated: He is the one who leads them.

original: 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He is the one who dedicates them to omniscience.

original: byang chub tu sems bskyed pas yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: byang chub tu sems bskyed pas yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: He is the one who generates the mind of awakening in them.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la nye bar 'jog go /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la nye bar 'jog go /
translated: He is the one who establishes them in the roots of virtue.

original: 'khor ba'i dgon pa las rnam par bzlog go /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i dgon pa las rnam par bzlog go /
translated: He is the one who turns them away from the wilderness of sa·πÉsƒÅra.

original: sangs rgyas kyi bde ba bsgribs pa med pa yang mngon du byed de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bde ba bsgribs pa med pa yang mngon du byed de /
translated: He is the one who reveals to them the unobstructed bliss of the buddhas.

original: 'khor ba'i rgyud las 'byin par byed do //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rgyud las 'byin par byed do //
translated: He is the one who extracts them from the continuum of sa·πÉsƒÅra.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos la brtson pa'i byams pas kyang yongs su rgyas par byed do //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos la brtson pa'i byams pas kyang yongs su rgyas par byed do //
translated: He is the one who spreads the love that is dedicated to the Dharma of the buddhas.

original: snying rje chen pos kyang de dag la snying brtse bar byed de /
analyzed: snying rje chen pos kyang de dag la snying brtse bar byed de /
translated: He is the one who has compassion for them with great compassion.

original: bde ba rnam par dag pa'ang de dag la yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: bde ba rnam par dag pa'ang de dag la yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He is the one who dedicates to them the purity of happiness.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir yang rab tu 'jug ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsrung bar bya ba'i phyir yang rab tu 'jug ste /
translated: He is the one who engages in the protection of the roots of virtue.

original: de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos la nye bar sdud do //
analyzed: de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos la nye bar sdud do //
translated: He is the one who gathers the Dharma of the buddhas.

original: de dag bdud kyi yul las rnam par bzlog go /
analyzed: de dag bdud kyi yul las rnam par bzlog go /
translated: They turn them away from the domain of MƒÅra.

original: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug par byed do //
analyzed: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la 'jug par byed do //
translated: They introduce them to the domain of the TathƒÅgata.

original: de dag 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad las gyen du skyod par byed do //
analyzed: de dag 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad las gyen du skyod par byed do //
translated: They raise them up from all worldly ways.

original: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs la yang dag par sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: de dag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs la yang dag par sgrub par byed do //
translated: They establish them in the lineage of all the tathƒÅgatas.

original: de dag dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gzhog ste /
analyzed: de dag dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gzhog ste /
translated: They establish them in the sameness of the three times.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci yang rung ste yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci yang rung ste yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / yang dag par sgrub par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIn this way, whatever roots of virtue the bodhisattvas have accomplished or will accomplish, they dedicate them all in this way.

original: 'di snyam du sems bskyed de /
analyzed: 'di snyam du sems bskyed de /
translated: They think the following:

original: ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon byang @198b chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas la rim gro mdzad pa'i dmigs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi dmigs pa la brtson par mdzed pa'i tshe gzugs la gnas pa med pa dang /
analyzed: ji ltar 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon byang @198b chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod cing sangs rgyas la rim gro mdzad pa'i dmigs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi dmigs pa la brtson par mdzed pa'i tshe gzugs la gnas pa med pa dang /
translated: Just as the buddhas of the past, when they were practicing bodhisattva conduct, served the buddhas and were diligent in the observation of all roots of virtue, they did not dwell on form,

original: tshor ba la mngon par ma chags pa dang / 'du shes kyi rnam pa phyin ci log med pa dang / 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par chags pa med pa dang / skye mched drug las gyen du 'phags pa dang /
analyzed: tshor ba la mngon par ma chags pa dang / 'du shes kyi rnam pa phyin ci log med pa dang / 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par chags pa med pa dang / skye mched drug las gyen du 'phags pa dang /
translated: they were not attached to feeling, they did not have distorted perception, they did not engage in volitional factors, they were not attached to consciousness, they rose above the six sense sources,

original: 'jig rten gyi chos dang mi 'grogs pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das par yongs su bsngo ba dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i chos 'byams klas pa rab tu mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad gnas med par rab tu rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad ma skyes pas 'byung ba dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos dang mi 'grogs pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das par yongs su bsngo ba dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i chos 'byams klas pa rab tu mkhyen pa dang / chos thams cad gnas med par rab tu rtogs pa dang / chos thams cad ma skyes pas 'byung ba dang /
translated: not associating with worldly concerns, dedicating to the transcendence of the world, comprehending the vast space-like Dharma, realizing that all phenomena are baseless, understanding that all phenomena are unborn,

original: chos thams cad ma 'gags par gzigs pa dang / mi bden pa'i chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa las gyen du 'phags pa dang / chos thams cad mi brdzun zhing bden par gzigs pa dang / chos thams cad 'pho ba med pa la shin tu mos pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad ma 'gags par gzigs pa dang / mi bden pa'i chos thams cad la mngon par chags pa las gyen du 'phags pa dang / chos thams cad mi brdzun zhing bden par gzigs pa dang / chos thams cad 'pho ba med pa la shin tu mos pa dang /
translated: seeing that all phenomena are unceasing, rising above attachment to all unreal phenomena, seeing that all phenomena are neither false nor true, and being devoted to the fact that all phenomena are beyond transition.

original: chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i mtha' ma nyams pa la gnas pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid las shin tu 'phags pa dang / chos de lta bu'i mtshan nyid can thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i mtha' ma nyams pa la gnas pa dang / chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid las shin tu 'phags pa dang / chos de lta bu'i mtshan nyid can thams cad rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa dang /
translated: and they realize that all phenomena with such characteristics are by nature essenceless.

original: sgo kun nas dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sgrub pa la brtson pa @199a *//
analyzed: sgo kun nas dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par sgrub pa la brtson pa @199a *//
translated: They are diligent in the correct accomplishment of roots of virtue in all ways,üîΩand they dedicate those roots of virtue to all that is seen in the ma·πá·∏çala of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis gzigs pa thams cad la shin tu gzhol bas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos nyid de dag kho na la mos par byas te /
analyzed: dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis gzigs pa thams cad la shin tu gzhol bas dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos nyid de dag kho na la mos par byas te /
translated: In the same way, I too should aspire to those very dharmas.

original: chos de lta bu la brtson pa'i sems bskyed pa /
analyzed: chos de lta bu la brtson pa'i sems bskyed pa /
translated: I should generate the thought that is diligent in such dharmas.

original: chos thams cad dang mi 'gal ba /
analyzed: chos thams cad dang mi 'gal ba /
translated: I should not contradict any dharma.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i chos las byung ba dang / mig yor dang / chu zla lta bu'i rjes su song ba dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor la gdong gi dkyil 'khor yod pa lta bu'i rgyu dang ldan pa'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i mthar phyin par las kyi rgyud yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i chos las byung ba dang / mig yor dang / chu zla lta bu'i rjes su song ba dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor la gdong gi dkyil 'khor yod pa lta bu'i rgyu dang ldan pa'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i mthar phyin par las kyi rgyud yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They arise from illusory phenomena, and they follow after mirages and the moon in the water. They have the power of being endowed with a cause, like a face reflected in a mirror. They are the transformation of the continuum of karma that reaches the end of the stage of the TathƒÅgata.

original: zhes sems bskyed de /
analyzed: zhes sems bskyed de /
translated: They generate the thought:

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rjes su slob cing /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rjes su slob cing /
translated: ‚ÄòIn that way, the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas train in the footsteps of the past Bhagavat Buddhas,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: and they dedicate those wholesome roots.‚Äô

original: 'das pa rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du ma byon pa dang / de bzhin du da ltar byung ba dang / de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i rjes su bslab ste dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: 'das pa rnams la ji lta ba de bzhin du ma byon pa dang / de bzhin du da ltar byung ba dang / de bzhin du 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba'i rjes su bslab ste dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I will train in the dedication of the past, future, and present Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, and dedicate these roots of virtue.

original: yang 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
analyzed: yang 'di ltar sems bskyed de /
translated: I will arouse the following thought:

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di ltar yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di ltar yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThe Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, know that the bodhisattvas dedicate the roots of virtue in the following way.

original: @199b zhes bya bar thugs su chud pa de lta bu'i bsngo ba rab /
analyzed: @199b zhes bya bar thugs su chud pa de lta bu'i bsngo ba rab /
translated: This kind of dedication is excellent,

original: dam pa / mchog /
analyzed: dam pa / mchog /
translated: supreme,

original: bla na med pa /
analyzed: bla na med pa /
translated: unsurpassed,

original: mnyam pa med pa /üîΩmi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa /üîΩ'dra ba med pa /
analyzed: mnyam pa med pa / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa / 'dra ba med pa /
translated: unequaled,üîΩincomparable,

original: mtshungs pa med pa /üîΩgtso bor gyur pa /
analyzed: mtshungs pa med pa / gtso bor gyur pa /
translated: matchless,üîΩforemost,

original: thu bor gyur pa /
analyzed: thu bor gyur pa /
translated: most excellent,

original: kun tu snyoms pa /
analyzed: kun tu snyoms pa /
translated: equanimous,

original: mi mnyam pa med pa /üîΩbdag nyid che ba /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa med pa / bdag nyid che ba /
translated: impartial,üîΩmagnificent,

original: shin tu yangs pa /
analyzed: shin tu yangs pa /
translated: vast,

original: dge ba / rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: dge ba / rnam par dag pa /
translated: I dedicate with inexpressible virtue,

original: kha na ma tho ba med pa brjod du med pas yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med pa brjod du med pas yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: purity, and irreproachability.

original: snyam du sems bskyed de /
analyzed: snyam du sems bskyed de /
translated: Think in this way and generate the awakening mind.üîΩ

original: byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ba ni lus kyi las rnam par dag pas lus rnam par dag pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de ltar yongs su bsngo ba ni lus kyi las rnam par dag pas lus rnam par dag pa yin /

original: ngag gi las rnam par dag pas ngag rnam par dag pa yin /
analyzed: ngag gi las rnam par dag pas ngag rnam par dag pa yin /
translated: verbally pure because of their pure verbal actions,

original: yid kyi las rnam par dag pas yid rnam par dag pa yin /
analyzed: yid kyi las rnam par dag pas yid rnam par dag pa yin /
translated: mentally pure because of their pure mental actions,üîΩabiding in the bodhisattva conduct because of abiding in irreproachability,

original: kha na ma tho ba med pa la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa yin; kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson pa yin /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba med pa la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa yin; kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las dang ldan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba la brtson pa yin /
translated: diligent in the roots of virtue because of possessing irreproachable actions,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu brtson pas sems nyams pa med pa yin /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rab tu brtson pas sems nyams pa med pa yin /
translated: unwavering in their intention because of being diligent in omniscience,

original: chos thams cad byed pa med par zhugs pas shin tu che ba la gnas pa yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad byed pa med par zhugs pas shin tu che ba la gnas pa yin /
translated: and abiding in greatness because of engaging with all phenomena without action.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang 'byor pa yin /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang 'byor pa yin /
translated: It is to be unstained by worldly phenomena and to be endowed with the transcendent Dharma.

original: ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i las dang ldan pas las 'byams klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad rab tu shes pa yin /üîΩgnas pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pas yongs su @200a *//
analyzed: ye shes dang mngon par shes pa'i las dang ldan pas las 'byams klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad rab tu shes pa yin / gnas pa thams cad yang dag par bcom pas yongs su @200a *//
translated: It is to know all the limitless and boundless activities of wisdom and superknowledge.

original: bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin te /
analyzed: bsngo ba la mkhas pa yin te /
translated: It is to be skilled in dedicating to the complete destruction of all abodes.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: ‚ÄúO sons of the victors,

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba gsum pa sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba gsum pa sangs rgyas thams cad la yang dag par bskyed pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: this is the third dedication of the bodhisattva great beings, called ‚Äòthe perfect generation toward all buddhas.‚Äô

original: bsngo ba de la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
analyzed: bsngo ba de la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
translated: Bodhisattva great beings who abide in this dedication and possess the mind

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las kyi zil dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las kyi zil dang ldan pa yin /
translated: are endowed with the splendor of the activity of the thus-gone ones.

original: sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa la zhugs pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi phun sum tshogs pa la zhugs pa yin /
translated: They have entered the perfection of the buddhas.

original: ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa yin /
analyzed: ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa yin /
translated: They have entered the domain of wisdom.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i las dang ma bral ba yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i las dang ma bral ba yin /
translated: He is never separate from the activity of the bodhisattvas.

original: thabs mkhas pa rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa yin /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pa rnam par dpyod pa la mkhas pa yin /
translated: He is skilled in the analysis of skillful means.

original: chos kyi dbyings la rab tu zhugs pa yin /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la rab tu zhugs pa yin /
translated: He has entered the realm of phenomena.

original: byang chub sems dpas yongs su smin par bya ba'i mtshams sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpas yongs su smin par bya ba'i mtshams sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang ldan pa yin /
translated: He is skilled in connecting with the ripening of the bodhisattvas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud du chud pa yin /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud du chud pa yin /

original: chos thams cad kyi rgyud mtha' dang dbus med pa la mkhas pas rab tu dbye ba khong du chud pa yin /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rgyud mtha' dang dbus med pa la mkhas pas rab tu dbye ba khong du chud pa yin /

original: 'jig rten du skye bar snang yang 'jig rten gyi chos kyis mi brjod pa yin no //üîΩde nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
analyzed: 'jig rten du skye bar snang yang 'jig rten gyi chos kyis mi brjod pa yin no // de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
translated: He appears to be born in the world, but he is not affected by worldly phenomena.‚Äù

original: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
analyzed: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
translated: Then the bodhisattva Vajradhvaja, through the blessing of the Buddha, looked into the ten directions and at that time spoke these verses:

original: de dag spyod pa'i rjes su dpa' ba slob //
analyzed: de dag spyod pa'i rjes su dpa' ba slob //

analyzed: bde ba ji snyed gang dag rgyu ba dang // skyes bu'i gtso bos gang dang rab bsngags pa //

analyzed: mig tu 'ong zhing dag pa rgya chen rnams //

analyzed: 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnam pa yongs su bsngo //

original: 'gro ba kun na dge ba gang yod pa //

analyzed: bde ba kun dang 'bral bar ma gyur cig /

translated: with limitless offerings of divine and non-divine substances,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du gyur ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyan rnam par dgod pa'i rgyur gyur cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du gyur ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyan rnam par dgod pa'i rgyur gyur cig /
translated: may it become the cause for the display of all the ornaments of all the Tathagatas in the retinue of all the Buddhas who have manifested.

original: blo bdag nyid che ba la mos shing shin tu yangs pa'i don du sgrib pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rgya cher yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad sems bskyed pas rgyas par gyur cig /
analyzed: blo bdag nyid che ba la mos shing shin tu yangs pa'i don du sgrib pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rgya cher yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad sems bskyed pas rgyas par gyur cig /
translated: May the infinite worlds be filled with the generation of the mind of enlightenment, in order to dedicate all the roots of virtue, which are free from obscurations, to the vast meaning, with a mind that is devoted to the greatness of the nature of the self.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / nam mkha'i dbyings 'byams klas pa la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud @203a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / nam mkha'i dbyings 'byams klas pa la rab tu gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud @203a *//
translated: All the Blessed Buddhas, as many as there are, who abide in the infinite and boundless world systems of the realm of phenomena and the infinite expanse of space,

original: dang / las gzhan dang gzhan gyis shin tu bsgrubs pa'i phyogs 'byams klas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par rnam par rgyu ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khongs mtha' yas pa dang /
analyzed: dang / las gzhan dang gzhan gyis shin tu bsgrubs pa'i phyogs 'byams klas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med par rnam par rgyu ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khongs mtha' yas pa dang /
translated: the infinite realms that are created by other actions, the realms that move through inexpressibly many world systems, the realms that are part of the inexpressibly many buddha realms,

original: sangs rgyas kyi dmigs pa la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs 'byams klas pa dang / sa mtshams med pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor dang / snrel zhir rgyu ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par grub pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi dmigs pa la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma dang / 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs 'byams klas pa dang / sa mtshams med pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'khor dang / snrel zhir rgyu ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par grub pa dang /
translated: the many realms that are the focus of the buddhas, the infinite realms that are various, the realms that are a continuous circle, and the realms that are created in a crisscross pattern.

original: spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba'i phyogs kyi 'khor gyi rgyud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dang / sems can gyi 'khor mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa shin tu bstan pa thams cad ma lus pa de dag na bzhugs shing 'tsho ba dang /
analyzed: spyi'u tshugs su rgyu ba'i phyogs kyi 'khor gyi rgyud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dang / sems can gyi 'khor mtha' dang dbus med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa shin tu bstan pa thams cad ma lus pa de dag na bzhugs shing 'tsho ba dang /
translated: the infinite world systems in the directions of the downward-facing parts of the wheel, and the infinite world systems of the retinue of sentient beings without end or middle, and all the buddhas who were present and alive in those places,

original: sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul yang dag par ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings su rtsa ba ma rnyed pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su gzung bar sgrub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par ston pa; sangs rgyas kyi gzigs pa ye shes 'byams klas pa'i mngon par shes pas thugs su chud pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul yang dag par ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa dang / nam mkha'i dbyings su rtsa ba ma rnyed pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su gzung bar sgrub pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yang dag par ston pa; sangs rgyas kyi gzigs pa ye shes 'byams klas pa'i mngon par shes pas thugs su chud pa /
translated: the buddhas who were displaying their miracles and manifestations, and the bodhisattvas who were teaching the entire realm of phenomena and the realm of space without finding a basis, and who were teaching the blessing of the tathƒÅgatas that accomplishes the acceptance of all beings, and who had realized the wisdom of the vision of the buddhas through their higher knowledge,

original: rab tu brjod pa rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pas rab tu @203b byung ba; chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi rjes su song ba tha mi dad pa'i chos kyi dbyings gzhi mnyam pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
analyzed: rab tu brjod pa rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pas rab tu @203b byung ba; chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi rjes su song ba tha mi dad pa'i chos kyi dbyings gzhi mnyam pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
translated: He had entered the even ground of the undifferentiated dharmadhƒÅtu, which is the nature of all phenomena.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i lus su gcig pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po'i lus su gcig pa /
translated: He had the body of the essence of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: chos thams cad kyi rab tu zhugs pa med pa /üîΩ'gro ba thams cad la yang dag par ston pas na /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rab tu zhugs pa med pa / 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag par ston pas na /
translated: He had entered the absence of all phenomena.

original: phyir ldog pa med par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa thugs su chud pas thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa /
analyzed: phyir ldog pa med par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa thugs su chud pas thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa /
translated: He had the wisdom of the omniscience that comes from the skill in accomplishing all world systems without turning back.

original: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis shin tu 'phags pa /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis shin tu 'phags pa /
translated: He had the nature of all phenomena.

original: sgrib pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis phyir mi ldog pa /
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis phyir mi ldog pa /
translated: He had the blessing of being without obscurations.

original: sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par byung ba'i phyir chags pa med par gzigs pa'i bdag nyid che ba can bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la me tog gam /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par byung ba'i phyir chags pa med par gzigs pa'i bdag nyid che ba can bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la me tog gam /
translated: flower garlands,üîΩointments,

original: spos sam / phreng ba'am /üîΩbyug pa'am / gdugs sam /
analyzed: spos sam / phreng ba'am / byug pa'am / gdugs sam /
translated: parasols,

original: rgyal mtshan nam /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan nam /
translated: victory banners,

original: ba dan nam /
analyzed: ba dan nam /
translated: and flags,

original: rin po che'am /
analyzed: rin po che'am /
translated: as well as with precious gems,

original: me mar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'am /üîΩmchod rten yang rung ste /
analyzed: me mar gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'am / mchod rten yang rung ste /
translated: and with lamps to the bodies of the tathƒÅgatas and to st≈´pas.

original: dmigs pa tshad med pas sbyar ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang skyes kyang rung ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa tshad med pas sbyar ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang gang skyes kyang rung ste /
translated: Whatever roots of virtue I have produced, may they all be dedicated to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'khrug pa med pa'i sems dang / rtse gcig tu gyur pa'i sems dang / g-yo ba med pa'i sems dang / rmongs pa med pa'i sems dang / mi sgul ba'i sems dang / gnas med @204a *//
analyzed: 'khrug pa med pa'i sems dang / rtse gcig tu gyur pa'i sems dang / g-yo ba med pa'i sems dang / rmongs pa med pa'i sems dang / mi sgul ba'i sems dang / gnas med @204a *//
translated: a mind without conflict, a one-pointed mind, a mind without movement, a mind without delusion, an unshakable mind, a mind without a basis,

original: pa'i sems dang / mi gnas pa'i sems dang / srog med pa'i sems dang / mi g-yeng ba'i sems dang / zhi ba'i sems su byas te /
analyzed: pa'i sems dang / mi gnas pa'i sems dang / srog med pa'i sems dang / mi g-yeng ba'i sems dang / zhi ba'i sems su byas te /
translated: a mind without a location, a mind without life, a mind without distraction, and a mind of peace.

original: 'di ltar yongs su bsngo zhing 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pas 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub kyis 'dus pa'i ming mang po dang / tshig dang nges pa'i ngag mtha' yas pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su bsngo zhing 'di snyam du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chos kyi dbyings shin tu bstan pas 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i byang chub kyis 'dus pa'i ming mang po dang / tshig dang nges pa'i ngag mtha' yas pa dang /
translated: In this way, they dedicate their roots of virtue, thinking, ‚ÄòBy this teaching of the realm of phenomena, may all the buddhas who are gathered in the realm of phenomena be gathered by the omniscience of awakening. May they have many names, infinite words and definitive speech, and may they be gathered by the Dharma of the buddhas.

original: dus tha dad par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku tshe'i tshang dang / mtha' dang dbus med par shin tu bstan pa'i sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rgyas pa dang /
analyzed: dus tha dad par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa phyi ma'i mthar thug pa'i bskal par byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku tshe'i tshang dang / mtha' dang dbus med par shin tu bstan pa'i sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rgyas pa dang /
translated: May the infinite clouds of incense of the thus-gone ones who awaken to perfect buddhahood at different times and whose lifespans are blessed to last until the end of time, and who have taught without end or middle in the past,

original: chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'byung gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su gang ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du dus ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi spos kyi gdugs tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'byung gnas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / chos kyi dbyings yongs su gang ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du dus ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par ston pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi spos kyi gdugs tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: in the buddha realms that are adorned with the bodies of all buddhas, the source of the thus-gone ones, the realm of phenomena, and in the ma·πá·∏çalas of the retinue that are filled with the realm of phenomena, may the infinite clouds of incense of those thus-gone ones who appear at the appropriate time,

original: spos kyi rgyal mtshan tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /üîΩspos kyi ba dan tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: spos kyi rgyal mtshan tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig / spos kyi ba dan tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May immeasurable victory banners of incense appear.üîΩMay immeasurable incense banners appear.

original: spos kyi gzhal med khang tshad med pa yongs su 'byung @204b bar gyur cig /üîΩspos kyi dra ba tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: spos kyi gzhal med khang tshad med pa yongs su 'byung @204b bar gyur cig / spos kyi dra ba tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May immeasurable incense palaces appear.üîΩMay immeasurable incense nets appear.

original: spos kyi sku gzugs tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /üîΩspos kyi 'od tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: spos kyi sku gzugs tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig / spos kyi 'od tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May immeasurable incense images appear.üîΩMay immeasurable incense lights appear.

original: spos kyi 'od zer tshad med pa yongs su 'bar bar gyur cig /üîΩspos kyi sprin tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: spos kyi 'od zer tshad med pa yongs su 'bar bar gyur cig / spos kyi sprin tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May immeasurable incense light rays blaze.üîΩMay immeasurable incense clouds appear.

original: spos kyi gdan tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /üîΩspos kyi 'chags tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: spos kyi gdan tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig / spos kyi 'chags tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May immeasurable incense seats appear.üîΩMay immeasurable incense arrays appear.

original: spos kyi gtsug lag khang tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: spos kyi gtsug lag khang tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May immeasurable incense temples appear.

original: spos kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: spos kyi zhing tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May immeasurable incense fields appear.

original: spos kyi ri rab tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /üîΩspos kyi rgya mtsho tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: spos kyi ri rab tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig / spos kyi rgya mtsho tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May immeasurable incense Mount Merus appear.üîΩMay immeasurable incense oceans appear.

original: spos kyi chu klung tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /üîΩspos kyi shing tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: spos kyi chu klung tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig / spos kyi shing tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May immeasurable incense rivers appear.üîΩMay immeasurable incense trees appear.

original: spos kyi na bza' tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /üîΩspos kyi padmo tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: spos kyi na bza' tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig / spos kyi padmo tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May immeasurable incense garments appear.üîΩMay immeasurable incense lotuses appear.

original: spos kyi pho brang tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: spos kyi pho brang tshad med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May immeasurable incense palaces appear.

original: me tog gi gdugs dpag tu med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: me tog gi gdugs dpag tu med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May immeasurable flower parasols appear.

original: ces bya ba nas tshul de bzhin du me tog gi pho brang gi bar du grangs med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: ces bya ba nas tshul de bzhin du me tog gi pho brang gi bar du grangs med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: In the same way, may immeasurable flower palaces appear.

original: phreng ba'i gdugs grangs med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /üîΩces bya ba nas phreng ba'i @205a *//üîΩpho brang gi bar du grangs med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /üîΩbyug pa'i gdugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: phreng ba'i gdugs grangs med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig / ces bya ba nas phreng ba'i @205a *// pho brang gi bar du grangs med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig / byug pa'i gdugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May there be countless canopies of garlands.üîΩMay there be countless palaces of garlands.üîΩMay there be inconceivably many canopies of ointments.

original: ces bya ba nas byug pa'i pho brang gi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /üîΩphye ma'i gdugs mtshungs pa med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: ces bya ba nas byug pa'i pho brang gi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig / phye ma'i gdugs mtshungs pa med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May there be inconceivably many palaces of ointments.üîΩMay there be unequaled canopies of powders.

original: ces bya ba nas phye ma'i pho brang gi bar du mtshungs pa med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /üîΩna bza'i gdugs kun tu mtha' yas pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: ces bya ba nas phye ma'i pho brang gi bar du mtshungs pa med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig / na bza'i gdugs kun tu mtha' yas pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May there be unequaled palaces of powders.üîΩMay there be infinite canopies of clothing.

original: ces bya ba nas na bza'i pho brang gi bar du kun tu mtha' yas pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: ces bya ba nas na bza'i pho brang gi bar du kun tu mtha' yas pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May there be infinite palaces of clothing.

original: rin po che'i gdugs kun tu mu med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: rin po che'i gdugs kun tu mu med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May there be an infinite number of precious parasols.

original: ces bya ba nas rin po che'i pho brang gi bar du kun tu mu med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /üîΩmar me snang ba'i gdugs gzhal du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: ces bya ba nas rin po che'i pho brang gi bar du kun tu mu med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig / mar me snang ba'i gdugs gzhal du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May there be an infinite number of precious palaces.üîΩMay there be an infinite number of parasols of the light of lamps.

original: ces bya ba nas mar me snang ba'i pho brang gi bar du gzhal du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /üîΩlhab lhub kyi gdugs brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /üîΩces bya ba nas lhab lhub kyi pho brang gi bar du brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /

translated: May there be an infinite number of palaces of the light of lamps.üîΩMay there be an inexpressible number of parasols of ornaments.üîΩMay there be an inexpressible number of palaces of ornaments.

original: nor bu rin po che'i gdugs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che'i gdugs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May there be an inexpressible number of precious jewels.

original: ces bya ba nas nor bu rin po che'i pho brang gi bar @205b du brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: ces bya ba nas nor bu rin po che'i pho brang gi bar @205b du brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa yongs su 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May there be an appearance of an inexpressible number of precious jewel palaces.

original: de bzhin du nor bu rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i ba dan dang / nor bu rin po che'i bla re dang / nor bu rin po che'i dra ba dang / nor bu rin po che'i sku gzugs dang / nor bu rin po che'i 'od dang /

translated: In the same way, may there be precious jewel victory banners, precious jewel banners, precious jewel canopies, precious jewel nets, precious jewel statues, precious jewel lights,

original: nor bu rin po che'i 'od zer dang / nor bu rin po che'i sprin dang / nor bu rin po che'i gdan dang / nor bu rin po che'i 'chag sa dang / nor bu rin po che'i gtsug lag khang dang / nor bu rin po che'i zhing dang /
