translated: precious jewel light rays, precious jewel clouds, precious jewel thrones, precious jewel walkways, precious jewel temples, and precious jewel fields.

original: nor bu rin po che'i ri rab dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgya mtsho dang / nor bu rin po che'i chu klung dang / nor bu rin po che'i shing dang / nor bu rin po che'i na bza' dang / nor bu rin po che'i padmo dang /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che'i ri rab dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgya mtsho dang / nor bu rin po che'i chu klung dang / nor bu rin po che'i shing dang / nor bu rin po che'i na bza' dang / nor bu rin po che'i padmo dang /
translated: May there be mountains of precious jewels, oceans of precious jewels, rivers of precious jewels, trees of precious jewels, garments of precious jewels, lotuses of precious jewels,

original: nor bu rin po che'i pho brang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: nor bu rin po che'i pho brang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
translated: and palaces of precious jewels, inexpressibly and even more than inexpressibly numerous.

original: dmigs pa re re la yang grangs med pa'i rgyan rnams kun nas gnas par gyur cig /üîΩgrangs med pa'i gtsug lag khang dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig /üîΩgrangs med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: dmigs pa re re la yang grangs med pa'i rgyan rnams kun nas gnas par gyur cig / grangs med pa'i gtsug lag khang dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig / grangs med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
translated: May there be countless ornaments in each of the focal points.üîΩMay there be countless temples.üîΩMay there be countless multistoried buildings.

original: grangs med pa'i rta babs dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: grangs med pa'i rta babs dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
translated: May there be countless archways.

original: grangs med pa'i zla gam dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: grangs med pa'i zla gam dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
translated: May there be countless crescents.

original: grangs med pa'i nor bu rin po che'i pu shu dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: grangs med pa'i nor bu rin po che'i pu shu dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
translated: May there be countless jeweled canopies.

original: grangs med pa'i rin po che'i skar khung rnam pa tha dad pa kun na @206a *//üîΩgnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: grangs med pa'i rin po che'i skar khung rnam pa tha dad pa kun na @206a *// gnas par gyur cig /
translated: May there be countless jeweled windows of various kinds.

original: rin po che'i kha dog rnam par dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: rin po che'i kha dog rnam par dag pa grangs med pa kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
translated: May there be countless pure jeweled colors.

original: grangs med pa'i rgyan rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa thams cad dang dpe med pa dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: grangs med pa'i rgyan rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa thams cad dang dpe med pa dag kun nas gnas par gyur cig /
translated: May there be countless ornaments of all the most excellent kinds, without compare.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par sangs rgyas kyi rim gro dang rgyan rnam pa 'di lta bus rnam par dag par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par sangs rgyas kyi rim gro dang rgyan rnam pa 'di lta bus rnam par dag par gyur cig /
translated: May all the worlds without exception be purified by the service and adornment of the Buddha.

original: sems can thams cad ma lus par stobs bcu'i sar 'byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ma lus par stobs bcu'i sar 'byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings without exception attain the stage of the ten powers.

original: sems can thams cad shes par bstan pa'i phyir chos thams cad ma lus pa la chos kyi snang ba bsgribs pa med pa skye bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad shes par bstan pa'i phyir chos thams cad ma lus pa la chos kyi snang ba bsgribs pa med pa skye bar gyur cig /
translated: May the light of the Dharma arise without obstruction in all sentient beings, so that they may understand all things.

original: 'gro ba thams cad gdul ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ma lus par yongs su bsngo bar gyur cig /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad gdul ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ma lus par yongs su bsngo bar gyur cig /
translated: May all roots of virtue be dedicated without exception in order to guide all beings.

original: 'pho ba med pa'i chos nyid du dus thams cad ma lus pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang 'dra ba'i sems tshad med pas zhing thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'pho ba med pa'i chos nyid du dus thams cad ma lus pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang 'dra ba'i sems tshad med pas zhing thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur cig /
translated: May the immeasurable mind, which is like the whole of space, pervade all realms with immeasurable mind in order to enter into the non-transmigrating nature of reality at all times without exception.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyis sangs rgyas mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rab tu 'dul bar gyur cig /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyis sangs rgyas mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rab tu 'dul bar gyur cig /
translated: May all roots of virtue be thoroughly subdued in order to perfect the vision of the Buddha by all beings.

original: 'gro ba thams cad kyis theg pa chen po shin tu grub pa dang / chos thams cad ma lus pa la mngon par chags pa med par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pa la gnas pas kun na @206b gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad kyis theg pa chen po shin tu grub pa dang / chos thams cad ma lus pa la mngon par chags pa med par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba ma lus pa la gnas pas kun na @206b gnas par gyur cig /
translated: May all roots of virtue be present everywhere by abiding in all roots of virtue in order to accomplish the Great Vehicle for all beings and to be unattached to all phenomena without exception.

original: spyod pa mtha' yas pa byin gyis brlab pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongs su spyod par gyur cig /
analyzed: spyod pa mtha' yas pa byin gyis brlab pa dang / chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongs su spyod par gyur cig /
translated: May I experience all roots of virtue in order to enter the middle way, which is free from the extremes of existence and nonexistence.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su 'gyur bar shog cig /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su 'gyur bar shog cig /
translated: May I experience all roots of virtue in order to enter the emanations of all the tathagatas.

original: sems can thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag ma lus par rkyen du gyur par shog cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag ma lus par rkyen du gyur par shog cig /
translated: May all these roots of virtue become conditions for all sentient beings to realize omniscient wisdom.

original: ci nas kyang bdag med pa'i chos kyi dbyings las chos thams cad 'da' bar mi 'gyur bar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur yongs su spyod pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: ci nas kyang bdag med pa'i chos kyi dbyings las chos thams cad 'da' bar mi 'gyur bar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur yongs su spyod pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
translated: Through these roots of virtue, may all sentient beings be sustained by serving all the buddhas in such a way that all phenomena are not beyond the realm of reality, which is devoid of self.

original: chags pa med pa la 'jug pa'i phyir chos thams cad yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: chags pa med pa la 'jug pa'i phyir chos thams cad yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
translated: May they be embraced by the perfect realization of all phenomena, in order to enter into nonattachment.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi grogs gcig tu mthun pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi grogs gcig tu mthun pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
translated: May all bodhisattvas be embraced by the perfect realization of all roots of virtue, in their harmony and accord.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad smon lam yongs su rdzogs pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad smon lam yongs su rdzogs pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
translated: May all bodhisattva activities be embraced by the perfect realization of the fulfillment of all aspirations.

original: bsgribs pa med pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang ba thams cad yang dag par zin par gyur cig /üîΩmtha' dang dbus med pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs @207a *//
analyzed: bsgribs pa med pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i chos snang ba thams cad yang dag par zin par gyur cig / mtha' dang dbus med pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs @207a *//
translated: May all the bodhisattvas‚Äô teachings be embraced by the perfect realization of the understanding of the absence of obscurations.

original: pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul bas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul bas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
translated: May the miracles of all the thus-gone ones be embraced by the perfect realization of the expertise in the absence of center and periphery.

original: sems tshad med pas yongs su rgyas par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems tshad med pas yongs su rgyas par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stobs dang mi bsnyengs pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
translated: May they be sustained by the power and fearlessness of all the buddhas, in order to be filled with immeasurable mind.

original: mi gnyis pa'i snang ba grub pas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa'i snang ba grub pas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa dang / gzungs kyi sgor 'jug pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
translated: May they be sustained by the bodhisattva‚Äôs samƒÅdhi, eloquence, and the entrance to the dhƒÅra·πáƒ´ gateway, through accomplishing the appearance of nonduality.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po shin tu bstan pa bsgrub pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / cho 'phrul chen po shin tu bstan pa bsgrub pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
translated: May they be sustained by the skill in the way of all the tathƒÅgatas, in order to accomplish the display and great miracles of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: skye ba dang / rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / nye bar gshegs pa bstan pa dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / sems can gdul ba la 'jug pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum du byon pa /
analyzed: skye ba dang / rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang / 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / nye bar gshegs pa bstan pa dang / mchod pa dang / rim gro dang / sems can gdul ba la 'jug pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dus gsum du byon pa /
translated: enlightenment, turning the wheel of Dharma, passing into nirvana, and the deeds of a buddha, as well as making offerings, serving, and training sentient beings, may all the tathagatas of the three times,

original: mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad ma lus pa'i skye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad ma lus pa'i skye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
translated: without exception, be embraced by the birth of all tathagatas, without exception, and by their perfect enlightenment in buddhahood.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas zin par gyur cig /
translated: May all worlds without exception be embraced by the perfect purity of the unsurpassed buddha fields.

original: bskal pa 'byams klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad ma lus par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'brel ba rgyun mi 'chad pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: bskal pa 'byams klas pa mtha' dang dbus med pa thams cad ma lus par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'brel ba rgyun mi 'chad pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
translated: May all kalpas, without exception, be embraced by the uninterrupted continuity of the bodhisattva conduct.

original: @207b 'jig rten du skye ba'i yul thams cad ma lus par thams cad du skye ba shin tu bstan pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: @207b 'jig rten du skye ba'i yul thams cad ma lus par thams cad du skye ba shin tu bstan pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
translated: May they be sustained by the complete manifestation of birth in all the worlds.

original: sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus par byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su smin par bya bas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus par byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su smin par bya bas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
translated: May they be sustained by the complete ripening of the conduct of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra in all the realms of sentient beings.

original: sems can gyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / bag chags thams cad ma lus par rnyog pa med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can gyi nyon mongs pa dang / bag la nyal ba dang / bag chags thams cad ma lus par rnyog pa med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
translated: May they be sustained by the complete absence of defilement in all the afflictions, latent tendencies, and habitual propensities of sentient beings.

original: sems can gyi dbang po 'byams klas pa thams cad ma lus par mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /üîΩ'gro ba thams cad kyi mos pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa thams cad ma lus bar nyon mongs pa med cing /üîΩyongs su dag pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can gyi dbang po 'byams klas pa thams cad ma lus par mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /üîΩ'gro ba thams cad kyi mos pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa thams cad ma lus bar nyon mongs pa med cing /üîΩyongs su dag pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
translated: May they be sustained by the complete engagement in the infinite faculties of all sentient beings.üîΩMay they be sustained by the complete purity of the aspirations and higher intentions of all beings.

original: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba thams cad ma lus par dus la ji ltar 'bab pa bzhin du kun tu bstan pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /üîΩsems can thams cad ma lus par 'gro ba thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ba thams cad ma lus par dus la ji ltar 'bab pa bzhin du kun tu bstan pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig / sems can thams cad ma lus par 'gro ba thams cad sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
translated: May they be embraced by the teaching of the timely guidance of all those to be trained, without exception.üîΩMay they be embraced by the understanding that all beings, without exception, are like magical apparitions.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad ma lus par sangs rgyas byung pa; thams cad kyi bstan pa gzung zhing bsrung bas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad ma lus par sangs rgyas byung pa; thams cad kyi bstan pa gzung zhing bsrung bas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
translated: May they be embraced by the preservation and protection of the teachings of all the buddhas who appear in the world, without exception, in all the buddha-families.

original: ces sems bskyed cing /
analyzed: ces sems bskyed cing /
translated: Generate the awakening mind.üîΩüîΩ

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba @208a *//
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba @208a *//
translated: ‚ÄúIn this way, bodhisattva great beings dedicate those roots of virtue

original: de dag dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ste /üîΩlas kyis ni /
analyzed: de dag dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ste / las kyis ni /
translated: in a way that is free of reference points.

original: rnam par smin pa la yongs su rtog par mi byed /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa la yongs su rtog par mi byed /
translated: They do not conceptualize karma

original: rnam par smin pas ni /
analyzed: rnam par smin pas ni /
translated: in terms of its ripening.üîΩThey do not conceptualize ripening

original: las la yongs su rtog par mi byed de /
analyzed: las la yongs su rtog par mi byed de /
translated: in terms of karma.

original: chos kyi dbyings rtog pa med pa la yang dag par 'jug go /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rtog pa med pa la yang dag par 'jug go /
translated: He penetrates the non-conceptual realm of phenomena.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba byed pa med pas gnas pa yin no //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba byed pa med pas gnas pa yin no //
translated: He abides in the roots of virtue that are free from activity.

original: chos nyid g-yeng nga med pa la'ang rab tu brtson pa yin no //
analyzed: chos nyid g-yeng nga med pa la'ang rab tu brtson pa yin no //
translated: He is diligent in the undistracted nature of phenomena.

original: de ni / chos thams cad la yang dad pas yang dag par 'jug ste /üîΩchos gang rang bzhin gyis yongs su grub par byed pa'am /
analyzed: de ni / chos thams cad la yang dad pas yang dag par 'jug ste / chos gang rang bzhin gyis yongs su grub par byed pa'am /
translated: He has faith in all phenomena and penetrates them correctly.

original: rnam par byed pa de dag gang yang mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: rnam par byed pa de dag gang yang mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see any phenomena that are produced orüîΩcreated by their intrinsic nature.

original: chos nyid dbang po med pa'i mthar thug pa la yang yang dag par 'jug ste /
analyzed: chos nyid dbang po med pa'i mthar thug pa la yang yang dag par 'jug ste /
translated: He penetrates the ultimate limit of the nature of phenomena, which is free from faculties.

original: chos kyi dbyings lta ba po med par yang rab tu shes shing /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings lta ba po med par yang rab tu shes shing /
translated: He understands that the realm of phenomena is without a seer,

original: chos thams cad shes pa po med par yang rab tu rtogs so //
analyzed: chos thams cad shes pa po med par yang rab tu rtogs so //
translated: and he realizes that all phenomena are without a knower.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med par rab tu shes pa chos thams cad kyi rkyen gyi gnas khong du chud pas chos thams cad lus med par rab tu mthong ba /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor tshad med par rab tu shes pa chos thams cad kyi rkyen gyi gnas khong du chud pas chos thams cad lus med par rab tu mthong ba /
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas, knowing the immeasurable ma·πá·∏çala of all phenomena, comprehending the basis of the conditions of all phenomena, see all phenomena as lacking a body.

original: chos thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin par rjes su lta ba /
analyzed: chos thams cad 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin par rjes su lta ba /
translated: They see all phenomena as having reached the end of being free from desire.

original: 'jig rten 'gyur ba thams cad sprul pa lta bur rjes su rtogs pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten 'gyur ba thams cad sprul pa lta bur rjes su rtogs pa /
translated: They realize that all changes in the world are like magical creations.

original: chos gcig la sems can thams cad du rjes su mthong ba /
analyzed: chos gcig la sems can thams cad du rjes su mthong ba /
translated: They see all sentient beings in a single phenomenon.

original: chos kyi dbyings mi gnyis par rab tu rig pa las kyi @208b dmigs pa dang / nye bar len pa la mkhas pas ma btang ba /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings mi gnyis par rab tu rig pa las kyi @208b dmigs pa dang / nye bar len pa la mkhas pas ma btang ba /
translated: They are skilled in the object of activity and appropriation, knowing the nonduality of the realm of phenomena.

original: 'dus byas kyi khams 'dus ma byas su mngon par bsgrubs pas zhig par mi byed pa /
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams 'dus ma byas su mngon par bsgrubs pas zhig par mi byed pa /
translated: They do not destroy the compounded realm by actualizing the uncompounded realm.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi khams 'dus byas su sgro gdags pa thams cad kyis rnam par mi rtog pa /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi khams 'dus byas su sgro gdags pa thams cad kyis rnam par mi rtog pa /
translated: They are free from all superimpositions of the compounded realm onto the uncompounded realm.

original: chos thams cad rab tu zhi ba la gzhol ba /
analyzed: chos thams cad rab tu zhi ba la gzhol ba /
translated: They were dedicated to the peace of all phenomena.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsgrub pa thams cad mngon par bsgrubs pa /
translated: They had accomplished all the roots of virtue.

original: sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: They had the intention to protect all beings.

original: chos rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par shes pa rmongs pa med par chos nyid la brtson pa /
analyzed: chos rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par shes pa rmongs pa med par chos nyid la brtson pa /
translated: They had the unobscured wisdom that comprehends the entire ocean of phenomena.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba nam mkha' lta bu thams cad yongs su bsngo ba /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba nam mkha' lta bu thams cad yongs su bsngo ba /
translated: They dedicated all roots of virtue to the sky.

original: bsod nams kyis rgyas par 'gro bas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam du zhugs pa /
analyzed: bsod nams kyis rgyas par 'gro bas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam du zhugs pa /
translated: They had entered the supramundane path through the vastness of merit.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos kun nas mi rgyu ba mig la rab rib med pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos kun nas mi rgyu ba mig la rab rib med pa /
translated: They were free of the obscurations of the world.

original: ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa /
translated: They had attained the light of wisdom.

original: thabs mkhas pas yongs su bsngo ba'i ngang tshul can de ci nas kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab pa dang / ci nas kyang zhing thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: thabs mkhas pas yongs su bsngo ba'i ngang tshul can de ci nas kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab pa dang / ci nas kyang zhing thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: They are skilled in dedicating in such a way that all the blessings of the buddhas are present, all realms are purified, all sentient beings are matured,

original: ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nye bar blang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du bsod nams kyi zhing dam par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi ded dpon du thog mar 'gro ba dang /
analyzed: ci nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nye bar blang bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du bsod nams kyi zhing dam par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang sems can thams cad kyi ded dpon du thog mar 'gro ba dang /
translated: all the qualities of buddhahood are taken up, they become the supreme field of merit in all worlds, they become the leader of all sentient beings,

original: ci nas kyang snang ba'i dkyil 'khor skye @209a *//
analyzed: ci nas kyang snang ba'i dkyil 'khor skye @209a *//
translated: and the orb of light of the Dharma appears in the world.

original: rgu thams cad la 'char bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang yon tan thams cad kyi sems can gyi khams thams cad rnam par sbyor bar 'gyur ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ste; de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa yin /
analyzed: rgu thams cad la 'char bar 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur ba dang / ci nas kyang yon tan thams cad kyi sems can gyi khams thams cad rnam par sbyor bar 'gyur ba de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo ste; de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzin pa yin /
translated: They dedicate those roots of virtue in order to pervade the entire realm of phenomena with all roots of virtue, in order to become a support for all beings, in order to purify the realms of all beings with all good qualities, and in order to be a holder of the lineage of the buddhas.

original: sems can gyi rigs yongs su smin par byed pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gyi rigs yongs su smin par byed pa yin /
translated: They bring the lineage of beings to maturity.

original: zhing gi rigs rnam par sbyong ba yin; chos kyi rigs 'gal bar mi byed pa yin /
analyzed: zhing gi rigs rnam par sbyong ba yin; chos kyi rigs 'gal bar mi byed pa yin /
translated: They purify the lineage of realms. They do not contradict the lineage of the Dharma.

original: las kyi rigs yongs su shes pa yin /
analyzed: las kyi rigs yongs su shes pa yin /
translated: They understand the lineage of karma.

original: mi gnyis pa'i rigs mnyam par byed pa yin /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa'i rigs mnyam par byed pa yin /
translated: They make the lineage of nonduality equal.

original: phyogs kyi rigs su khyab par 'gro ba yin /
analyzed: phyogs kyi rigs su khyab par 'gro ba yin /
translated: They pervade the lineage of directions.

original: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs la yang dag par rtog pa yin /üîΩshin tu mos pa'i rigs rab tu sgrub pa yin /
analyzed: 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs la yang dag par rtog pa yin / shin tu mos pa'i rigs rab tu sgrub pa yin /
translated: It is the correct understanding of the family of freedom from desire.üîΩIt is the accomplishment of the family of deep interest.

original: dbang po'i rigs shin tu snang bar byed pa yin te /
analyzed: dbang po'i rigs shin tu snang bar byed pa yin te /
translated: It is the illumination of the family of faculties.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: ‚ÄúO sons of the Victorious Ones,

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bzhi pa ste /
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba bzhi pa ste /
translated: this is the fourth dedication of the bodhisattva great beings,

original: thams cad du rjes su song ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad du rjes su song ba zhes bya'o //
translated: called ‚Äòall-pervading.‚Äô

original: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo bar byed de /
analyzed: de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su bsngo bar byed de /
translated: Abiding in this, the bodhisattva great beings dedicate all their roots of virtue.

original: de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas 'jig rten @209b gyi khams thams cad du yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i lus kyi las rab tu thob bo //
analyzed: de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas 'jig rten @209b gyi khams thams cad du yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i lus kyi las rab tu thob bo //
translated: Through this dedication, they attain physical actions that are all-pervading, in order to demonstrate in all world systems.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rnam par bstan pa bsgribs pa med pa'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i ngag gi las rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rnam par bstan pa bsgribs pa med pa'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i ngag gi las rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: He attains the action of speech that goes everywhere, because he displays himself in all buddha-fields without obstruction.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan cing gzung ba'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i yid kyi las rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan cing gzung ba'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i yid kyi las rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: He attains the action of mind that goes everywhere, because he teaches and holds all the Buddha teachings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: He attains the magical power and miracles that go everywhere, because he follows all sentient beings.

original: chos thams cad la yang dag par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i chos khong du chud pa rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: chos thams cad la yang dag par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i chos khong du chud pa rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: He attains the understanding of the Dharma that goes everywhere, because he penetrates all dharmas.

original: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i gzungs dang spobs pa thob par bya ba rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa tshim par bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i gzungs dang spobs pa thob par bya ba rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: He attains the retention and eloquence that go everywhere, because he satisfies the thoughts of all sentient beings.

original: spu'i sbubs gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gzung bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: spu'i sbubs gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gzung bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain the ability to enter the all-pervading realm of phenomena in order to hold all world systems in a single pore.

original: sems can gcig gi lus su sems can thams cad kyi lus yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i lus la 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: sems can gcig gi lus su sems can thams cad kyi lus yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i lus la 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain the ability to enter all bodies in order to bring the bodies of all sentient beings into a single sentient being‚Äôs body.

original: bskal pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba la 'jug pa'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa rab tu 'thob @210a *//
analyzed: bskal pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba la 'jug pa'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa rab tu 'thob @210a *//
translated: They attain the ability to enter all kalpas in order to enter into the experience of never being separated from the sight of the tathƒÅgatas throughout all kalpas.

original: po; ;skad cig gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba thams cad mngon sum du bstan pa'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i skad cig la 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: po; ;skad cig gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba thams cad mngon sum du bstan pa'i phyir thams cad du rjes su song ba'i skad cig la 'jug pa rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They attain the ability to enter all moments in order to manifest the appearance of all tathƒÅgatas in a single moment.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
translated: Then the bodhisattva Vajra¬≠dhvaja, through the blessing of the Buddha, looked in the ten directionsüîΩand recited these verses:

original: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
analyzed: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
translated: Then the bodhisattva Vajra¬≠dhvaja, through the blessing of the Buddha, looked into the ten directions and at that time spoke these verses:

original: 'jig rten mtha' dang dbus med gang la yang //
analyzed: 'jig rten mtha' dang dbus med gang la yang //
translated: ‚ÄúThe worlds have no end or middle;

original: de dag gnas 'cha' gang yang yod pa min //
analyzed: de dag gnas 'cha' gang yang yod pa min //
translated: they have no place to which they belong.

original: sems can phan pa'i don las phyir mi ldog /
analyzed: sems can phan pa'i don las phyir mi ldog /
translated: They do not turn back from the benefit of beings;

original: mi rab de dag ye shes 'di 'dra'o //üîΩzhing rnams la yang gnas par mi byed de //
analyzed: mi rab de dag ye shes 'di 'dra'o // zhing rnams la yang gnas par mi byed de //
translated: such is the knowledge of those supreme people.üîΩ‚ÄúThey do not dwell in the buddha-fields;

original: phyogs rnams la yang de dag gnas mi 'cha'//
analyzed: phyogs rnams la yang de dag gnas mi 'cha'//
translated: they do not dwell in the directions.

original: tshe dang chos kyis rlom sems mi byed de //
analyzed: tshe dang chos kyis rlom sems mi byed de //
translated: They do not pride themselves on life or on the Dharma;

original: 'jig rten dag la rnam par rtog mi byed //
analyzed: 'jig rten dag la rnam par rtog mi byed //
translated: they do not conceptualize the worlds.

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na ci yod pa'i //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag na ci yod pa'i //
translated: ‚ÄúWhatever there is in the worlds of the ten directions,

original: 'gro ba de dag ma lus kun bsdus shing //
analyzed: 'gro ba de dag ma lus kun bsdus shing //
translated: all the beings without exception,

original: dngos po dngos med chos la dbang bsgyur 'jug /
analyzed: dngos po dngos med chos la dbang bsgyur 'jug /
translated: they gather together and enter into the power over things and nonthings;

original: de dag thams cad ma lus dus su bsngo //
analyzed: de dag thams cad ma lus dus su bsngo //
translated: they dedicate it all without exception at the appropriate time.

original: 'dus byas 'dus ma byas kyi chos blangs shing //
analyzed: 'dus byas 'dus ma byas kyi chos blangs shing //
translated: They take up conditioned and unconditioned phenomena,

original: 'jig rten 'di la rnam par rtog mi byed //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'di la rnam par rtog mi byed //
translated: And do not conceptualize this world.

original: ji ltar 'jig rten de bzhin chos rnams te //
analyzed: ji ltar 'jig rten de bzhin chos rnams te //
translated: The world is just as phenomena are,

original: de ltar 'jig rten sgron ma rnam par dag /
analyzed: de ltar 'jig rten sgron ma rnam par dag /
translated: And so the world-illuminations are pure.

original: ji snyed las rnams yang dag rtsom pa gang //
analyzed: ji snyed las rnams yang dag rtsom pa gang //
translated: Whatever actions are undertaken,

original: rab dang 'bring dang de bzhin tha ma rnams //
analyzed: rab dang 'bring dang de bzhin tha ma rnams //
translated: Whether superior, middling, or lesser,

original: de dag phyogs bcu'i @210b 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams //
analyzed: de dag phyogs bcu'i @210b 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams //
translated: All of them the knowers of the worlds in the ten directions,

original: ji snyed bzhugs la yongs su bsngo ba byed //
analyzed: ji snyed bzhugs la yongs su bsngo ba byed //
translated: However many there are, are dedicated to.

original: de dag yongs su bsngo ba'i mthar phyin pa //
analyzed: de dag yongs su bsngo ba'i mthar phyin pa //
translated: Having perfected this dedication,

original: sangs rgyas mchog rjes bslab bya bslab pa rnams //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mchog rjes bslab bya bslab pa rnams //
translated: They train in the trainings of the supreme buddhas.

original: ye shes dam pa rjes su sems byed cing //
analyzed: ye shes dam pa rjes su sems byed cing //
translated: They contemplate the highest wisdom

original: mi yi dam pa'i chos rnams rab tu 'thob //
analyzed: mi yi dam pa'i chos rnams rab tu 'thob //
translated: And attain the supreme Dharma of humans.

original: sems can phan pa'i don du rtag zhugs shing //
analyzed: sems can phan pa'i don du rtag zhugs shing //
translated: Always engaged in benefiting beings,

original: 'gro ba kun tu 'jig rten sgron ma bzhin //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun tu 'jig rten sgron ma bzhin //
translated: Like world-illuminations for all beings,

original: phyogs rnams kun tu ma lus gyur cig ces //
analyzed: phyogs rnams kun tu ma lus gyur cig ces //
translated: ‚ÄúMay this pervade all directions without exception!‚Äù

original: dge ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba byed //
analyzed: dge ba de dag yongs su bsngo ba byed //
translated: They dedicate those virtues.

original: de dag sems can rnam par rtog mi byed //
analyzed: de dag sems can rnam par rtog mi byed //
translated: They do not conceptualize sentient beings.

original: chos la'ang rnam par rtog par mi byed de //
analyzed: chos la'ang rnam par rtog par mi byed de //
translated: They do not conceptualize phenomena.

original: 'jig rten gyis kyang rlom sems med pa yin //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyis kyang rlom sems med pa yin //
translated: They are not conceited about the world.

original: 'gro ba kun nas phyir yang mi log go /
analyzed: 'gro ba kun nas phyir yang mi log go /
translated: They do not turn away from any being.

original: brtan pa de dag zhi rab rtag tu zhi //
analyzed: brtan pa de dag zhi rab rtag tu zhi //
translated: Those steadfast ones are always peaceful and calm.

original: de dag mya ngan 'das pa'i spyod yul thob //
analyzed: de dag mya ngan 'das pa'i spyod yul thob //
translated: They have attained the sphere of nirvƒÅ·πáa.

original: sems can rgyud na'ang mi spyod ma yin te //
analyzed: sems can rgyud na'ang mi spyod ma yin te //
translated: They do not engage in the mindstreams of sentient beings.

original: 'di 'dra'i ye shes dam pa khong du chud //
analyzed: 'di 'dra'i ye shes dam pa khong du chud //
translated: They have realized such sublime wisdom.

original: de dag nam yang rtog dang rnam rtog med //
analyzed: de dag nam yang rtog dang rnam rtog med //
translated: They are never conceptual or discursive.

original: rnam par smin la'ang de dag gnas mi 'cha'//
analyzed: rnam par smin la'ang de dag gnas mi 'cha'//
translated: They do not dwell in karmic ripening.üîΩThey do not view all worlds and their causes

original: 'jig rten thams cad rgyu dang bcas pas na; ;chos rnams rgyud med par yang lta ma yin //
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad rgyu dang bcas pas na; ;chos rnams rgyud med par yang lta ma yin //
translated: As being without a continuum of phenomena.

original: de dag spyod yul 'di 'dra thob pa ste //
analyzed: de dag spyod yul 'di 'dra thob pa ste //
translated: They have attained such a sphere

original: de la rtog dang rnam par rtog pa med //
analyzed: de la rtog dang rnam par rtog pa med //
translated: In which there is no conceptualization or discursiveness.

original: blo mchog de dag 'gro kun kha lo sgyur //
analyzed: blo mchog de dag 'gro kun kha lo sgyur //
translated: Those with supreme intelligence guide all beings

original: ye shes tshul la mkhas pas yongs su bsngo //
analyzed: ye shes tshul la mkhas pas yongs su bsngo //
translated: And dedicate with skill in the way of wisdom.

original: thams cad du rjes su song ba zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: thams cad du rjes su song ba zhes bya ba ste /
translated: It is called ‚Äúpervading all.‚Äù

original: yongs su bsngo ba bzhi pa'o //üîΩbam po sum cu rtsa bzhi pa /üîΩkye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba bzhi pa'o // bam po sum cu rtsa bzhi pa / kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: This is the fourth dedication.

original: byang chub sems @211a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems @211a *//
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba lnga pa bsod nams mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba lnga pa bsod nams mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: what is the bodhisattvas‚Äô fifth dedication, called ‚Äúthe inexhaustible treasure of merit‚Äù?

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O children of the Victorious Ones,

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa'i las thams cad las bag yangs su bya ba'i phyir bshags pa dang 'brel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'am /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa'i las thams cad las bag yangs su bya ba'i phyir bshags pa dang 'brel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'am /
translated: in this case, bodhisattva great beings, in order to be free from all obscuring actions, may connect the roots of virtue with confession, or

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ba dang 'brel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'am /üîΩ'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nan tan du byas pas phyag bya ba dang 'brel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'am /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la rjes su yi rang bas rjes su yi rang ba dang 'brel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'am / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nan tan du byas pas phyag bya ba dang 'brel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'am /
translated: the roots of virtue of all the Buddhas of the past, present, and future, and of all sentient beings of the past, present, and future, by rejoicing in them;üîΩthe roots of virtue of paying homage to all the Tathagatas of the past, present, and future, by paying homage to them;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brtson pas sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang 'brel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brtson pas sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang 'brel ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'am /
translated: the roots of virtue of making requests to all the Buddhas, by making requests to them for the sake of all Buddha qualities;

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa gang la byang chub sems dpa' brtson par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byams klas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag la yang dag par 'jug par byed pa 'am
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa gang la byang chub sems dpa' brtson par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'byams klas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag la yang dag par 'jug par byed pa 'am
translated: They are the inexhaustible roots of virtue of the blessed buddhas of the past, present, and future, and they are the roots of virtue of the infinite and inconceivable bodhisattvas who are dedicated to diligence.

original: / gang yang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan @211b 'das mngon par byang chub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang bar byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la gnas par byed pa'am /
analyzed: / gang yang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan @211b 'das mngon par byang chub pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la rjes su yi rang bar byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la gnas par byed pa'am /
translated: They are the roots of virtue of the blessed buddhas of the past, present, and future, and they are the roots of virtue of those who rejoice in the roots of virtue of the buddhas of the past, present, and future.

original: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sems can mtha' dang / dbus med pa dul bar gyur pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas khong du chud par byed pa'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas sems can mtha' dang / dbus med pa dul bar gyur pa de dag la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas khong du chud par byed pa'am /
translated: They rejoice in the taming of the infinite number of sentient beings by the Dharma wheels turned by the Buddhas, the Transcendent Conquerors, of the past, present and future.

original: gang yang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yang dag par byung bar gyur pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar gyur pa dang /
analyzed: gang yang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang po thugs bskyed pa nas bzung ste byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yang dag par byung bar gyur pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang rgya bar gyur pa dang /
translated: They rejoice in the Buddhas, the Transcendent Conquerors, of the past, present and future, from the time they first gave rise to bodhichitta until they fully attained the conduct of the bodhisattvas and awakened to unsurpassable, perfect and complete buddhahood.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par bstan pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i ye shes kyi byin rlabs kyi rjes su yi rang ba'am /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par bstan pa'i bar gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i ye shes kyi byin rlabs kyi rjes su yi rang ba'am /
translated: It is to rejoice in the blessings of the wisdom of all the buddhas, who are of a single continuum, in all those roots of virtue, up to and including the teaching of nirvana.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa yang dag par bzung ba nas nye bar bzung ste chos thams cad kyi mthar thug gi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ba'am /üîΩsangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i bsam pa 'byams klas pa brjod du med pa dang / rang gi dmigs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang brtsams pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @212a *//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i bstan pa yang dag par bzung ba nas nye bar bzung ste chos thams cad kyi mthar thug gi bar du dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur ba'am / sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i bsam pa 'byams klas pa brjod du med pa dang / rang gi dmigs pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba gang brtsams pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang @212a *//
translated: It is to take up the teachings of those tathagatas who have passed into parinirvana, and to accomplish all those roots of virtue, up to and including the ultimate of all phenomena.

original: chub tu bsgribs pa med par dmigs pas mthar phyin par byed pa yang rung ste /
analyzed: chub tu bsgribs pa med par dmigs pas mthar phyin par byed pa yang rung ste /
translated: It is to have an infinite, inexpressible intention focused on the buddhas, and to bring to completion whatever roots of virtue one has begun, focused on oneself, by means of an unobstructed focus on unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par phye ba tshad med cing 'byams klas pa /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par phye ba tshad med cing 'byams klas pa /
translated: ‚ÄúThey dedicate all those roots of virtue, which are immeasurable and limitless,

original: dmigs pa rgya chen po grangs med pas bsags pa de dag thams cad 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /üîΩdge ba'i rtsa ba gang yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / gang mos par byas pa dang / gang rjes su yi rang ba dang / gang yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang / gang yongs su grub par byas pa dang / gang spyad pa dang /
analyzed: dmigs pa rgya chen po grangs med pas bsags pa de dag thams cad 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / gang mos par byas pa dang / gang rjes su yi rang ba dang / gang yongs su rdzogs par byas pa dang / gang yongs su grub par byas pa dang / gang spyad pa dang /
translated: which are accumulated through countless vast objects, in the following way:üîΩ‚ÄòWhatever roots of virtue I have accomplished, whatever I have aspired to, whatever I have rejoiced in, whatever I have perfected, whatever I have accomplished, whatever I have practiced,

original: gang thob par byas pa dang / gang sems pa dang / gang rtsom pa dang / gang mthu dang ldan par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis gang ji snyed du sngon gyi 'das pa'i dus thams cad 'byams klas pa'i dus la 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: gang thob par byas pa dang / gang sems pa dang / gang rtsom pa dang / gang mthu dang ldan par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis gang ji snyed du sngon gyi 'das pa'i dus thams cad 'byams klas pa'i dus la 'jug pa dang /
translated: whatever I have attained, whatever I have thought, whatever I have undertaken, whatever I have empowered with roots of virtue, by those roots of virtue, in all the infinite past times that have elapsed,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu bstan pa grangs las 'das pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan byung ba dang / gang ji snyed du de bzhin nyid kyi go skabs thams cad kyi sngon gyi mu'i bskal pa'i mthar gyur pas mtshams med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs mtha' yas pa dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams shin tu bstan pa grangs las 'das pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan byung ba dang / gang ji snyed du de bzhin nyid kyi go skabs thams cad kyi sngon gyi mu'i bskal pa'i mthar gyur pas mtshams med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs mtha' yas pa dang /
translated: the infinite buddha families that appeared at the end of the eon of the past limit of all the opportunities of suchness,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyis thugs su chud pa byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas rnam par shes pa; byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyis yang dag par bzung ba dag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su dag pa byung ba dang /üîΩgang yang las dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu 'am /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyis thugs su chud pa byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pas rnam par shes pa; byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyis yang dag par bzung ba dag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su dag pa byung ba dang / gang yang las dang rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu 'am /
translated: the pure adornments of the buddha realms that appeared in the understanding of the wisdom of all the tathƒÅgatas, the knowledge of the bodhisattvas, and the minds of the bodhisattvas,üîΩthe results that were in accord with the causes of actions,

original: gang @212b yang spyod pa las yang dag par byung ba'am /
analyzed: gang @212b yang spyod pa las yang dag par byung ba'am /
translated: the results that arose from conduct,

original: gang yang sems can bsgral bar bya ba'i tshogs rnam par bstan pa'am /
analyzed: gang yang sems can bsgral bar bya ba'i tshogs rnam par bstan pa'am /
translated: the displays of the assemblies of beings to be liberated,

original: gang yang shin tu mos pa rnam par dag pa'am /
analyzed: gang yang shin tu mos pa rnam par dag pa'am /
translated: the pure, intense interest of those who are to be guided;

original: gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis shes par bya ba'am /
analyzed: gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis shes par bya ba'am /
translated: the knowledge that comes from the blessings of the tathagatas;

original: gang yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'am /
analyzed: gang yang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par bstan pa'am /
translated: the teachings on the miracles of the buddhas;

original: gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams su rnam par rig pa'am /
analyzed: gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams su rnam par rig pa'am /
translated: the awareness of the bodhisattva levels;

original: gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las 'jig rten las 'das pas byung ba'am /
analyzed: gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las 'jig rten las 'das pas byung ba'am /
translated: the transcendent activity of the tathagatas;

original: gang yang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa 'byams klas pas byung ba'am /
analyzed: gang yang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa 'byams klas pas byung ba'am /
translated: the boundless conduct of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra;

original: gang yang mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis byung ba'am /
analyzed: gang yang mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis byung ba'am /
translated: the blessings of all the tathagatas who are to attain manifest enlightenment;üîΩthe continuous attainment of manifest enlightenment throughout the whole of future time;

original: phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rgyun chad pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul thams cad shin tu bstan pa /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rgyun chad pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshul thams cad shin tu bstan pa /
translated: the way of all world systems;

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: the realm of space;

original: chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa /
translated: it extends to the end of the realm of phenomena;

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'byams klas pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'byams klas pa /
translated: it is infinite throughout all world systems;

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus mtha' yas pa'i rigs su shin tu bstan pa /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus mtha' yas pa'i rigs su shin tu bstan pa /
translated: it is taught in the infinite future;

original: ma 'ongs pa'i lam gyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa grangs med par brjod pa /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i lam gyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa grangs med par brjod pa /
translated: it is described in the infinite different continuums of the future path;

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus rgyun 'chad pa med cing /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus rgyun 'chad pa med cing /
translated: it is uninterrupted in the future;

original: sa mtshams kyi mtha' med pa /
analyzed: sa mtshams kyi mtha' med pa /
translated: it is limitless in terms of its boundaries;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pas thugs su chud pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pas thugs su chud pa /
translated: it is realized through the accomplishment of the wisdom of the tathƒÅgatas;üîΩit is uninterrupted in the moments of the future;üîΩit is the domain of the tathƒÅgatas;üîΩit is the domain of the buddhas;üîΩit is the domain of the bodhisattvas;

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi skad cig rgyun 'chad pa med pa /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi skad cig rgyun 'chad pa med pa /
translated: it is the domain of the noble ≈õrƒÅvakas;üîΩit is the domain of the noble pratyekabuddhas;üîΩit is the domain of all beings;üîΩit is the domain of the past, future, and present;üîΩit is the domain of the tathƒÅgatas;üîΩit is the domain of the buddhas;üîΩit is the domain of the bodhisattvas;üîΩit is the domain of the noble ≈õrƒÅvakas;üîΩit is the domain of the noble pratyekabuddhas;üîΩit is the domain of all beings;üîΩit is the domain of the past, future, and present;üîΩit is the domain of the tathƒÅgatas;üîΩit is the domain of the buddhas;üîΩit is the domain of the bodhisattvas;üîΩit is the domain of the noble ≈õrƒÅvakas;üîΩit is the domain of the noble pratyekabuddhas;üîΩit is the domain of all beings;üîΩit is the domain of the past, future, and present;üîΩit is the domain of the tathƒÅgatas;üîΩit is the domain of the buddhas;üîΩit is the domain of the bodhisattvas;üîΩit is the domain of the noble ≈õrƒÅvakas;üîΩit is the domain of the noble pratyekabuddhas;üîΩit is the domain of all beings;üîΩit is the domain of the past, future, and present;üîΩit is the domain of the tathƒÅgatas;üîΩit is the domain of the buddhas;

original: chos kyi @213a *//
analyzed: chos kyi @213a *//
translated: it is the domain of the bodhisattvas;üîΩit is the domain of the noble ≈õrƒÅvakas;üîΩit is the domain of the noble pratyekabuddhas;üîΩit is the domain of all beings;

original: dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad mtha' yas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyis mngon par 'tshang rgya ba tshad med par gyur pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus sa mtshams med cing ris su mi chod pa dag tu ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab par gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang /üîΩrgyan yongs su dag pa rin po che'i rgyan rnam par bres pa du ma dang / spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa thams cad dang / me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi char rab tu 'bab pa /
analyzed: dbyings dang / 'jig rten gyi khams dang / bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad mtha' yas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyis mngon par 'tshang rgya ba tshad med par gyur pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus sa mtshams med cing ris su mi chod pa dag tu ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab par gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang / rgyan yongs su dag pa rin po che'i rgyan rnam par bres pa du ma dang / spos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa thams cad dang / me tog thams cad kyi rgyan gyi char rab tu 'bab pa /
translated: the infinite realms of the world systems and the succession of kalpas, the infinite buddhahoods attained by the power of the tathagatas, and the future, which is without limit or division, and the tathagatas, arhats, and perfectly enlightened buddhas who have not yet come, who pervade the entire dharmadhatu, and the qualities and ornaments of their buddha realms,üîΩwhich are adorned with many precious ornaments, endowed with the pleasant ornaments of incense, and rained upon by the ornaments of all flowers,

original: na bza' thams cad kyi rgyan gyi sprin sna tshogs yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: na bza' thams cad kyi rgyan gyi sprin sna tshogs yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: and the various clouds of ornaments of all kinds of clothing, adorned with all good qualities,

original: rnam pa tha dad pa'i mdzod de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par bres pa /
analyzed: rnam pa tha dad pa'i mdzod de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyan gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis rnam par bres pa /
translated: It was a treasury of different forms, a display of the blessings of the adornments of the tathagatas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan rab tu brgyan par bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa brjod du med pas rab tu brgyan cing grub pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan rab tu brgyan par bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad pa brjod du med pas rab tu brgyan cing grub pa /
translated: It was an adornment that was an array of the adornments of all buddha realms, with various different kinds of adornments that were beyond description.

original: grogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag pas yongs su bsgrubs pa /üîΩde bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan gyis rnam par dag pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang yang ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa @213b thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa /
analyzed: grogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag pas yongs su bsgrubs pa / de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan gyis rnam par dag pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang yang ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa @213b thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa /
translated: It was an accomplishment that was purified by inconceivable companions.üîΩIt was the arising of the adornments of the blessings of the tathagatas‚Äô enlightenment.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i mig 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pas rnam par mthong ba /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i mig 'jig rten las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pas rnam par mthong ba /
translated: It was the purification of the completely pure buddha realms of all the tathagatas of the future that were seen by the extraordinary, supramundane eyes of the bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu myong bar 'gyur ba /üîΩchos thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur khong du chud pa /

analyzed: spos thams cad kyis brgyan pa / phreng ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: He is the one who is adorned with all incenses.üîΩHe is the one who is adorned with all garlands.

original: phye ma thams cad kyis brgyan pa /üîΩrin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: phye ma thams cad kyis brgyan pa / rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: He is the one who is adorned with all powders.üîΩHe is the one who is adorned with all jewels.

original: na bza' thams cad kyis brgyan pa /üîΩrgyal mtshan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: na bza' thams cad kyis brgyan pa / rgyal mtshan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
translated: He is the one who is adorned with all garments.üîΩHe is the one who is adorned with all victory banners.

original: ba dan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /üîΩrin po che sna tshogs kyi snam bu kun tu bting bas brgyan pa /
analyzed: ba dan thams cad kyis brgyan pa / rin po che sna tshogs kyi snam bu kun tu bting bas brgyan pa /
translated: He is the one who is adorned with all flags.üîΩHe is the one who is adorned with the spread of all precious cloths.

original: rin po che thams cad kyi stegs bus brgyan pa /üîΩgser gyi dra ba grangs med pas kun tu yog par brgyan pa /üîΩchu klung grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: rin po che thams cad kyi stegs bus brgyan pa / gser gyi dra ba grangs med pas kun tu yog par brgyan pa / chu klung grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: He is the one who is adorned with the platforms of all jewels.üîΩHe is the one who is adorned with the covering of countless nets of gold.üîΩHe is the one who is adorned with the adornments of countless rivers.

original: grangs med pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa /
analyzed: grangs med pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa /
translated: He is the one who is adorned with the rain falling from countless clouds.

original: rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba'i tshogs grangs med pas yid du 'ong ba /
analyzed: rol mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba'i tshogs grangs med pas yid du 'ong ba /
translated: countless assemblies of delightful music,

original: rnam par dag pa de dag dang / de bzhin du ma lus pa thams cad rab tu bzung ste /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa de dag dang / de bzhin du ma lus pa thams cad rab tu bzung ste /
translated: and likewise, all without exception,üîΩall the qualities and pure adornments of the buddha realms,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang / rgyan yongs su dag pa gang ji snyed pa gang dang gang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rab tu mkhyen pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan dang / rgyan yongs su dag pa gang ji snyed pa gang dang gang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rab tu mkhyen pa /
translated: as known by all the buddhas,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: throughout the realms of the world, as far as the limits of space,üîΩas far as the limits of the realm of phenomena,

original: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa /
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa /
translated: as far as the limits of the realm of space,üîΩin all the abodes of the realms,üîΩin the infinite directions,

original: zhing gi gnas su gyur pa thams cad phyogs kyi 'khor mtha' yas par shin tu bstan pas phyogs bcur rnam par bkod pa /
analyzed: zhing gi gnas su gyur pa thams cad phyogs kyi 'khor mtha' yas par shin tu bstan pas phyogs bcur rnam par bkod pa /
translated: in the ten directions,üîΩin the infinite world systems,

original: @214b 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dang / las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa /
analyzed: @214b 'jig rten gyi khams 'byams klas pa dang / las rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mngon par 'dus byas pa /
translated: created by various actions,

original: nam mkha'i khams dang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis yongs su bsdus pa /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams dang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis yongs su bsdus pa /
translated: included in the realm of space and all the realms of the world,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs gzhan dang gzhan gyi rjes su song bar rab tu gnas pa la rnam pa tha dad pas shin tu byung ba'i 'jig rten khams brjod du med par shin tu bstan pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams phyogs gzhan dang gzhan gyi rjes su song bar rab tu gnas pa la rnam pa tha dad pas shin tu byung ba'i 'jig rten khams brjod du med par shin tu bstan pa /
translated: It was situated in the world systems of the ten directions, with its different aspects extending to the inconceivable world systems.

original: 'jig rten gyi 'byung gnas nam mkha'i gos gtugs pa zhing gi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa brjod du med pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi 'byung gnas nam mkha'i gos gtugs pa zhing gi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa brjod du med pa /
translated: It was the source of the world systems, with the garments of space covering the different world systems.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyis shin tu bstan pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa'i chos kyis shin tu bstan pa /
translated: It was the teaching of the Dharma of the world systems without end or middle.

original: de ltar ma lus pa thams cad yongs su bzung ste chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan la 'jug pas rgyan rnam par dag pa thams cad dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de ltar ma lus pa thams cad yongs su bzung ste chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan la 'jug pas rgyan rnam par dag pa thams cad dang ldan pa /
translated: In this way, it was completely taken up, with all the adornments of the buddha realms of the entire realm of phenomena.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad ji skad du bshad pa dang / ji skad du bstan pa dang / ji skad du brjod pa dang / ji skad du gsal bar byas pa dang / ji skad du smos pa dang / ji skad du smras pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad ji skad du bshad pa dang / ji skad du bstan pa dang / ji skad du brjod pa dang / ji skad du gsal bar byas pa dang / ji skad du smos pa dang / ji skad du smras pa dang /
translated: He will know all the completely pure buddha realms, just as they are explained, just as they are taught, just as they are described, just as they are clarified, just as they are mentioned, just as they are spoken of,

original: ji skad du bslab pa dang / ji skad du dkrol ba dang / ji lta bur btags pa dang / ji lta bur rnam par bkod pa de dang de dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa skyes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang /
analyzed: ji skad du bslab pa dang / ji skad du dkrol ba dang / ji lta bur btags pa dang / ji lta bur rnam par bkod pa de dang de dag tu de bzhin gshegs pa skyes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang /
translated: just as they are trained in, just as they are revealed, just as they are designated, and just as they are arranged. He will know the adornments of the buddha realms in which the tathƒÅgatas are born, the purity of the buddha realms,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dge ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bdag nyid che ba dang / sangs rgyas @215a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dge ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bdag nyid che ba dang / sangs rgyas @215a *//
translated: the sameness of the buddha realms, the wholesomeness of the buddha realms, the greatness of the buddha realms, the buddha realms that are to be purified,üîΩand the buddha realms that are to be purified by means.

original: kyi zhing yangs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde bar bskyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing zil gyis mi non pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing zad mi shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu che ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'phrog pa dang /üîΩsangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od gsal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yid du 'od ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu snang ba dang /
analyzed: kyi zhing yangs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bde bar bskyang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing zil gyis mi non pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing zad mi shes pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu che ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'phrog pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od gsal ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yid du 'od ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu snang ba dang /
translated: the buddhafield of vastness, the buddhafield of bliss, the buddhafield of invincibility, the buddhafield of inexhaustibility, the buddhafield of greatness, the buddhafield of non-stealing,üîΩthe buddhafield of fearlessness, the buddhafield of luminosity, the buddhafield of delight, the buddhafield of non-disputation, the buddhafield of universal illumination,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu snang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mchog dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu snang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu brgyan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rnam par phye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mchog dang /
translated: the buddhafield of complete illumination, the buddhafield of ornamentation, the buddhafield of excellent ornamentation, the buddhafield of perfect division, the buddhafield of supremacy,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gtso bo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gya nom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rmad du byung ba dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gtso bo dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phul dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing dam pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gya nom pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rmad du byung ba dang /
translated: the principal buddha field, the excellent buddha field, the supreme buddha field, the holy buddha field, the sublime buddha field, the marvelous buddha field,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dra ba med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dang / de ltar yongs su bzung ste 'das pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mnyam pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dra ba med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa dang / de ltar yongs su bzung ste 'das pa dang /
translated: the unsurpassed buddha field, the unequaled buddha field, the incomparable buddha field, the infinite buddha field, and so on.

original: ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rnam par dag pa gang ji snyed pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis @215b 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag par gyur cig /
analyzed: ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan rnam par dag pa gang ji snyed pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis @215b 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag par gyur cig /
translated: Having thus taken hold of all the past, future, and present buddhas‚Äô pure adornments of buddha fields, with this root of virtue may all world systems be completely pure.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'di lta bu'i rnam par dag pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'di lta bu'i rnam par dag pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all buddha-fields be endowed with such purity.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan ji snyed pa de dag thams cad yang dag par gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan ji snyed pa de dag thams cad yang dag par gnas par gyur cig /
translated: May all the adornments of the buddha-fields of all the buddhas of the past, present, and future be present in each world-system.

original: grub par gyur cig /üîΩrnam par dag par gyur cig /
analyzed: grub par gyur cig / rnam par dag par gyur cig /
translated: May they be accomplished.üîΩMay they be purified.

original: yongs su dag par gyur cig /üîΩyang dag par grub par gyur cig /
analyzed: yongs su dag par gyur cig / yang dag par grub par gyur cig /
translated: May they be completely purified.üîΩMay they be perfectly accomplished.

original: rab tu byung bar gyur cig /üîΩrab tu brgyan par gyur cig /
analyzed: rab tu byung bar gyur cig / rab tu brgyan par gyur cig /
translated: May they be fully ordained.üîΩMay they be fully adorned.

original: kun tu brgyan par gyur cig /
analyzed: kun tu brgyan par gyur cig /
translated: May they be completely adorned.

original: byang chub par gyur cig /
analyzed: byang chub par gyur cig /
translated: May they be fully enlightened.

original: byin gyis brlabs par gyur cig /
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs par gyur cig /
translated: May they be blessed.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu ji lta bde bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang ma lus par yongs su bzung ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu ji lta bde bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du yang ma lus par yongs su bzung ste /
translated: Just as in one world-system, may they be present in all world-systems without exception.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: The buddhafields are as limitless as the realm of phenomena.

original: nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa thams cad ma lus par de snyed kyi rgyan gyis yongs su brgyan par gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa thams cad ma lus par de snyed kyi rgyan gyis yongs su brgyan par gnas par gyur cig /
translated: May all buddha realms be adorned with as many adornments as there are in the realm of phenomena,üîΩreaching the ends of space.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par dus gsum thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bdag nyid che ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta na mi ngom pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par dus gsum thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bdag nyid che ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta na mi ngom pa dang /
translated: May all buddha realms be adorned with the qualities of the buddha realms of the three times, with the ornaments of the buddha realms, with the greatness of the buddha realms, with the beauty of the buddha realms,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa dang / @216a *//
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa dang / @216a *//
translated: with the immeasurability of the buddha realms, with the purity of the buddha realms, with the numberlessness of the buddha realms,üîΩwith the infinitude of the buddha realms, and with the inconceivable qualities of the buddha realms.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtshungs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa ji snyed pa de dag gi rgyan gyis rnam par dag par gyur cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtshungs pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa ji snyed pa de dag gi rgyan gyis rnam par dag par gyur cig /
translated: May they be purified by the adornments of as many buddha realms as there are in the inconceivable, incomparable, and infinite buddha realms.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su 'jug pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rdzogs pa rjes su 'jug pa /
translated: May all those buddha realms be filled with bodhisattvas who have reached perfection,

original: 'jig rten gyi khams la rab tu 'jug pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams la rab tu 'jug pa /
translated: who have entered the world systems,

original: kun tu spyod pa mang ba /
analyzed: kun tu spyod pa mang ba /
translated: who have engaged in many activities,

original: sems can gyi khams rtogs par bya ba khong du chud pa /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams rtogs par bya ba khong du chud pa /
translated: who have realized the realm of sentient beings,

original: chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa rab tu rtogs pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa rab tu rtogs pa /
