translated: who have realized the entry into the realm of phenomena,üîΩwho are unconfused about entering the realm of space,

original: nam mkha'i dbyings la 'jug pa rmongs pa med pa; sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings la 'jug pa rmongs pa med pa; sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa /
translated: who have attained the recollection of the Buddha,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rjes su dran pa'i tshul can /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rjes su dran pa'i tshul can /
translated: who have the way of recollecting the inconceivable Dharma,

original: tshad med pa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
translated: who have engaged in the recollection of the immeasurable Sa·πÖgha,

original: gtong ba la shin tu mos pa /
analyzed: gtong ba la shin tu mos pa /
translated: and who are devoted to generosity.

original: gtong ba'i rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: gtong ba'i rjes su dran pa rab tu thob pa /
translated: who have attained the mindfulness that follows after giving,

original: ye shes kyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'i chos kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can /
analyzed: ye shes kyi 'od zer dang ldan pa'i chos kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor can /
translated: who are the ma·πá·∏çala of the sun of the Dharma, endowed with the light rays of wisdom,

original: chags pa med par lta ba /
analyzed: chags pa med par lta ba /
translated: who have an unattached view,

original: dmigs su med pa las rab tu byung ba /
analyzed: dmigs su med pa las rab tu byung ba /
translated: who have arisen from the unobservable,

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gnas su gyur pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gnas su gyur pa /
translated: who are the abode of the buddhadharmas,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba dam pas thog mar 'gro ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu byung ba /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba dam pas thog mar 'gro ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu byung ba /
translated: who are preceded by the highest roots of virtue, who have arisen through the power of the roots of virtue for the enlightenment of the buddhas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rjes su song ba /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi rjes su song ba /
translated: who have followed the strength of the tathƒÅgatas,

original: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yul gyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi yul gyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa /
translated: who radiate the light rays of the domain of omniscience,

original: bdud kyi las thams cad rnam par sbyangs @216b pa; sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi rang bzhin khong du chud pa /
analyzed: bdud kyi las thams cad rnam par sbyangs @216b pa; sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi rang bzhin khong du chud pa /
translated: who have purified all the works of MƒÅra, who have understood the nature of all the realms of sentient beings,

original: phyin ci log med pas yang dag par byung ba /
analyzed: phyin ci log med pas yang dag par byung ba /
translated: who have arisen without error,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / smon lam la gti mug med pa sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur cig /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / smon lam la gti mug med pa sha stag gis yongs su gang bar gyur cig /
translated: who are filled with those who are without delusion regarding the roots of virtue and prayers.

original: byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i tshul can /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' de lta bu'i tshul can /
translated: ‚ÄúBodhisattvas who have that kind of conduct,

original: de lta bu'i spyod pa la zhugs pa /
analyzed: de lta bu'i spyod pa la zhugs pa /
translated: who have that kind of practice,

original: de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: de lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa /
translated: who have that kind of qualities,üîΩwho have incomparable roots of merit,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs pa med pa can; rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las la gzhol ba /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba mtshungs pa med pa can; rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las la gzhol ba /
translated: who are always dedicated to the activity of the buddhas,

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub snang ba rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub snang ba rab tu thob pa /
translated: who have attained the illumination of the enlightenment of the buddhas,

original: mun pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang ldan pa /
analyzed: mun pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes dang ldan pa /
translated: who have the wisdom of the realm of phenomena that is free of darkness,

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad lus gcig gis khyab par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yang dag pa ston pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad lus gcig gis khyab par byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yang dag pa ston pa /
translated: who demonstrate the great miraculous power of pervading the entire realm of phenomena with a single body,

original: ye shes chen po khong du chud pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa /
analyzed: ye shes chen po khong du chud pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa /
translated: who have the domain of omniscience through having realized great wisdom,

original: chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pa /
translated: who are skilled in the accomplishment of the analysis of the words of the infinite realm of phenomena,

original: zhing thams cad kyi rjes su song ba /
analyzed: zhing thams cad kyi rjes su song ba /
translated: who have gone to all realms,

original: gnas med par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na gnas pa; nam mkha'i dbyings su mos pas mi gnas pa'i yid dang ldan pa /
analyzed: gnas med par sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na gnas pa; nam mkha'i dbyings su mos pas mi gnas pa'i yid dang ldan pa /
translated: they were without a location, dwelling in all buddha realms; they had minds that did not dwell in the realm of space;

original: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par phye ba'i bsam pa can /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par phye ba'i bsam pa can /
translated: they had aspirations that were distinguished in all the realm of phenomena;

original: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mnyam par gzhog pa la mkhas pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mnyam par gzhog pa la mkhas pa /
translated: they were skilled in the samƒÅdhi of bodhisattvas that is inconceivable;

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing la gnas pa /üîΩsangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi @217a *//
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing la gnas pa / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi @217a *//
translated: they dwelt in the field of activity of the omniscient one, the buddha realm;

original: rlabs shes par bya ba la mkhas pa /
analyzed: rlabs shes par bya ba la mkhas pa /
translated: they were skilled in the knowledge of the blessing of all buddhas;

original: chos grangs med pa bstan cing bshad pa la 'jigs pa med pa /
analyzed: chos grangs med pa bstan cing bshad pa la 'jigs pa med pa /
translated: they were fearless in teaching and explaining countless Dharmas;

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rjes su song ba /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rjes su song ba /
translated: they had the virtue of all the buddhas of the past, present, and future;

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa /
translated: they dwelt in the realm of phenomena of all tathƒÅgatas;

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa; sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dbye zhing mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pas grangs med pa'i skad rnam pa tha dad pa shes pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos bstan pa yongs su 'dzin pa; sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dbye zhing mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas pas grangs med pa'i skad rnam pa tha dad pa shes pa /
translated: They uphold the teachings of all the buddhas, and they are skilled in the analysis and accomplishment of inconceivable sounds and the knowledge of innumerable different languages.

original: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i sa khong du chud pa /
analyzed: bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i sa khong du chud pa /
translated: They have realized the level of the unsurpassed miraculous manifestations of the buddhas.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing chags pa med par spyod pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing chags pa med par spyod pa /
translated: They have transcended all world systems and are free from attachment.

original: nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul la chos su rtogs pas gnas pa med pa /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi tshul la chos su rtogs pas gnas pa med pa /
translated: They are free from afflictions and abide in the realization of the way of the Dharma.

original: sems bskyed pa yangs pa shin tu rnam par bsgoms pa rab tu thob pa /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa yangs pa shin tu rnam par bsgoms pa rab tu thob pa /
translated: They have attained the vast and thoroughly cultivated generation of bodhicitta.

original: ye shes gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyud la mkhas pa /
analyzed: ye shes gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i rgyud la mkhas pa /
translated: They are skilled in the continuity of the transmission of wisdom.

original: don gcig nas gcig tu bstan pa rab tu grub pa de lta bu dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag yongs su brgyan par gyur cig /üîΩyongs su gang bar gyur cig /
analyzed: don gcig nas gcig tu bstan pa rab tu grub pa de lta bu dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag yongs su brgyan par gyur cig /üîΩyongs su gang bar gyur cig /
translated: They have accomplished the teaching of the same meaning again and again. May such beings adorn and fill those world systems.

original: rnam par mdzes par gyur cig /
analyzed: rnam par mdzes par gyur cig /
translated: May they be beautiful.

original: rjes su dong bar gyur cig /
analyzed: rjes su dong bar gyur cig /
translated: May they be followed.

original: kun tu gnas par gyur cig /üîΩbsgoms par gyur cig /üîΩshin tu bsgoms par gyur cig /
analyzed: kun tu gnas par gyur cig / bsgoms par gyur cig / shin tu bsgoms par gyur cig /
translated: May they be fully present.üîΩMay they be cultivated.üîΩMay they be well cultivated.

original: sbyangs par gyur cig /
analyzed: sbyangs par gyur cig /
translated: May they be purified.

original: shin tu sbyangs par gyur cig /
analyzed: shin tu sbyangs par gyur cig /
translated: May they be well purified.

original: zhi bar byas par gyur cig /
analyzed: zhi bar byas par gyur cig /
translated: May they be pacified.

original: sangs rgyas kyi @217b zhing re re'i phyogs re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa /üîΩgrangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi @217b zhing re re'i phyogs re re zhing yang byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa / grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
translated: In each buddha realm, in each direction, may bodhisattvas be limitless,üîΩbeyond number, inconceivable,

original: gzhal du med pa /üîΩmu med pa /
analyzed: gzhal du med pa / mu med pa /
translated: incalculable,üîΩboundless,

original: sa mtshams med pa /
analyzed: sa mtshams med pa /
translated: without limit,

original: dpag tu med pa /
analyzed: dpag tu med pa /
translated: immeasurable,

original: brjod du med pa /
analyzed: brjod du med pa /
translated: inexpressible,

original: brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas yongs su rgyas par gyur cig /
analyzed: brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pas yongs su rgyas par gyur cig /
translated: and beyond inexpressibility.

original: phyogs gcig ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: phyogs gcig ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: Just as in one direction, so in all buddha realms, throughout the whole expanse of reality,

original: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa ma lus pa /
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa ma lus pa /
translated: reaching the end of space,üîΩwithout exception,

original: lus pa med pa /
analyzed: lus pa med pa /
translated: without remainder,

original: lhag ma med pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu'i tshul can gyis yongs su rgyas shing yongs su gang bar gyur cig /
analyzed: lhag ma med pa thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta bu'i tshul can gyis yongs su rgyas shing yongs su gang bar gyur cig /
translated: May all the rest be filled and pervaded by bodhisattvas of such a way of life.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: Thus the bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattva dedicates the roots of virtue.

original: tshul de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / tshul de lta bus 'byung ba thams cad dang / tshul de lta bus sems can gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / tshul de lta bus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub dang /
analyzed: tshul de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang / tshul de lta bus 'byung ba thams cad dang / tshul de lta bus sems can gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / tshul de lta bus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub dang /
translated: In this way, all buddha realms, all elements, all realms of sentient beings are purified, and in this way, all buddhas attain enlightenment.

original: rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad kyis ma lus par gang bar byas pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa dang /
analyzed: rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad kyis ma lus par gang bar byas pa'i chos kyi dbyings yongs su dag pa dang /
translated: It is the pure buddha realm that extends to all buddha realms. It is the pure bodhisattvas who extend to all sentient beings. It is the pure realm of phenomena that is filled without exception by all the births of buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par shin tu byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / thams cad mkhyen par 'byung bar bgo skal med par yongs su bsngos pa dang / nam mkha'i khams tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i sems kyi sa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par shin tu byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / thams cad mkhyen par 'byung bar bgo skal med par yongs su bsngos pa dang / nam mkha'i khams tshad med pa'i rjes su song ba'i sems kyi sa dang /
translated: It is the body of the tathƒÅgatas that extends to all buddha realms without exception. It is the dedication to the fortune of the arising of omniscience and the level of mind that extends to the immeasurable realm of space.

original: yongs su bsngo ba'i tshad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i mnyam pa nyid las kyi rnam par smin pa thams cad las rnam par grol zhing shin tu mos pa dang; yongs su bsngo ba'i khyad par mtha' yas par 'brel bar byas pa dang /
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba'i tshad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes su zhugs pa dang / yongs su bsngo ba'i mnyam pa nyid las kyi rnam par smin pa thams cad las rnam par grol zhing shin tu mos pa dang; yongs su bsngo ba'i khyad par mtha' yas par 'brel bar byas pa dang /
translated: they are engaged in the inconceivable extent of dedication; they are free of the ripening of all the actions of the sameness of dedication; they have a very pure motivation; they are connected to infinite special dedications;

original: yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rjes su song bas /
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi rjes su song bas /
translated: they have the way of dedication that is in accord with the entire realm of phenomena;

original: yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe bdag la mi rtog go /
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba'i tshe bdag la mi rtog go /
translated: when they dedicate, they do not conceptualize a self;

original: bdag gi lus la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: bdag gi lus la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: they do not conceptualize a body of a self;

original: sangs rgyas la mi rtog go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas la mi rtog go /
translated: they do not conceptualize a buddha;

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: they do not conceptualize the Dharma of a buddha;

original: zhing la mi rtog go /
analyzed: zhing la mi rtog go /
translated: they do not conceptualize a realm;

original: zhing gi yang dag par spyod pas rnam par spyod pa la rnam par mi rtog go /üîΩsems can la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: zhing gi yang dag par spyod pas rnam par spyod pa la rnam par mi rtog go / sems can la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: they do not conceptualize the conduct of the correct conduct in a realm;üîΩthey do not conceptualize a being;

original: sems can gdul ba la rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sems can gdul ba la rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: they do not conceptualize the training of beings;

original: las la mi rtog go /
analyzed: las la mi rtog go /
translated: they do not conceptualize an action;

original: las kyi rnam par smin pa la rnam par mi rtog @218b go ;sems pa la chags par mi byed do //
analyzed: las kyi rnam par smin pa la rnam par mi rtog @218b go ;sems pa la chags par mi byed do //
translated: He does not conceptualize the ripening of karma.üîΩHe does not become attached to thoughts.

original: bsam pas kyang mngon par chags par mi byed do //
analyzed: bsam pas kyang mngon par chags par mi byed do //
translated: He does not become attached to intentions.

original: rgyu chud gzon par mi byed do //
analyzed: rgyu chud gzon par mi byed do //
translated: He does not waste causes.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu chud gzon par mi byed do //üîΩdngos po nye bar len par mi byed do //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu chud gzon par mi byed do // dngos po nye bar len par mi byed do //
translated: He does not waste causes and effects.üîΩHe does not grasp at things.

original: dngos po'i chos la chags par yang mi byed do //
analyzed: dngos po'i chos la chags par yang mi byed do //
translated: He does not become attached to the phenomena of things.

original: 'khor ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa gcig tu mi byed do //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i rnam pa tha dad pa gcig tu mi byed do //
translated: He does not make the different aspects of sa·πÉsƒÅra into one.

original: zhi ba rnam par brtags pa med pas rlom sems mi byed do //
analyzed: zhi ba rnam par brtags pa med pas rlom sems mi byed do //
translated: He does not become conceited because of the non-conceptualization of peace.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyis snyems par mi byed do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyis snyems par mi byed do //
translated: He does not become conceited because of the domain of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: chos gang gis kyang chos la gnas par mi byed do //
analyzed: chos gang gis kyang chos la gnas par mi byed do //
translated: He does not abide in any phenomenon because of any phenomenon.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag nye bar stobs so //üîΩkhong du chud par byed do //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag nye bar stobs so // khong du chud par byed do //
translated: In that way, the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva dedicates those roots of virtue.üîΩHe understands them.

original: yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He makes the transference.

original: yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: they are brought to maturity;üîΩthey are made equal;

original: mnyam par byed do //üîΩsgrub bo // mtshan mar mi byed do //üîΩdmigs par mi byed do //
analyzed: mnyam par byed do // sgrub bo // mtshan mar mi byed do // dmigs par mi byed do //
translated: they are accomplished;üîΩthey are not conceptualized as signs;üîΩthey are not conceptualized as objective supports;

original: mi 'jal lo //üîΩmi rtog go /
analyzed: mi 'jal lo // mi rtog go /
translated: they are not conceptualized as measure;üîΩthey are not conceptualized as thought;

original: rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: they are not conceptualized as discrimination.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar yongs su bsngo ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar yongs su bsngo ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúBodhisattva mahƒÅsattvas who dedicate in that way

original: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin /
analyzed: 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin /
translated: are recollecting all the buddhas of the past, present, and future and their roots of virtue are inexhaustible.üîΩThey are engaging with all bodhisattvas and their roots of virtue are inexhaustible.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mi zad pa yin; zhing rnam par dag pas yongs su bsngo bas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mi zad pa yin; zhing rnam par dag pas yongs su bsngo bas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin /
translated: They are dedicating to the purification of the realm of beings and their roots of virtue are inexhaustible.

original: sems can gyi khams rnam par dag pa la rnam par dpyod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin /
analyzed: sems can gyi khams rnam par dag pa la rnam par dpyod pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin /
translated: They are analyzing the purification of the realm of beings and their roots of virtue are inexhaustible.

original: chos @219a *// kyi dbyings su 'jug pa la zhugs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin /
analyzed: chos @219a *// kyi dbyings su 'jug pa la zhugs pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin /
translated: They are entering into the realm of phenomena and their roots of virtue are inexhaustible.

original: nam mkha'i khams ltar tshad med pa'i sems la yongs su bsgoms pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams ltar tshad med pa'i sems la yongs su bsgoms pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin /
translated: It is the inexhaustible root of virtue to meditate on the mind as immeasurable as space.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la shin tu mos pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la shin tu mos pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin /
translated: It is the inexhaustible root of virtue to have great interest in the domain of all the buddhas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las la brtson pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las la brtson pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin /
translated: It is the inexhaustible root of virtue to be diligent in the activities of all bodhisattvas.

original: dus gsum rab tu rnam par 'byed pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin te /
analyzed: dus gsum rab tu rnam par 'byed pas dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad pa yin te /
translated: It is the inexhaustible root of virtue to discern the three times.

original: de nas sems can gyi khams thams cad la sems can med par rab tu rtog cing yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: de nas sems can gyi khams thams cad la sems can med par rab tu rtog cing yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: Then, one should dedicate one‚Äôs roots of virtue to all realms of sentient beings, contemplating that they are devoid of sentient beings.

original: chos thams cad la srog med par khong du chud cing yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad la srog med par khong du chud cing yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: One should dedicate one‚Äôs roots of virtue to all phenomena, understanding that they are devoid of life.

original: chos thams cad la byed pa med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad la byed pa med par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: One should dedicate one‚Äôs roots of virtue to all phenomena, knowing them to be devoid of agent, just as they are.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gang zag med par sems shing yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la gang zag med par sems shing yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: One should dedicate one‚Äôs roots of virtue to all phenomena, thinking that they are devoid of person.

original: chos thams cad nyon mongs pa med par rab tu rtog cing yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad nyon mongs pa med par rab tu rtog cing yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates, having thoroughly realized all phenomena to be without afflictions.

original: chos thams cad kyi rten pa yang dag par mthong zhing yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rten pa yang dag par mthong zhing yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates, having seen the support of all phenomena.

original: dngos po thams cad la mi gnas pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: dngos po thams cad la mi gnas pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes shing yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates, having understood all things to be just as they are, without abiding in anything.

original: zhing thams cad la yang dag par mi gnas pa nyid du shes shing yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: zhing thams cad la yang dag par mi gnas pa nyid du shes shing yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates, having understood all realms to be without true existence.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mi gnas pa nyid du lta zhing yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mi gnas pa nyid du lta zhing yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates, having seen the bodhisattva conduct to be without abiding.

original: dmigs pa thams cad @219b la dmigs su med pa nyid du shes pas mthong zhing yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: dmigs pa thams cad @219b la dmigs su med pa nyid du shes pas mthong zhing yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates, having seen all objects to be without objects.

original: de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas zhing gang yang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bcas par mig lam du snang bar mi 'gyur ro; ;kun tu lta yang sems can gang yang mi mthun pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de de ltar yongs su bsngo bas zhing gang yang kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bcas par mig lam du snang bar mi 'gyur ro; ;kun tu lta yang sems can gang yang mi mthun pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIn this way, he dedicates so that no realm will appear to be defiled, and so that no being will be seen to be disagreeable.

original: spyod pa'i tshe chos gang yang yang dag par mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: spyod pa'i tshe chos gang yang yang dag par mi mthong ngo //
translated: When he practices, he does not see any dharma.

original: ye shes kyi 'jug pas gang la yang 'jug pa med do //
analyzed: ye shes kyi 'jug pas gang la yang 'jug pa med do //
translated: He does not engage in anything with the engagement of wisdom.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad la'ang rab tu gnas te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad la'ang rab tu gnas te /
translated: He is present in the realm of space.

original: de yang shin tu shes so //
analyzed: de yang shin tu shes so //
translated: He knows that very well.

original: bsod nams kyi stobs tshad med pas /
analyzed: bsod nams kyi stobs tshad med pas /
translated: With immeasurable power of merit,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus chos thams cad gang bar shin tu shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus chos thams cad gang bar shin tu shes so //
translated: he knows that the body of the TathƒÅgata is full of all dharmas.

original: sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad du 'gro ba la yang dag par spyod do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad du 'gro ba la yang dag par spyod do //
translated: He practices all roots of merit in order to satisfy all sentient beings.

original: de'i sems bskyed pa re re zhing yang sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa stobs bcu'i sar yang dag par grub bo //
analyzed: de'i sems bskyed pa re re zhing yang sems can brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa stobs bcu'i sar yang dag par grub bo //
translated: In each of his thoughts, he accomplishes the ten powers of the stage of the TathƒÅgata for inexpressibly inexpressible numbers of sentient beings.

original: de nas sems can thams cad bsod nams thams cad kyis yongs su gzung zhing thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa bsod nams thams cad kyi 'byung gnas dang ldan pa thams cad rab tu sgrub bo //
analyzed: de nas sems can thams cad bsod nams thams cad kyis yongs su gzung zhing thob par bya ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa bsod nams thams cad kyi 'byung gnas dang ldan pa thams cad rab tu sgrub bo //
translated: Then, in order to take hold of and attain all the merit of all sentient beings, he accomplishes all the pure roots of virtue that are the source of all merit.

original: de yo byad ci 'dod pa phun sum tshogs pas bsod nams kyi mdzod yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: de yo byad ci 'dod pa phun sum tshogs pas bsod nams kyi mdzod yid bzhin gyi nor bu lta bu dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: He has a treasure of merit that is like a wish-fulfilling gem, in that it is the perfect fulfillment of whatever equipment is desired.

original: de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de dag tu zhing thams cad rnam par sbyong zhing 'gro'o //üîΩde gang dang gang du spyod pa de dang de dag tu sems can brjod du med pa'i yang @220a *//
analyzed: de gang dang gang du 'gro ba de dang de dag tu zhing thams cad rnam par sbyong zhing 'gro'o // de gang dang gang du spyod pa de dang de dag tu sems can brjod du med pa'i yang @220a *//
translated: Wherever he goes, he goes to purify all the buddha-fields.

original: brjod du med pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi stobs kyis yongs su gzung ba la rab tu gzhog cing yang dag par spyod do //
analyzed: brjod du med pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi stobs kyis yongs su gzung ba la rab tu gzhog cing yang dag par spyod do //
translated: Wherever he acts, there he engages in conduct, in order to purify an inexpressible, inexpressible number of sentient beings, by means of the power of merit that is taken hold of.

original: de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de la rnam pa de lta bu de'i rgyu mthun pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gzugs med pa yin /
analyzed: de ltar yongs su bsngo ba de la rnam pa de lta bu de'i rgyu mthun pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gzugs med pa yin /
translated: In this way, through the natural outcome of such a complete dedication, when they practice bodhisattva activity, they are formless.

original: 'jig rten thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i bsod nams can yin /
analyzed: 'jig rten thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa'i bsod nams can yin /
translated: They have merit that cannot be outshone by any world.

original: bdud thams cad kyis gzi brjid mi zad pa yin /
analyzed: bdud thams cad kyis gzi brjid mi zad pa yin /
translated: They have inexhaustible splendor for all mƒÅras.

original: phyir rgol ba thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'phrog pa yin /
analyzed: phyir rgol ba thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mi 'phrog pa yin /
translated: They have roots of virtue that cannot be stolen by any opponents.

original: thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid yang dag par rtogs pa dang ldan pas smon lam shin tu che ba dang / sems rab tu yangs pa yin /
analyzed: thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid yang dag par rtogs pa dang ldan pas smon lam shin tu che ba dang / sems rab tu yangs pa yin /
translated: They have vast aspirations and a very expansive mind, because they have realized the omniscient mind.

original: sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par 'gro ba yin /
analyzed: sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par 'gro ba yin /
translated: They go to immeasurable buddha realms with a single thought of bodhichitta.

original: ye shes kyi stobs mtha' yas pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul yongs su shes pa yin /
analyzed: ye shes kyi stobs mtha' yas pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul yongs su shes pa yin /
translated: They know the domain of all buddhas through infinite wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad la shin tu dad pa yin /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad la shin tu dad pa yin /
translated: They have great faith in all buddhas.

original: ye shes mtha' yas par shin tu 'jug pa la rab tu gnas pa yin /
analyzed: ye shes mtha' yas par shin tu 'jug pa la rab tu gnas pa yin /
translated: They abide in the complete engagement of infinite wisdom.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyis glas pa'i byang chub kyi sems mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mthus nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas par chos kyi dbyings shin tu yangs pa yin no //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyis glas pa'i byang chub kyi sems mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mthus nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas par chos kyi dbyings shin tu yangs pa yin no //
translated: By the power of the accomplishment of the spirit of enlightenment that pervades the realm of space, the realm of reality pervades the realm of space.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: O sons of the Victor,

original: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba lnga pa bsod nams mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba lnga pa bsod nams mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba ste /
translated: this is the fifth dedication of the bodhisattva great beings, called ‚Äúthe inexhaustible treasure of merit.‚Äù

original: @220b de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
analyzed: @220b de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni /
translated: The bodhisattva who dwells in it

original: mi zad pa'i mdzod bcu rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: mi zad pa'i mdzod bcu rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: obtains ten inexhaustible treasures.

original: bcu gang zhe na /
analyzed: bcu gang zhe na /
translated: What are the ten?

original: skra'i sbubs gcig tu sangs rgyas grangs med pa 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i phyir sangs rgyas blta ba'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: skra'i sbubs gcig tu sangs rgyas grangs med pa 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i phyir sangs rgyas blta ba'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: He obtains the inexhaustible treasure of the vision of the buddhas, because he enters into the appearance of countless buddhas in a single pore.

original: chos thams cad gcig tu rab tu gzhol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ye shes kyi phyir chos la 'jug pa'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: chos thams cad gcig tu rab tu gzhol ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ye shes kyi phyir chos la 'jug pa'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: In order to have the power and knowledge of the Tathagata, who has unified all phenomena, he attains the inexhaustible treasury of the attainment of the Dharma.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos bstan pa yongs su bzung zhing chud mi zos par bya ba'i phyir dran pas bzung ba'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos bstan pa yongs su bzung zhing chud mi zos par bya ba'i phyir dran pas bzung ba'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: In order to hold and not waste the teachings of all the Tathagatas, he attains the inexhaustible treasury of the retention of memory.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul dang dgongs pa shin tu bstan pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir blo gros rnam par nges pa'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul dang dgongs pa shin tu bstan pa la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir blo gros rnam par nges pa'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: In order to be skilled in teaching the Dharma and the intention of all the Tathagatas, he attains the inexhaustible treasury of the discernment of the intellect.

original: chos kyi tshul rnam par dbye ba la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir rigs pas 'dzin pa'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: chos kyi tshul rnam par dbye ba la mkhas par bya ba'i phyir rigs pas 'dzin pa'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: In order to be skilled in the analysis of the Dharma, he attains the inexhaustible treasury of the retention of logic.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i blos dus gsum thams cad khyab par bya ba'i phyir blo tshad med pa'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i blos dus gsum thams cad khyab par bya ba'i phyir blo tshad med pa'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: In order to pervade the three times with an awareness equal to the realm of space, he attains the inexhaustible treasure-lode of immeasurable awareness.

original: sems can thams cad tshim par bya bas mi zad par bya ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: sems can thams cad tshim par bya bas mi zad par bya ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: In order to satisfy all sentient beings and make them inexhaustible, he attains the inexhaustible treasure-lode of the merit of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi mun pa dang / rab rib dang / ling tog dang / gti mug dang / ma rig pa'i @221a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi mun pa dang / rab rib dang / ling tog dang / gti mug dang / ma rig pa'i @221a *//
translated: In order to dispel the darkness, cataracts, and blindness of all sentient beings, and their delusion and ignorance,

original: mun pa rnam par bsal ba'i phyir ye shes dang dga' ba dang blo'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: mun pa rnam par bsal ba'i phyir ye shes dang dga' ba dang blo'i gter mi zad pa'i mdzod rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: he attains the inexhaustible treasure-lode of the joy and awareness of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid tha mi dad pa rab tu bstan pas sems can thams cad shes par bya ba'i phyir spobs pa rnam par nges pa'i gter rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos nyid tha mi dad pa rab tu bstan pas sems can thams cad shes par bya ba'i phyir spobs pa rnam par nges pa'i gter rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: In order to teach the undifferentiated reality of all Buddhas to all sentient beings, he attains the treasure-lode of eloquence that is certain in its knowledge.

original: byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa'i thabs skyon med pa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa'i gter mi zad pa rab tu 'thob ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chags pa med pa'i thabs skyon med pa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa'i gter mi zad pa rab tu 'thob ste /
translated: The bodhisattvas, by the continuity of their practice, obtain the inexhaustible treasure of the ten powers and the fearlessnesses, in order to be consecrated with the consecration of the unobstructed means of omniscience without attachment.

original: gter mi zad pa'i mdzod bcu po 'di dag rab tu 'thob bo //
analyzed: gter mi zad pa'i mdzod bcu po 'di dag rab tu 'thob bo //
translated: They obtain these ten inexhaustible treasure-troves.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan gyis sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te /
translated: Then the bodhisattva Vajradhvaja, through the Buddha‚Äôs blessing, looked in the ten directions

original: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
analyzed: de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
translated: and at that time spoke these verses:

original: bsam pas mthu stobs rnyed pa de dag ni //
analyzed: bsam pas mthu stobs rnyed pa de dag ni //
translated: ‚ÄúThose who have attained power through aspiration

original: mtha' yas chos la kun tu dbang bsgyur cing //
analyzed: mtha' yas chos la kun tu dbang bsgyur cing //
translated: have mastery over the infinite Dharma

original: bsod nams gter la rjes su yi rang ba //
analyzed: bsod nams gter la rjes su yi rang ba //
translated: and rejoice in the treasure of merit.

original: de dag chags med tshul gyis yongs su bsngo //
analyzed: de dag chags med tshul gyis yongs su bsngo //
translated: They dedicate it with an unattached attitude.

original: dus gsum rgyal ba su dag ji snyed pas //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba su dag ji snyed pas //
translated: ‚ÄúAll the victors of the three times,

original: rnam dag zhing rnams 'jig rten rnam sbyangs pa //
analyzed: rnam dag zhing rnams 'jig rten rnam sbyangs pa //
translated: purify the worlds with their pure lands.

original: yon tan kun dang ldan zhing 'phags pa rnams //
analyzed: yon tan kun dang ldan zhing 'phags pa rnams //
translated: And endowed with all good qualities,

original: de 'dra'i rnam dag zhing du yongs su bsngo //
analyzed: de 'dra'i rnam dag zhing du yongs su bsngo //
translated: I dedicate it to that pure realm of the noble ones.üîΩI contemplate all the ways

original: dus gsum rgyal ba ji snyed bzhugs pa yi //üîΩtshul rnams kun la rjes su sems @221b byed cing //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba ji snyed bzhugs pa yi // tshul rnams kun la rjes su sems @221b byed cing //
translated: Of the victorious ones of the three times,

original: thams cad lus pa med par nges bzung ste //
analyzed: thams cad lus pa med par nges bzung ste //
translated: And I take hold of them all without exception;

original: de 'dra'i zhing ni brtan pa rnams kyis brgyan //
analyzed: de 'dra'i zhing ni brtan pa rnams kyis brgyan //
translated: Such is the realm adorned by the steadfast.üîΩEven if I were to take up all the good qualitiesüîΩOf a single realm for as many eons

original: dus gsum bskal pa ji snyed yod pa yi //üîΩzhing gcig yon tan de dag blangs byas kyang //üîΩbskal pa ji snyed de dag zad 'gyur gyi //
analyzed: dus gsum bskal pa ji snyed yod pa yi // zhing gcig yon tan de dag blangs byas kyang // bskal pa ji snyed de dag zad 'gyur gyi //
translated: As there are in the three times,

original: zhing gi yon tan bsngags pa zad mi 'gyur //
analyzed: zhing gi yon tan bsngags pa zad mi 'gyur //
translated: The praise of the qualities of that realm would not come to an end.

original: 'di 'dra'i zhing rnams thams cad ma lus par //
analyzed: 'di 'dra'i zhing rnams thams cad ma lus par //
translated: All these realms without exception

original: mi yi mchog gis ji snyed mthong gyur pa //
analyzed: mi yi mchog gis ji snyed mthong gyur pa //
translated: Are seen by the supreme ones among men.üîΩAll of them, without exception, are adorned

original: thams cad ma lus zhing gi yon tan gyis //
analyzed: thams cad ma lus zhing gi yon tan gyis //
translated: With the good qualities of the realms,

original: ji snyed 'jig rten de dag brgyan par snang //
analyzed: ji snyed 'jig rten de dag brgyan par snang //
translated: As they appear in the world.

original: de dag kun kyang rnam dag yid dang ldan //
analyzed: de dag kun kyang rnam dag yid dang ldan //
translated: They all have pure minds

original: de dag rgyal ba'i gsung skyes sras yin te //
analyzed: de dag rgyal ba'i gsung skyes sras yin te //
translated: And are the offspring born from the speech of the victorious ones.

original: yon tan kun gyis brgyan pa'i sems dang ldan;/
analyzed: yon tan kun gyis brgyan pa'i sems dang ldan;/
translated: They have minds adorned with all good qualities,

original: zhing gi phyogs rnams rab tu rgyas par byed //
analyzed: zhing gi phyogs rnams rab tu rgyas par byed //
translated: And they fill the reaches of the world.

original: de dag lus ni mtshan gyis shin tu brgyan //
analyzed: de dag lus ni mtshan gyis shin tu brgyan //
translated: Their bodies are adorned with the major marks,

original: de dag dpe byad bzang pos lus kyang mdzes //
analyzed: de dag dpe byad bzang pos lus kyang mdzes //
translated: And their bodies are beautiful with the minor marks.

original: de dag mtha' yas yang dag so so shes //
analyzed: de dag mtha' yas yang dag so so shes //
translated: They have infinite individual awareness,

original: 'gro ba'i rgya mtsho mi zad ji bzhin no //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i rgya mtsho mi zad ji bzhin no //
translated: Just like the inexhaustible ocean of beings.

original: de dag spyod yul dag dang yang dag ldan //
analyzed: de dag spyod yul dag dang yang dag ldan //
translated: They have the perfect range of activity,

original: ting 'dzin kun la gnas pa rjes su thob //
analyzed: ting 'dzin kun la gnas pa rjes su thob //
translated: And they attain the state of being in all samƒÅdhis.

original: mtshungs med shin tu rnam par dag pa'i yid //
analyzed: mtshungs med shin tu rnam par dag pa'i yid //
translated: They have incomparable, completely pure minds,

original: thams cad phyogs rnams su ni 'on kyang 'gyed //
analyzed: thams cad phyogs rnams su ni 'on kyang 'gyed //
translated: And they radiate them in all directions.

original: 'di 'dra'i zhing rnams ma lus bzung byas te //
analyzed: 'di 'dra'i zhing rnams ma lus bzung byas te //
translated: They take up all such buddha realms,

original: nyan thos spyod yul dag la dad med pa //
analyzed: nyan thos spyod yul dag la dad med pa //
translated: And they have no faith in the range of activity of the ≈õrƒÅvakas.

original: rang rgyal thams cad shin tu spangs gyur te //
analyzed: rang rgyal thams cad shin tu spangs gyur te //
translated: They completely abandon all the pratyekabuddhas,

original: mi yi dam pas shin tu gang gyur cig /
analyzed: mi yi dam pas shin tu gang gyur cig /
translated: And they are filled with the best of humans.

original: de dag de 'dra'i yongs bsngo sems ldan pa //
analyzed: de dag de 'dra'i yongs bsngo sems ldan pa //
translated: They have the attitude of dedicating in that way,

original: gang gis ma lus @222a *//
analyzed: gang gis ma lus @222a *//
translated: And they dedicate all of it

original: 'jig rten byang chub tu //
analyzed: 'jig rten byang chub tu //
translated: To enlightenment for the world.

original: dus gsum rgyal bas mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal bas mngon par sangs rgyas pa //
translated: And the perfect enlightenment of the victorious ones of the three times,

original: de dang ldan par yongs su bsngo bar byed //üîΩphyogs bcu kun na ji snyed yod pa yi //
analyzed: de dang ldan par yongs su bsngo bar byed // phyogs bcu kun na ji snyed yod pa yi //
translated: And dedicate it to the attainment of the supreme, highest enlightenment.üîΩ‚Äú ‚ÄòAll the mƒÅras and afflictions in the ten directions

original: bdud dang nyon mongs de dag rab tu 'joms //
analyzed: bdud dang nyon mongs de dag rab tu 'joms //
translated: Are completely vanquished by them.

original: dpal ldan mthu can gzhan gyis pham mi nus //
analyzed: dpal ldan mthu can gzhan gyis pham mi nus //
translated: They are glorious, powerful, and invincible,

original: rnam par nges pas chos kyi dam pa spyod //
analyzed: rnam par nges pas chos kyi dam pa spyod //
translated: And they practice the supreme Dharma with certainty.üîΩ‚Äú ‚ÄòTheir aspirations and strength are vast,

original: de dag smon lam mthu stobs yangs pa yin; ;yongs su bsngo ba chags pa med gyur cing //
analyzed: de dag smon lam mthu stobs yangs pa yin; ;yongs su bsngo ba chags pa med gyur cing //
translated: And their dedications are free of attachment.

original: bsod nams zad med de dag mdzod du zhugs //
analyzed: bsod nams zad med de dag mdzod du zhugs //
translated: They enter the inexhaustible treasure of merit,

original: de ni dus gsum kun tu zad mi 'gyur //
analyzed: de ni dus gsum kun tu zad mi 'gyur //
translated: Which never comes to an end in the three times.

original: de dag spyod pas chos la 'jal bar byed //
analyzed: de dag spyod pas chos la 'jal bar byed //
translated: ‚Äú ‚ÄòThey measure the Dharma through their conduct,

original: de dag byed pa med pa'i chos la zhugs //
analyzed: de dag byed pa med pa'i chos la zhugs //
translated: And they engage with phenomena without action.

original: g-yo med chos kyang de dag rab tu shes //
analyzed: g-yo med chos kyang de dag rab tu shes //
translated: They know the Dharma to be without deceit,

original: las kyi rnam pas yongs su mi sems so //
analyzed: las kyi rnam pas yongs su mi sems so //
translated: And they do not think in terms of karmic actions.

original: gzugs ni ma yin 'on kyang gzugs med min //
analyzed: gzugs ni ma yin 'on kyang gzugs med min //
translated: ‚Äú ‚ÄòThey are not form, but neither are they formless;

original: 'du shes yod min 'du shes med pa min //
analyzed: 'du shes yod min 'du shes med pa min //
translated: They are not perception, nor are they nonperception;

original: dngos yod ma yin dngos po med pa'ang min /
analyzed: dngos yod ma yin dngos po med pa'ang min /
translated: They are not real, nor are they unreal.

original: dngos med thams cad rang bzhin khong du chud //
analyzed: dngos med thams cad rang bzhin khong du chud //
translated: They understand the nature of all unrealities.

original: yod pa ma yin med pa'ang ma yin te //üîΩrgyu yi rgyud la mngon par chags mi byed //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin med pa'ang ma yin te // rgyu yi rgyud la mngon par chags mi byed //
translated: They are not existent, nor are they nonexistent.üîΩThey do not cling to the continuity of causes.

original: rkyen la'ang 'jug par de dag mi byed do //
analyzed: rkyen la'ang 'jug par de dag mi byed do //
translated: They do not engage with conditions.

original: nam yang de dag chags par mi byed do //
analyzed: nam yang de dag chags par mi byed do //
translated: They never cling to anything.

original: 'gro ba 'di na smra tshul ji snyed pa //
analyzed: 'gro ba 'di na smra tshul ji snyed pa //
translated: All the ways of speaking in the world

original: de la nam yang chags par mi byed de //
analyzed: de la nam yang chags par mi byed de //
translated: they never cling to any of them.

original: 'du shes bsam pa brnga yang rab tu shes //
analyzed: 'du shes bsam pa brnga yang rab tu shes //
translated: They know the thoughts and ideas of beings

original: bdag med chos kyang so sor shin tu rtogs //
analyzed: bdag med chos kyang so sor shin tu rtogs //
translated: and individually understand the Dharma of selflessness.üîΩThey understand the equality of the nature of phenomena

original: de dag sems can mi 'bral zhes 'gyur @222b ba; ;de 'dra'i chos nyid mnyam pa rab tu rtogs //
analyzed: de dag sems can mi 'bral zhes 'gyur @222b ba; ;de 'dra'i chos nyid mnyam pa rab tu rtogs //
translated: in the way that beings are not separate.

original: de 'dra'i zhing dang de bzhin las kyi rnams //
analyzed: de 'dra'i zhing dang de bzhin las kyi rnams //
translated: Such fields and such actions

original: dus gsum thams cad ma lus bzung byas shing //
analyzed: dus gsum thams cad ma lus bzung byas shing //
translated: are all the three times without exception.

original: shes pas de dag de bzhin yongs su bsngo //
analyzed: shes pas de dag de bzhin yongs su bsngo //
translated: They dedicate them in that way with wisdom.

original: las kyi rnam pa gang gis skyes ldan zhing //
analyzed: las kyi rnam pa gang gis skyes ldan zhing //
translated: Through whatever kind of action they are born

original: rang bzhin gang dang mtshan nyid gang yin dang // de na ci 'dra'i chos nyid yod pa dag /
analyzed: rang bzhin gang dang mtshan nyid gang yin dang // de na ci 'dra'i chos nyid yod pa dag /
translated: And the way things are in reality,

original: de bzhin de dag dag par yongs su bsngo; ;gang gi yid kyis ngo bo nyid 'jal ba //
analyzed: de bzhin de dag dag par yongs su bsngo; ;gang gi yid kyis ngo bo nyid 'jal ba //
translated: They dedicate all that in the same way.

original: rang bzhin byas pa med par de dag shes //
analyzed: rang bzhin byas pa med par de dag shes //
translated: They know that the nature of mind is unfabricated,üîΩAnd that it is the nature of all beings.

original: 'gro la de dag mi gnas len pa med //
analyzed: 'gro la de dag mi gnas len pa med //
translated: They do not dwell on beings, nor do they grasp at them.

original: 'gro ba kun phyir yongs su bsngo bar gzhol //
analyzed: 'gro ba kun phyir yongs su bsngo bar gzhol //
translated: They are dedicated to dedicating everything for the sake of all beings.

original: spyod yul ma lus thams cad bzung byas shing //
analyzed: spyod yul ma lus thams cad bzung byas shing //
translated: They take hold of the entire range of experience,

original: 'od gsal thams cad rjes su sems par byed //
analyzed: 'od gsal thams cad rjes su sems par byed //
translated: And they contemplate all that is luminous.

original: ma lus de bzhin nyid kyang de dag shes //
analyzed: ma lus de bzhin nyid kyang de dag shes //
translated: They know the suchness of everything.

original: gang gis lta ba thams cad ma lus shing //
analyzed: gang gis lta ba thams cad ma lus shing //
translated: They have no views,

original: bsam pa'i skyon por rnam par spangs pa rnams //
analyzed: bsam pa'i skyon por rnam par spangs pa rnams //
translated: And they have abandoned all faults of thought.

original: rtag tu de dag dri med kun gdung med //
analyzed: rtag tu de dag dri med kun gdung med //
translated: They are always stainless and free of afflictions.

original: chags med kun gyi tshul yang rjes su rtogs //üîΩde dag gis ni chos rnams ma bshig ste //
analyzed: chags med kun gyi tshul yang rjes su rtogs // de dag gis ni chos rnams ma bshig ste //
translated: They understand the way of being free of attachment.üîΩThey do not destroy phenomena,

original: nam yang chos nyid zhig par 'gyur ba med //
analyzed: nam yang chos nyid zhig par 'gyur ba med //
translated: And they never destroy the nature of phenomena.

original: chos la chags par de dag mi byed de //
analyzed: chos la chags par de dag mi byed de //
translated: They do not create attachment to phenomena.

original: de dag 'jig rten sgra brnyan 'dra ba yin //
analyzed: de dag 'jig rten sgra brnyan 'dra ba yin //
translated: They are like echoes in the world.

original: gang gis dus gsum 'jig rten skyes pa yin //
analyzed: gang gis dus gsum 'jig rten skyes pa yin //
translated: They know how the world arises in the three times.

original: 'gro ba rkyen 'byung chos kyang rab tu shes //
analyzed: 'gro ba rkyen 'byung chos kyang rab tu shes //
translated: They know the phenomena of the arising of the world through conditions.

original: bsam pa dag dang bag chags khong du chud //
analyzed: bsam pa dag dang bag chags khong du chud //
translated: They understand intentions and habitual tendencies.

original: thams cad 'jig par byed pa gang yang med //
analyzed: thams cad 'jig par byed pa gang yang med //
translated: There is nothing that they destroy.

original: de dag las dang las min rab tu shes //
analyzed: de dag las dang las min rab tu shes //
translated: They know what is and is not karma.

original: las dang rnam par 'gal bar mi @223a *//
analyzed: las dang rnam par 'gal bar mi @223a *//
translated: They do not act in opposition to karma.

original: byed de; ;las kyi rnam par smin pa chud mi gzon //
analyzed: byed de; ;las kyi rnam par smin pa chud mi gzon //
translated: They do not waste the ripening of karma.

original: rgyu las 'byung ba'i chos kyang shin tu ston //
analyzed: rgyu las 'byung ba'i chos kyang shin tu ston //
translated: They teach the Dharma that arises from causes.

original: 'di na sems can gang yang 'khor ba med //
analyzed: 'di na sems can gang yang 'khor ba med //
translated: There are no sentient beings here who cycle.

original: sems can 'byung bar de dag mi byed de //
analyzed: sems can 'byung bar de dag mi byed de //
translated: They do not create the arising of sentient beings.

original: sems can rnams la gnas pa med par smras //
analyzed: sems can rnams la gnas pa med par smras //
translated: They say that sentient beings do not abide.

original: sems can rgyud kyi brda yang rab tu rtogs //
analyzed: sems can rgyud kyi brda yang rab tu rtogs //
translated: They understand the symbols of the mind streams of sentient beings.

original: bsod nams mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: bsod nams mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba ste /
translated: This is the treasury of inexhaustible merit,

original: yongs su bsngo ba lnga pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ba lnga pa'o //
translated: the fifth dedication.

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: ‚ÄúO sons of the victors!

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba drug pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yongs su bsngo ba drug pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is the bodhisattva great beings‚Äô sixth dedication, the one that is in accord with the sameness of all wholesome roots?

original: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
analyzed: kye rgyal ba'i sras dag /
translated: ‚ÄúO children of the Victorious Ones!

original: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal por gyur te srid chen po thob nas 'tshe ba dang / phyir rgol ba bcom ste rgyal po chen por grags pa dang / srid chen po'i khams la gnas shing /
analyzed: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal por gyur te srid chen po thob nas 'tshe ba dang / phyir rgol ba bcom ste rgyal po chen por grags pa dang / srid chen po'i khams la gnas shing /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings become kings and attain great power, they conquer those who are harmful and their adversaries. They are known as great kings and live in a realm of great power.

original: srid yangs pa la dbang par gyur nas 'khon med cing ltod pa med par srid la gnas pa /üîΩchos kyi rgyal srid kyis skyong bar byed pa /üîΩchos dang mthun pa /
analyzed: srid yangs pa la dbang par gyur nas 'khon med cing ltod pa med par srid la gnas pa / chos kyi rgyal srid kyis skyong bar byed pa / chos dang mthun pa /
translated: They live in power without enmity or hostility.üîΩThey rule with the Dharma.üîΩThey are in accord with the Dharma.

original: chos kyi rjes su bsnyegs pa /
analyzed: chos kyi rjes su bsnyegs pa /
translated: They follow the Dharma.

original: phun sum tshogs pa'i srid chen po thob pa /
analyzed: phun sum tshogs pa'i srid chen po thob pa /
translated: They attain great power and perfection.

original: sa chen po la gdugs gcig tu gyur pa /
analyzed: sa chen po la gdugs gcig tu gyur pa /
translated: They are the sole rulers of the great earth.

original: 'khor lo thogs pa med pas skyong ba /
analyzed: 'khor lo thogs pa med pas skyong ba /
translated: They rule with an unimpeded wheel.

original: dri ma med pa'i thabs thob pa /
analyzed: dri ma med pa'i thabs thob pa /
translated: He had attained the stainless method.

original: srid pa pha rol gyi sdes gtso ba med pa /
analyzed: srid pa pha rol gyi sdes gtso ba med pa /
translated: He was not the chief of the class of the other side of existence.

original: chos dang ldan pa /
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa /
translated: He was righteous.

original: dbyig pa med pa dang / mtshon cha med pas 'gro ba rnams @223b shin tu skyong ba /
analyzed: dbyig pa med pa dang / mtshon cha med pas 'gro ba rnams @223b shin tu skyong ba /
translated: He protected beings with a nonviolent and nonweaponized approach.

original: chos kyi rjes su zhugs shing bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis 'gro ba sdud pa /
analyzed: chos kyi rjes su zhugs shing bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis 'gro ba sdud pa /
translated: He gathered beings with the four means of gathering and was engaged in the Dharma.

original: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa /
analyzed: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa /
translated: He was a universal monarch.

original: 'gro ba thams cad la mdzod kyis shin tu stob pa de; dbang phyug de lta bu la gnas shing /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad la mdzod kyis shin tu stob pa de; dbang phyug de lta bu la gnas shing /
translated: He was a lord who provided a treasury for all beings.

original: de lta bu'i chos la gnas pa /
analyzed: de lta bu'i chos la gnas pa /
translated: He was a lord who abided in such Dharma.

original: g-yog dang 'khor mang po shin tu 'dus pa /
analyzed: g-yog dang 'khor mang po shin tu 'dus pa /
translated: He had a large retinue and following.

original: gzugs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: gzugs dang ldan pa /
translated: He was endowed with form.

original: 'gro ba thams cad blta bas mi ngom pa; yid la kha na ma tho ba med pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad blta bas mi ngom pa; yid la kha na ma tho ba med pa /
translated: He was never displeased with beings.

original: bsod nams rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bsod nams rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He was endowed with pure merit.

original: zil gyis mi non pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa /
analyzed: zil gyis mi non pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa /
translated: He was endowed with the marks of being invincible.

original: lus shin tu rnam par phye ba mdzes pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: lus shin tu rnam par phye ba mdzes pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He was endowed with a beautiful and well-proportioned body.

original: blta na bzang ba /
analyzed: blta na bzang ba /
translated: He was beautiful to behold.

original: tshul dang mthun pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: tshul dang mthun pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: He has a body that is in accordance with the Dharma.

original: stobs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: stobs dang ldan pa /
translated: He has strength.

original: thub pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: thub pa med pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: He has a body that cannot be conquered.

original: stobs chen po dang ldan pa /
analyzed: stobs chen po dang ldan pa /
translated: He has great strength.

original: mthu bo che'i lus kyis bzung ba /
analyzed: mthu bo che'i lus kyis bzung ba /
translated: He has a body that is a great power.

original: rnam par dag pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa'i lus dang ldan pa /
translated: He has a pure body.

original: bsgribs pa med pa'i las rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa de /
analyzed: bsgribs pa med pa'i las rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa de /
translated: He has pure, unobstructed activity.

original: zas yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: zas yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: He gives food,

original: btung ba'am / ro'am /
analyzed: btung ba'am / ro'am /
translated: drink,üîΩvehicles,

original: bzhon pa'am; gos sam /
analyzed: bzhon pa'am; gos sam /
translated: clothing,

original: me tog gam /üîΩphreng ba'am / spos sam /
analyzed: me tog gam / phreng ba'am / spos sam /
translated: flowers,üîΩgarlands,üîΩincense,üîΩointments,

original: byug pa'am / mal cha'am /
analyzed: byug pa'am / mal cha'am /
translated: beds,üîΩresidences,

original: gnas sam / rgyab rten nam /
analyzed: gnas sam / rgyab rten nam /
translated: supports,

original: mar me'am / sgron ma'am /
analyzed: mar me'am / sgron ma'am /
translated: lamps,

original: nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad rnams sbyin pa'am /
translated: and medical supplies and equipment.üîΩHe gives various vessels filled with jewels,

original: rin po ches gzhal ba'i snod sna tshogs bkang zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / shing rta sna tshogs dang / shing rta du ma bkang zhing /
analyzed: rin po ches gzhal ba'i snod sna tshogs bkang zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / shing rta sna tshogs dang / shing rta du ma bkang zhing /
translated: various chariots, and many chariots.

original: tshad @224a *// med pa'i rin po che dang nor yongs su gtong ba dang / glang po cang shes sam /
analyzed: tshad @224a *// med pa'i rin po che dang nor yongs su gtong ba dang / glang po cang shes sam /
translated: giving away precious things and wealth without limit;üîΩgiving away elephants that are well trained, or well trained horses adorned with all ornaments;

original: rta cang shes rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gtong ba dang / slong ba rnams la ci rigs su rgyal po'i stan bzang po gtong ba'am /
analyzed: rta cang shes rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa gtong ba dang / slong ba rnams la ci rigs su rgyal po'i stan bzang po gtong ba'am /
translated: giving away to beggars the best seats of a king, as is appropriate;

original: gdugs gtong ba'am /
analyzed: gdugs gtong ba'am /
translated: giving away parasols;

original: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gtong ba'am /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gtong ba'am /
translated: giving away victory banners and flags;

original: rin po che gtong zhing sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: rin po che gtong zhing sbyin pa'am /
translated: giving away precious things;

original: rgyan dang lhab lhub kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: rgyan dang lhab lhub kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: giving away ornaments and adornments;

original: cod pan nam /
analyzed: cod pan nam /
translated: giving away crowns;üîΩgiving away the crest jewels;

original: gtsug gi nor bu dag dbang phyug la spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas mtshon chas bcings shing btson ra na 'dug pa'i sems can rnams mthong nas nor thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / g-yog dang bdag tu bcas te byin nas btson ra de dag nas sems can rnams yongs su thar par byed pa /
analyzed: gtsug gi nor bu dag dbang phyug la spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas mtshon chas bcings shing btson ra na 'dug pa'i sems can rnams mthong nas nor thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / g-yog dang bdag tu bcas te byin nas btson ra de dag nas sems can rnams yongs su thar par byed pa /
translated: seeing beings who are bound with weapons and imprisoned, giving away all one‚Äôs wealth, and giving away oneself and one‚Äôs retinue, thereby liberating those beings from prison;

original: gsad sar khrid pa mthong nas bdag gi lus dang srog yongs su btang ste gsad pa de slu bar byed pa /
analyzed: gsad sar khrid pa mthong nas bdag gi lus dang srog yongs su btang ste gsad pa de slu bar byed pa /
translated: When he sees someone being led to the place of execution, he ransoms that person‚Äôs life by giving up his own body and life.

original: gtsug phud dang thor pag tu bcas pa'i mgo bo dag kyang slong bas bslangs na gtong ba med pa'i sems kyis gtong ba /
analyzed: gtsug phud dang thor pag tu bcas pa'i mgo bo dag kyang slong bas bslangs na gtong ba med pa'i sems kyis gtong ba /
translated: When someone asks him for his head, with its topknot and turban, he gives it away with a mind that does not hold back.

original: mig gnyis yongs su gtong ba'am /üîΩrna ba dang sna yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: mig gnyis yongs su gtong ba'am / rna ba dang sna yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: He gives away his two eyes.üîΩHe gives away his ears and nose.

original: so dang lce yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: so dang lce yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: He gives away his teeth and tongue.

original: mgo yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: mgo yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: He gives away his head.

original: rkang lag yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: rkang lag yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: He gives away his hands and feet.

original: rang lus kyang dral zhing slong ba la khrag yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: rang lus kyang dral zhing slong ba la khrag yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: He gives away his blood, cutting his own body to give it to beggars.

original: sha dang rkang yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: sha dang rkang yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: He gives away his flesh and marrow.

original: slong ba @224b la rang gi lus las snying phyung ste yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: slong ba @224b la rang gi lus las snying phyung ste yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: He gives away his heart, cutting it out of his own body and giving it to beggars.

original: slong zhing len pa sna tshogs la sgyu ma dang / mtsher pa dang / mkhal ma dang / pho ba rnams yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: slong zhing len pa sna tshogs la sgyu ma dang / mtsher pa dang / mkhal ma dang / pho ba rnams yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: He gives away his liver, kidneys, and intestines to those who ask for them and accept them.

original: rang gi lus las yan lag dang / nying lag dang / rus pa bslangs na /
analyzed: rang gi lus las yan lag dang / nying lag dang / rus pa bslangs na /
translated: If someone asks for his limbs, his major or minor body parts, or his bones,

original: dad pa'i sems kyis yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: dad pa'i sems kyis yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: he gives them away with a faithful mind.

original: slong ba la mos par lta bas pags pa dang mdog yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: slong ba la mos par lta bas pags pa dang mdog yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: He gives away his skin and flesh by being intent on the petitioner.

original: rkang lag las sor mo yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: rkang lag las sor mo yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: He gives away his fingers from his hands and feet.

original: chos 'dod pa'i phyir rang gi sha dang / sen mo yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: chos 'dod pa'i phyir rang gi sha dang / sen mo yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: For the sake of the Dharma, he gives away his own flesh and nails.

original: chos shin tu dkon pa tshol zhing /
analyzed: chos shin tu dkon pa tshol zhing /
translated: He seeks the very rare Dharma.

original: mes gang ba'i 'obs mi 'greng lag btags bdun du mchong bar byed pa'am /
analyzed: mes gang ba'i 'obs mi 'greng lag btags bdun du mchong bar byed pa'am /
translated: He jumps into a pit of fire seven times.

original: chos bsrung ba'i phyir sdug bsngal myong ba thams cad kyang rang gi lus kyis bzod par byed pa'am /
analyzed: chos bsrung ba'i phyir sdug bsngal myong ba thams cad kyang rang gi lus kyis bzod par byed pa'am /
translated: For the sake of protecting the Dharma, he endures all the sufferings with his own body.

original: chos tshol zhing chos kyi tshig dang yi ge 'bru gcig gi phyir yang rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa'i sa chen po yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: chos tshol zhing chos kyi tshig dang yi ge 'bru gcig gi phyir yang rgya mtsho'i mthar thug pa'i sa chen po yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: For the sake of seeking the Dharma, he gives away the whole great earth up to the edge of the ocean for the sake of a single word or syllable of the Dharma.

original: chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug byed pa'am /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug byed pa'am /
translated: He becomes the lord of all Dharmas.

original: mi dge ba'i chos las sems can rnams bzlog ste dge ba'i chos la rab tu sbyor ba'am /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i chos las sems can rnams bzlog ste dge ba'i chos la rab tu sbyor ba'am /
translated: It is to turn beings away from nonvirtue and to engage them in virtue.

original: skyes bu'i mtshan gcod pa mthong nas sdig pa'i las de dag las sems can de dag rnam par zlog par byed pa'am /
analyzed: skyes bu'i mtshan gcod pa mthong nas sdig pa'i las de dag las sems can de dag rnam par zlog par byed pa'am /
translated: It is to turn beings away from evil actions when one sees that they are being marked for capital punishment.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par sangs rgyas par 'jig rten thams cad du sgrog cing /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par sangs rgyas par 'jig rten thams cad du sgrog cing /
translated: It is to proclaim to the whole world that the TathƒÅgata has attained buddhahood.

original: gtsug lag khang dang pho brang gi longs spyod kyi phyir sa dang khams yongs su gtong ba'am /üîΩrim gro bya ba'i phyir bran @225a *//
analyzed: gtsug lag khang dang pho brang gi longs spyod kyi phyir sa dang khams yongs su gtong ba'am / rim gro bya ba'i phyir bran @225a *//
translated: It is to give away land and elements for the enjoyment of temples and palaces.

original: dang / las byed pa'i mi rnams gtong ba'am /
analyzed: dang / las byed pa'i mi rnams gtong ba'am /
translated: It is to give away servants and workers in order to serve.

original: slong ba la rim gro bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid 'bul ba'am /
analyzed: slong ba la rim gro bya ba'i phyir bdag nyid 'bul ba'am /
translated: It is to offer oneself to beggars in order to serve them.

original: chos la dad pas dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems rnyed nas rang gi lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro byed pa'am /
analyzed: chos la dad pas dga' zhing mgu ba'i sems rnyed nas rang gi lus kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro byed pa'am /
translated: It is to serve the TathƒÅgata with one‚Äôs own body out of faith in the Dharma, having found a mind of joy and delight.

original: bdag nyid sems can thams cad la gtong ba'am /
analyzed: bdag nyid sems can thams cad la gtong ba'am /
translated: It is to give oneself to all beings.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gro bya ba'i phyir rgyal srid yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad la rim gro bya ba'i phyir rgyal srid yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: In order to serve all the buddhas, they give away their kingdoms.

original: slong ba rnams ci rigs su yul dang mir bcas pa'am /
analyzed: slong ba rnams ci rigs su yul dang mir bcas pa'am /
translated: To beggars, they give whatever is appropriate, themselves, their land, and their people.

original: grong khyer dang rgyal po'i pho brang ngam /
analyzed: grong khyer dang rgyal po'i pho brang ngam /
translated: They give away their cities and royal palaces.

original: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: They give away all their ornaments.

original: slong ba la bu dang bu mo dang chung ma dag yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: slong ba la bu dang bu mo dang chung ma dag yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: To beggars, they give away their sons, daughters, and wives.

original: slong ba rnams la ci rigs su khyim thams cad yongs su sbyin zhing gtong ba'am /
analyzed: slong ba rnams la ci rigs su khyim thams cad yongs su sbyin zhing gtong ba'am /
translated: To beggars, they give away all their houses, whatever is appropriate.

original: bza' shing gi ra ba sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: bza' shing gi ra ba sbyin pa'am /
translated: They give away their pleasure groves.

original: slong ba sna tshogs dang / len pa sna tshogs dang / sems can sna tshogs dang / gang zag sna tshogs sems sna tshogs dang ldan pa la phyogs tha dad pa nas 'ongs ba tshad las 'das pa'i mi dang / mi sna tshogs dang / sbyin pa'i gnas sna tshogs la mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du ma grangs med pa rnams byed cing yongs su gtong ba'am /
analyzed: slong ba sna tshogs dang / len pa sna tshogs dang / sems can sna tshogs dang / gang zag sna tshogs sems sna tshogs dang ldan pa la phyogs tha dad pa nas 'ongs ba tshad las 'das pa'i mi dang / mi sna tshogs dang / sbyin pa'i gnas sna tshogs la mchod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong du ma grangs med pa rnams byed cing yongs su gtong ba'am /
translated: He gives and completely gives away to the various beggars, the various recipients, the various beings, the various individuals, the various minds, the countless humans who have come from the various directions, the various humans, the various worthy recipients, the countless hundreds of thousands of niyutas of ko·π≠is of great sacrifices.

original: de sbyin pa'i dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i tshe sems 'di ltar bskyed de yongs su bsngo zhing /üîΩdge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas gzugs shin tu @225b bzung ba /
analyzed: de sbyin pa'i dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i tshe sems 'di ltar bskyed de yongs su bsngo zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas gzugs shin tu @225b bzung ba /
translated: ‚ÄúWhen he gives away all the objects of his generosity, he should arouse his mind in this way and dedicate it:üîΩ‚ÄòBy following the essence of all wholesome roots, I have taken up form.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas tshor ba shin tu bzung ba /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas tshor ba shin tu bzung ba /
translated: By following the essence of all wholesome roots, I have taken up feeling.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas 'du shes shin tu bzung ba /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas 'du shes shin tu bzung ba /
translated: ‚ÄúThey have a well-taken perception because they have followed the essence of all roots of virtue.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas 'du byed shin tu bzung ba /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas 'du byed shin tu bzung ba /
translated: They have a well-taken formation because they have followed the essence of all roots of virtue.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas rnam par shes pa shin tu bzung ba /üîΩdge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas srid pa thams cad shin tu bzung ba /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas rnam par shes pa shin tu bzung ba / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas srid pa thams cad shin tu bzung ba /
translated: They have a well-taken consciousness because they have followed the essence of all roots of virtue.üîΩThey have a well-taken existence because they have followed the essence of all roots of virtue.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas 'khor shin tu bzung ba /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas 'khor shin tu bzung ba /
translated: They have a well-taken retinue because they have followed the essence of all roots of virtue.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas longs spyod shin tu bzung ba /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas longs spyod shin tu bzung ba /
translated: They have a well-taken enjoyment because they have followed the essence of all roots of virtue.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas sbyin pa shin tu bzung ba des dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying po'i rjes su song bas sbyin pa shin tu bzung ba des dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: They have a well-taken generosity because they have followed the essence of all roots of virtue. They dedicate those roots of virtue in the following way:

original: bla na med par dmigs nas bza' ba dang btung ba 'di dag 'di ltar btang ba dang / 'di ltar byin pa dang / 'di ltar chags pa med pa dang / 'di ltar bcings pa med pa dang / 'di ltar nye bar btang ba dang /
