analyzed: bla na med par dmigs nas bza' ba dang btung ba 'di dag 'di ltar btang ba dang / 'di ltar byin pa dang / 'di ltar chags pa med pa dang / 'di ltar bcings pa med pa dang / 'di ltar nye bar btang ba dang /
translated: They give away and offer these foods and drinks with the highest aim, and they give them away without attachment, without bondage, without holding on to them,üîΩwithout grasping, with a superior motivation, by giving away all things, without abiding in any reference point, and with a generous mind.

original: 'di ltar ma bzung ba dang / 'di ltar lhag par bsam pa dang / 'di ltar dngos po yongs su btang ba dang / 'di ltar dmigs pa la mi gnas pa dang / 'di ltar gtong ba dang ldan pas sems can thams cad ye shes kyi kha zas dang ldan pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar ma bzung ba dang / 'di ltar lhag par bsam pa dang / 'di ltar dngos po yongs su btang ba dang / 'di ltar dmigs pa la mi gnas pa dang / 'di ltar gtong ba dang ldan pas sems can thams cad ye shes kyi kha zas dang ldan pa dang /
translated: In this way, they make sure that all beings have the food of wisdom,

original: chags pa med pa la brtson pa /
analyzed: chags pa med pa la brtson pa /
translated: and they are diligent in being without attachment.

original: sems kyi zas yongs su shes pa @226a *//
analyzed: sems kyi zas yongs su shes pa @226a *//
translated: They know the food of the mind.

original: dang; chags pa med pa'i zas dang / dga' ba'i zas dang / zang zing med pa'i zas dang / ye shes kyis 'tsho ba dang / chos kyis brtan pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi sku la yang dag par spyod pa dang /
analyzed: dang; chags pa med pa'i zas dang / dga' ba'i zas dang / zang zing med pa'i zas dang / ye shes kyis 'tsho ba dang / chos kyis brtan pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung ba'i chos kyi sku dang / ye shes kyi sku la yang dag par spyod pa dang /
translated: food that is free of attachment, food that is delightful, food that is free of materiality, food that is sustained by wisdom, food that is sustained by the Dharma, the Dharma body that is sustained by roots of virtue, and the body of wisdom that is sustained by correct practice.

original: sbyin pa'i gnas dang / snying brtse ba'i kha zas rab tu len par gyur cig /üîΩces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zas sbyin pa de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa'i gnas dang / snying brtse ba'i kha zas rab tu len par gyur cig / ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zas sbyin pa de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: May I be a recipient of the food of compassion, a recipient of the food of the worthy.üîΩThus, the bodhisattva great being who gives food should dedicate it in this way.

original: byang chub sems dpa' btung ba'i sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' btung ba'i sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: When the bodhisattva gives drink, he should dedicate it in the following way:

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad chos kyi btung ba 'thung ba la brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i skom pa rgyun chad pa dang; sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi skom pa las mi ldog pa dang /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad chos kyi btung ba 'thung ba la brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa dang / 'jig rten pa'i skom pa rgyun chad pa dang; sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi skom pa las mi ldog pa dang /
translated: possess the path of the bodhisattvas, cut off worldly thirst, and never turn back from the thirst of the wisdom of the buddhas.

original: 'dod pa'i yul gyis skom pa las phyir ldog pa dang / chos kyis tshim pa'i dga' ba rab tu 'thob pa dang / chos kyi sku shin tu tshim pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis tshim par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / shes rab rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yul gyis skom pa las phyir ldog pa dang / chos kyis tshim pa'i dga' ba rab tu 'thob pa dang / chos kyi sku shin tu tshim pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis tshim par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / shes rab rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang /
translated: May they turn away from the thirst of objects of desire, attain the joy of being satisfied by the Dharma, be satisfied by the body of the Dharma, possess the mind that satisfies through samƒÅdhi, and enter the ocean of wisdom.

original: chos kyi ri rab dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi btung bas ngoms par gyur cig /
analyzed: chos kyi ri rab dang ldan pa dang / chos kyi btung bas ngoms par gyur cig /
translated: May they possess the Dharma‚Äôs Mount Meru and be satisfied by the water of the Dharma.‚Äù

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btung ba'i sbyin pa de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btung ba'i sbyin pa de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva dedicates the gift of water.

original: byang chub sems dpa' bro ba'i sbyin @226b pa skyon thams cad bsal nas rnam par dag pa skyur ba dang / mngar ba dang / kha ba dang / bro ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba sna tshogs kyi ro mchog dang ldan pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bro ba'i sbyin @226b pa skyon thams cad bsal nas rnam par dag pa skyur ba dang / mngar ba dang / kha ba dang / bro ba dang / tsha ba dang / bska ba sna tshogs kyi ro mchog dang ldan pa /
translated: The bodhisattvas‚Äô gift of flavors is the offering of pure flavors that have been freed of all faults, and that are endowed with the most excellent of tastes: sweet, sour, bitter, astringent, pungent, and bland.

original: shin tu 'jam pa'i ro mchog gi rnam pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: shin tu 'jam pa'i ro mchog gi rnam pa dang ldan pa /
translated: It is endowed with the most excellent of very soft flavors.

original: ro sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong bsags pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: ro sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong bsags pa dang ldan pa /
translated: It is endowed with a collection of quintillions of different flavors.

original: khams rnams mnyam zhing 'khrugs pa med par gzhog pas lus kyi stobs ston par byed pa /üîΩsems dga' ba /
analyzed: khams rnams mnyam zhing 'khrugs pa med par gzhog pas lus kyi stobs ston par byed pa / sems dga' ba /
translated: It is the offering of the strength of the body, which is brought about by the humors being in balance and not disturbed.

original: dad cing mos pa dang / spro ba dang / gsal ba bskyed pa /
analyzed: dad cing mos pa dang / spro ba dang / gsal ba bskyed pa /
translated: It is the offering of the mind, which is brought about by the arising of joy, faith, devotion, delight, and clarity.

original: zhim zhing tshul dang ldan pa'i ro'i dam par gyur pa /
analyzed: zhim zhing tshul dang ldan pa'i ro'i dam par gyur pa /
translated: It is the offering of the most excellent of delicious and proper flavors.üîΩIt is the offering of the inner sense faculties being purified.

original: nang gi dbang po rnam par dag par byed pa; lto la bde bas yang dag par ston pa /üîΩsnyoms pa thams cad sel bar byed pa /
analyzed: nang gi dbang po rnam par dag par byed pa; lto la bde bas yang dag par ston pa / snyoms pa thams cad sel bar byed pa /
translated: It is the offering of the stomach being comfortable.üîΩIt is the offering of the removal of all imbalances.

original: nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa /
analyzed: nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa /
translated: It is the offering of the pacification of all illnesses.

original: nad med par byed pa /
analyzed: nad med par byed pa /
translated: They give away and perfectly relinquish the various kinds of excellent tastes, the various kinds of tastes that are innumerable, countless, and beyond measure.

original: rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ro dam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa slong zhing len pa sna tshogs la sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di lta bu'i ro dam pa sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa slong zhing len pa sna tshogs la sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: When they do so, they dedicate those wholesome roots in this way:

original: sems can thams cad bdud rtsi'i ros brtan pa'i sems kyis ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bdud rtsi'i ros brtan pa'i sems kyis ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: ‚ÄòMay all sentient beings have the supreme taste of a stable mind through the taste of immortality.

original: sems can thams cad kha zas kyi ro thams cad kyi las yongs su shes shing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kha zas kyi ro thams cad kyi las yongs su shes shing /
translated: May all sentient beings understand the activity of all tastes and

original: chos kyi ro'i ye shes la rab tu gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: chos kyi ro'i ye shes la rab tu gnas par gyur cig /
translated: may they be established in the wisdom of the taste of the Dharma.

original: sems can thams cad gnas pa'i mtha'i chos kyi grong khyer du phyin te /
analyzed: sems can thams cad gnas pa'i mtha'i chos kyi grong khyer du phyin te /
translated: May all sentient beings reach the city of the Dharma that is the ultimate abode

original: chos kyi ro du ma'i chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: chos kyi ro du ma'i chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs par gyur cig /
translated: and may they realize the realm of the Dharma, which has many tastes.

original: sems @227a *// can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par byed pas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ngal zhugs shing chos kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems @227a *// can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par byed pas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / gdul ngal zhugs shing chos kyi sprin gyi char 'bebs par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be dedicated to ripening and guiding all beings, and may they rain down the Dharma clouds of the Dharma of the bodhisattvas.

original: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i chos kyi dga' bas rgyud tshim par gyur te /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i chos kyi dga' bas rgyud tshim par gyur te /
translated: May all sentient beings be satisfied with the unsurpassed joy of the Dharma.

original: ye shes mchog gi ro la sems rnam par gzhog par gyur cig /
analyzed: ye shes mchog gi ro la sems rnam par gzhog par gyur cig /
translated: May they be immersed in the taste of the supreme wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad ro thams cad kyi mtshan ma la mi 'dzin pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la brtson pa'i sems dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ro thams cad kyi mtshan ma la mi 'dzin pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la brtson pa'i sems dang ldan zhing /
translated: May all sentient beings have a mind that is dedicated to the Dharma of all the buddhas, without grasping at the characteristics of any taste.

original: ro'i mchog thams cad la chags pa med par gyur cig /
analyzed: ro'i mchog thams cad la chags pa med par gyur cig /
translated: May they be free from attachment to any supreme taste.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu 'jug pas byung bas chos kyi ro gcig par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu 'jug pas byung bas chos kyi ro gcig par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the single taste of the Dharma, since they are born from the engagement with all the qualities of the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa las phyir mi ldog cing ro mchog gi ngo bo nyid las byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa las phyir mi ldog cing ro mchog gi ngo bo nyid las byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings never turn back from the vehicle of omniscience and may they attain the nature of the supreme taste.

original: sems can thams cad dbang po thams cad dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ro tha dad pa med par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dbang po thams cad dbye ba'i ye shes la mngon par mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi ro tha dad pa med par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the taste of the Buddha‚Äôs Dharma, which is not differentiated, through their expertise in the wisdom that distinguishes all the faculties.

original: sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis tshim par spyod cing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis tshim par spyod cing /
translated: May all sentient beings enjoy the satisfaction of the unobstructed Dharma of the Buddhas,

original: chos kyi ros yid rgyas par gyur cig /
analyzed: chos kyi ros yid rgyas par gyur cig /
translated: and may their minds be nourished by the taste of the Dharma.

original: ces de ltar ro'i sbyin pa'i tshogs la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi ye shes chags pa med pa'i phung po sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i @227b phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ces de ltar ro'i sbyin pa'i tshogs la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi ye shes chags pa med pa'i phung po sna tshogs bsgrub pa'i @227b phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattva who is diligent in the accumulation of generosity with taste dedicates those wholesome roots in order to accomplish the various aggregates of unobstructed wisdom in all sentient beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' bzhon pa'i sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' bzhon pa'i sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: When the bodhisattva gives a vehicle, he dedicates the wholesome roots in this way:

original: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa la zhon par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa la zhon par gyur cig /
translated: ‚ÄòMay all sentient beings mount the vehicle of omniscience.

original: theg pa chen po rab tu thob cing rnam par zhig pa med pa'i theg pa dang / mchog gi theg pa dang / dam pa'i theg pa dang / mgyogs pa'i theg pa dang / stobs chen po'i theg pa dang / bsod nams dang ldan pa'i theg pa dang /
analyzed: theg pa chen po rab tu thob cing rnam par zhig pa med pa'i theg pa dang / mchog gi theg pa dang / dam pa'i theg pa dang / mgyogs pa'i theg pa dang / stobs chen po'i theg pa dang / bsod nams dang ldan pa'i theg pa dang /
translated: May they attain the Great Vehicle, the vehicle that is not destroyed, the supreme vehicle, the holy vehicle, the swift vehicle, the vehicle of great power, the vehicle of merit,

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / mtha' yas pa'i theg pas byung ste yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i theg pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / mtha' yas pa'i theg pas byung ste yon tan thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /
translated: the vehicle that transcends the world, the bodhisattva vehicle, and the infinite vehicle. May they be endowed with all good qualities.‚Äô

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhon pa'i sbyin par gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzhon pa'i sbyin par gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: Thus the bodhisattva great being dedicates the wholesome roots associated with the gift of a vehicle.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gos kyi sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis khrel yod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gos kyi sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis khrel yod pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: When the bodhisattva gives clothing, he dedicates the wholesome roots to the attainment of modesty and shame by all sentient beings.

original: chos kyis rab tu yog pa'i lus kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: chos kyis rab tu yog pa'i lus kyi phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates [the wholesome roots] to the attainment of a body covered with Dharma.

original: cha byad ngan pa thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: cha byad ngan pa thams cad rnam par bzlog par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates [the wholesome roots] to the abandonment of all bad appearances.

original: lus sba bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: lus sba bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates [the wholesome roots] to the attainment of a body that is hidden.

original: lus kyis 'khyud na lus la bde bar reg par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: lus kyis 'khyud na lus la bde bar reg par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates [the wholesome roots] to the attainment of a body that is pleasant to the touch when embraced.

original: kha dog dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //üîΩkha dog 'jam par bya ba'i phyir yongs @228a *//
analyzed: kha dog dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o // kha dog 'jam par bya ba'i phyir yongs @228a *//
translated: He dedicates [the wholesome roots] to the attainment of a pure complexion.üîΩHe dedicates [the wholesome roots] to the attainment of a smooth complexion.

original: su bsngo'o // kha dog shin tu 'jam par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: su bsngo'o // kha dog shin tu 'jam par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates [the wholesome roots] to the attainment of a very smooth complexion.

original: bde bar 'gro ba rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: bde bar 'gro ba rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates [the wholesome roots] to the attainment of a pleasant gait.

original: sangs rgyas bde bar bsnyen bkur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bde bar bsnyen bkur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that the Buddhas may be served and honored.

original: bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: I dedicate so that unsurpassed omniscience may be purified.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar byed do //
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo bar byed do //
translated: In this way, the Bodhisattvas dedicate the roots of virtue.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me tog gi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dra sna tshogs kyi me tog dang / kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'i me tog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i me tog du ma dang / mig tu 'ong ba'i me tog dang /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po me tog gi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dra sna tshogs kyi me tog dang / kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'i me tog dang / yid du 'ong ba'i me tog du ma dang / mig tu 'ong ba'i me tog dang /
translated: ‚ÄúWhen the Bodhisattva Mahasattva makes offerings of flowers, he offers various flowers, flowers of different colors, many beautiful flowers, pleasing flowers,

original: mi mthun pa med pa'i me tog dang / dus thams cad na yod pa'i me tog dang / lha rdzas dang mi'i me tog dang / 'od mdzes pa'i me tog dang / shin tu dri che zhing yid du 'ong bar mdzes pa'i me tog dang /
analyzed: mi mthun pa med pa'i me tog dang / dus thams cad na yod pa'i me tog dang / lha rdzas dang mi'i me tog dang / 'od mdzes pa'i me tog dang / shin tu dri che zhing yid du 'ong bar mdzes pa'i me tog dang /
translated: flowers without defects, flowers that bloom at all times, divine and human flowers, beautiful flowers, flowers with a very sweet fragrance, and flowers that are very beautiful and pleasing.

original: 'di lta bu'i me tog rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten rnams la 'bul ba dang / chos dkon mchog la mchod pa byed pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog la 'bul ba dang /üîΩdge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' la 'bul ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / pha dang ma rnams la sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe @228b chung du na bdag gi lus dang de ma yin pa gzhan bkren pa phongs pa slong zhing len pa sna tshogs la de dang de dag sbyin par bya ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar
analyzed: 'di lta bu'i me tog rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten rnams la 'bul ba dang / chos dkon mchog la mchod pa byed pa dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog la 'bul ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub sems dpa' la 'bul ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang / pha dang ma rnams la sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe @228b chung du na bdag gi lus dang de ma yin pa gzhan bkren pa phongs pa slong zhing len pa sna tshogs la de dang de dag sbyin par bya ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar
translated: They offer such flowers to the buddhas, to st≈´pas of the tathƒÅgatas, to the jewel of the Dharma, to the jewel of the Sa·πÖgha,üîΩto spiritual friends who are bodhisattvas, to ≈õrƒÅvakas and pratyekabuddhas, to their fathers and mothers,

original: yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: and to the poor, the destitute, and various beggars. When they give their bodies and other things to them, they dedicate the roots of virtue in the following way:

original: sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pas /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pa'i sems dang ldan pas /
translated: ‚ÄúMay all sentient beings have minds that are like fully blossomed flowers of all the teachings.

original: sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi me tog rgyas pa rab tu mthong bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi me tog rgyas pa rab tu mthong bar gyur cig /
translated: May they all see the fully blossomed flowers of the buddhas‚Äô meditative absorption.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la dga' ba rab tu rnyed nas blta na mi ngoms par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la dga' ba rab tu rnyed nas blta na mi ngoms par gyur cig /
translated: May all beings find delight in the buddhas and be insatiable in their gazing upon them.

original: sems can thams cad sems can kun gyi sems mi 'khrugs pas blta na yid du 'ong bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sems can kun gyi sems mi 'khrugs pas blta na yid du 'ong bar gyur cig /
translated: May all beings be pleasing to behold, their minds undisturbed by the thoughts of others.

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i las la lta zhing nye bar spyod pas lta ba yangs par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba'i las la lta zhing nye bar spyod pas lta ba yangs par gyur cig /
translated: May all beings have expansive vision, looking upon all virtuous actions and engaging in them.

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la lta ba dang / sems ma nyams pas rjes su lta ba'i dran pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad la lta ba dang / sems ma nyams pas rjes su lta ba'i dran pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all beings have the mindfulness of looking upon all spiritual teachers and following them without their minds ever degenerating.

original: sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs pa'i dug bsreg pa'i phyir dug sman bzang po nyams su myong ba lta bur gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi nyon mongs pa'i dug bsreg pa'i phyir dug sman bzang po nyams su myong ba lta bur gyur cig /
translated: May all beings be like the experience of a powerful antidote, burning away the poisons of the afflictions of all beings.

original: sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyal po chen po la 'gro ba thams cad 'god pas smon lam chen po mthong bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ye shes kyi rgyal po chen po la 'gro ba thams cad 'god pas smon lam chen po mthong bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings see the great aspiration, which is to establish all beings in the state of the great king of wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad sems can kun gyi rab rib dang / thing tog dang / mun pa bsal ba'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba mthong bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sems can kun gyi rab rib dang / thing tog dang / mun pa bsal ba'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba mthong bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings see the rising of the sun, in order to dispel the cataracts, blindness, and darkness of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad byang chub kyi zla 'od dge ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir zla ba lta bur @229a *//üîΩmthong bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad byang chub kyi zla 'od dge ba rnam par spel ba'i phyir zla ba lta bur @229a *// mthong bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings see the moon, in order to increase the virtuous light of the moon of enlightenment.

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong zhing chos kyi rnam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyis rgya mtsho'i rin po che'i gling du 'jug pa mthong bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong zhing chos kyi rnam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyis rgya mtsho'i rin po che'i gling du 'jug pa mthong bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings see the ocean, in order to attain all roots of virtue that are the aspects of the Dharma.

original: sems can thams cad kyis bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba rnam par dag pa rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba'i me tog yongs su gtong bar gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de ltar yongs su bsngo'o
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyis bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba rnam par dag pa rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba'i me tog yongs su gtong bar gtogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de ltar yongs su bsngo'o
translated: In this way, Bodhisattvas dedicate the roots of virtue connected with giving flowers to the attainment of the pure, unobstructed wisdom vision of all sentient beings.üîΩWhen Bodhisattvas give garlands, they dedicate the roots of virtue to the beauty of all sentient beings.üîΩThey dedicate the roots of virtue to the pleasantness of all sentient beings.

original: // byang chub sems dpa' phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de sems can thams cad blta na mdzes pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //üîΩblta na yid du 'ong ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //üîΩblta na bzang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //üîΩblta na sdug pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: // byang chub sems dpa' phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de sems can thams cad blta na mdzes pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o // blta na yid du 'ong ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o // blta na bzang ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o // blta na sdug pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate the roots of virtue to the goodness of all sentient beings.üîΩThey dedicate the roots of virtue to the loveliness of all sentient beings.

original: blta na mngon par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: blta na mngon par dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate the roots of virtue to the joy of all sentient beings.

original: blta na mya ngan med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: blta na mya ngan med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate the roots of virtue to the absence of sorrow of all sentient beings.

original: blta na rab tu dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: blta na rab tu dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate the roots of virtue to the delight of all sentient beings.

original: blta na yid mi bde ba med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: blta na yid mi bde ba med pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that there will be no unhappiness in looking at them.

original: sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ldan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ldan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate so that they will have the vision of the Buddhas.

original: bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa mthong ba rnam par dag pa 'thob pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: bla na med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa mthong ba rnam par dag pa 'thob pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: I dedicate so that they will attain the pure vision of unsurpassed omniscience.

original: de ltar na /
analyzed: de ltar na /
translated: In this way,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems @229b can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phreng ba'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems @229b can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: when the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva gives garlands, he dedicates those roots of virtue to all sentient beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar bsngo ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' spos kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar bsngo ste /
translated: When the bodhisattva gives incense, he dedicates those roots of virtue to all sentient beings in the following way:

original: spos yongs su btang bas bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad tshul khrims kyi spos dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: spos yongs su btang bas bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad tshul khrims kyi spos dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: By these roots of virtue gathered through giving incense, may all sentient beings possess the incense of discipline.

original: ma nyams pa'i tshul khrims dang / ma 'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang / rnyog pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'gyod pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / kun nas 'khor pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / yongs su gdung ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang /
analyzed: ma nyams pa'i tshul khrims dang / ma 'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang / rnyog pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'gyod pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / kun nas 'khor pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang / yongs su gdung ba med pa'i tshul khrims dang /
translated: May they have the discipline of not being corrupted, the discipline of not being mixed up, the discipline of not being sullied, the discipline of not having regrets, the discipline of not being turned around, the discipline of not being tormented,

original: log par ma zhugs pa'i tshul khrims dang / mtha' yas pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: log par ma zhugs pa'i tshul khrims dang / mtha' yas pa'i tshul khrims dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshul khrims dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: the discipline of not being perverted, the discipline of being limitless, the discipline of being beyond the world, and the discipline of the perfections of the bodhisattvas.

original: tshul khrims kyi phung po gang dang sangs rgyas thams cad dang ldan pa de'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang sems can thams cad ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi phung po gang dang sangs rgyas thams cad dang ldan pa de'i tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang sems can thams cad ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May they have the purity of discipline that all the buddhas have, and may all sentient beings have that same pure discipline.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //üîΩbam po sum cu rtsa lnga pa /
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o // bam po sum cu rtsa lnga pa /
translated: Thus, when the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva makes the gift of incense, he dedicates those roots of virtue for the sake of perfecting the aggregate of morality of all sentient beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' byug pa'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsdo ste /üîΩbyug pa'i sbyin pas yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad gtong @230a *//
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' byug pa'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsdo ste / byug pa'i sbyin pas yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad gtong @230a *//
translated: When the bodhisattva makes the gift of ointments, he dedicates those roots of virtue in the following way:

original: pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pas bsgos par gyur cig /
analyzed: pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pas bsgos par gyur cig /
translated: ‚ÄúBy the roots of virtue that I have accumulated through the gift of ointments, may all sentient beings give up all that is to be given up and become perfumed by generosity.

original: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu rnam par dag cing tshul khrims kyis bsgos par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims kyis shin tu rnam par dag cing tshul khrims kyis bsgos par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be perfumed by morality and be completely purified by the morality of the TathƒÅgata.

original: sems can thams cad chags pa med pa'i bsam pa rab tu thob cing bzod pas bsgos par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chags pa med pa'i bsam pa rab tu thob cing bzod pas bsgos par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the attitude of nonattachment and be suffused with patience.

original: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po la brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos shing brtson 'grus kyis bsgos par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po la brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos shing brtson 'grus kyis bsgos par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings don the armor of diligence in the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattvas and be suffused with diligence.

original: sems can thams cad da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pas bsam gtan gyis bsgos par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas mngon du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pas bsam gtan gyis bsgos par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the samadhi of the Buddhas of the present and be suffused with meditation.

original: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal po la skad cig gis rnam par dag cing shes rab kyis bsgos par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal po la skad cig gis rnam par dag cing shes rab kyis bsgos par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be instantly purified in the king of unexcelled wisdom and be suffused with wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'jigs pa med pa rab tu 'thob cing chos kyis bsgos par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'jigs pa med pa rab tu 'thob cing chos kyis bsgos par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the unexcelled Dharma of fearlessness and be suffused with the Dharma.

original: sems can thams cad yon tan thams cad kyi ye shes rab tu thob cing yon tan gyis bsgos par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad yon tan thams cad kyi ye shes rab tu thob cing yon tan gyis bsgos par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the wisdom of all good qualities and be suffused with good qualities.

original: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsngo ba thams cad kyis bsgos par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su bsngo ba thams cad kyis bsgos par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the perfection of the ten powers of the Tathagata and be imbued with all the dedications of the bodhisattvas.

original: sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spangs shing chos dkar pos bsgos par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i chos thams cad rab tu spangs shing chos dkar pos bsgos par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be imbued with virtuous qualities and abandon all non-virtuous qualities.

original: ces de ltar byang chub @230b sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byug pa'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub @230b sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byug pa'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: Thus, when the bodhisattva-mahƒÅsattva practices the generosity of ointments, he dedicates the roots of virtue in this way.

original: byang chub sems dpa' mal cha'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' mal cha'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: When the bodhisattva practices the generosity of bedding, he dedicates the roots of virtue in this way:

original: sems can thams cad shes rab dang / ye shes chen po thob pa'i phyir lha rdzas kyi mal cha rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad shes rab dang / ye shes chen po thob pa'i phyir lha rdzas kyi mal cha rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain divine bedding and obtain great wisdom and knowledge.

original: sems can thams cad so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi gos bgo ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi gos bgo ba'i phyir 'phags pa'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the bed of the noble ones, in order to clothe themselves in the garment of the thought of awakening, which is not the garment of ordinary beings.

original: sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir bde ba'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir bde ba'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the bed of happiness, in order to abandon all the sufferings of cyclic existence.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par rol ba'i cho 'phrul yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir rin po che lta bu'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par rol ba'i cho 'phrul yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir rin po che lta bu'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the bed that is like a jewel, in order to see the miracles of the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad chos thams cad legs par bkod pa'i gos bgo ba'i phyir mnyam pa med pa'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos thams cad legs par bkod pa'i gos bgo ba'i phyir mnyam pa med pa'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the incomparable bed, in order to clothe themselves in the garment of the good arrangement of all phenomena.

original: sems can thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zil gyis mi non pa rnam par dag pas rgya chen po'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos zil gyis mi non pa rnam par dag pas rgya chen po'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the vast bed, through the purity of the Dharma that is beyond the world and is not overwhelmed.

original: sems can thams cad chos kyi bde ba dang ldan pas dge ba'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos kyi bde ba dang ldan pas dge ba'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the bed of virtue, endowed with the happiness of the Dharma.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi dmigs pa la brtson pas shin tu dag pa'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig /üîΩsems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis @231a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi dmigs pa la brtson pas shin tu dag pa'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig / sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis @231a *//
translated: May all sentient beings attain the bed of complete purity, through diligence in the focus of the Buddhas.

original: bskyabs pa dang ldan pas shin tu brtan pa'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: bskyabs pa dang ldan pas shin tu brtan pa'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the bed of complete stability, through being protected by spiritual friends.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas gzims pa lta bur glo g-yas pas 'bebs pa dang ldan pas sengge'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas gzims pa lta bur glo g-yas pas 'bebs pa dang ldan pas sengge'i mal rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the bed of the lion, lying down with their right side to the ground, like the Buddha.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis shin tu bsam pa'i dbang po yang dag par rgyu ba dang ldan pa mal cha'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis shin tu bsam pa'i dbang po yang dag par rgyu ba dang ldan pa mal cha'i sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: Thus, when the bodhisattva, with mindfulness and vigilance, his faculties well concentrated, gives bedding, he dedicates the roots of virtue to all sentient beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnas kyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice generosity by giving away dwellings, they dedicate the goodness in this way:

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad yon tan gyi gnas la brtson zhing ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas spyod yul du gyur pa dang / gnas pa med cing rten pa med pa'i gnas nas mi g-yo ba dang / gnas thams cad rnam par sgom pa dang /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad yon tan gyi gnas la brtson zhing ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas spyod yul du gyur pa dang / gnas pa med cing rten pa med pa'i gnas nas mi g-yo ba dang / gnas thams cad rnam par sgom pa dang /
translated: ‚ÄòBy this root of goodness, may all beings be diligent in the practice of good qualities, and may they be in the sphere of meditative absorption, not moving from the state of no abode and no support, and may they meditate on all abodes.

original: 'jig rten gyi gnas nas rnam par 'das pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gnas yongs su zin pa dang / bla na med pa'i gnas kyi mthar phyin pa dang / bde ba'i gnas la brtson pa dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi gnas nas rnam par 'das pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas la gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi gnas yongs su zin pa dang / bla na med pa'i gnas kyi mthar phyin pa dang / bde ba'i gnas la brtson pa dang /
translated: May they transcend the abodes of the world, and may they abide in the abode of omniscience, and may they take possession of the abode of the Buddhas, and may they reach the ultimate abode that is unsurpassed, and may they be diligent in the abode of happiness.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas la shin tu gnas pa dang / bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gnas dang mi 'bral zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gnas la shin tu gnas pa dang / bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gnas dang mi 'bral zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la gnas par gyur cig /
translated: I will be a support for the roots of virtue, and I will not be separated from the state of unsurpassed buddhahood, but will abide in the purification of the buddhafields.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' @231b sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar sems pa /
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' @231b sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang / bde bar sems pa /
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva who thinks of the benefit and happiness of the whole world,

original: sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo bas yongs su skyob pa la gnas kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la de ltar yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la yongs su bsngo bas yongs su skyob pa la gnas kyi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la de ltar yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: who is established in the protection of all beings through complete dedication, when giving the gift of a dwelling, dedicates the roots of virtue in this way for all beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' rgyab rten gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rgyab rten gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: When the bodhisattva gives the gift of a support, he dedicates the roots of virtue in this way:

original: sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems kyis ye shes kyi rten chen po la spyod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rten la spyod pa dang / bla ma'i rten la spyod pa dang / legs par spyod pa'i rten la spyod pa dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun la phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems kyis ye shes kyi rten chen po la spyod pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rten la spyod pa dang / bla ma'i rten la spyod pa dang / legs par spyod pa'i rten la spyod pa dang /
translated: may they practice with the support of wisdom, may they practice with the support of spiritual friends, may they practice with the support of gurus, may they practice with the support of good conduct,

original: byams pa chen po'i rten la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rten la spyod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rten la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi sems shin tu yangs pa'i rten la spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam gyi rten la spyod cing /
analyzed: byams pa chen po'i rten la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rten la spyod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rten la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi sems shin tu yangs pa'i rten la spyod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam gyi rten la spyod cing /
translated: may they practice with the support of great love, may they practice with the support of great compassion, may they practice with the support of the six perfections, may they practice with the support of the vast mind of enlightenment, and may they practice with the support of the path of all bodhisattvas,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten la spyod par gyur cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rten la spyod par gyur cig /
translated: may they practice with the support of all buddhas.

original: ces yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ces yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: Thus, dedicate.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya brten gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad yon tan thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / shin tu dag par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgya brten gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad yon tan thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / shin tu dag par 'gyur ba dang / ye shes rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang /
translated: so that they would have complete purity, so that they would have pure wisdom,

original: lam rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / chos rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / bsam pa rnam par dag par @232a *//
analyzed: lam rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / chos rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / bsam pa rnam par dag par @232a *//
translated: so that they would have the pure path, so that they would have the pure Dharma, so that they would have pure intention,

original: 'gyur ba dang / mos pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / smon lam rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i yon tan dang / ye shes rnam par dag par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: 'gyur ba dang / mos pa rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / smon lam rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / mngon par shes pa'i yon tan dang / ye shes rnam par dag par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: so that they would have pure aspiration, so that they would have pure prayer, and so that they would have the pure qualities and wisdom of the higher knowledges.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste /üîΩtil mar gyi mar me'am /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di lta ste / til mar gyi mar me'am /
translated: The bodhisattva mahƒÅsattvaüîΩshould offer oil lamps,

original: mar gyi mar me'am /üîΩrin po che'i mar me'am /
analyzed: mar gyi mar me'am / rin po che'i mar me'am /
translated: ghee lamps,üîΩprecious lamps,

original: nor bu'i mar me'am /
analyzed: nor bu'i mar me'am /
translated: jewel lamps,

original: ro'i mar me'am /
analyzed: ro'i mar me'am /
translated: the oil of corpses,

original: mar me chen po'am /
analyzed: mar me chen po'am /
translated: great oil,

original: aa ga ru'i mar me'am /
analyzed: aa ga ru'i mar me'am /
translated: agaru oil,

original: tsandan gyi mar me'am /
analyzed: tsandan gyi mar me'am /
translated: sandalwood oil,

original: spos kyi ro thams cad kyi mar me'am /
analyzed: spos kyi ro thams cad kyi mar me'am /
translated: the oil of all incense flavors,

original: kha dog mtha' yas par snang ba'i mar me'am /
analyzed: kha dog mtha' yas par snang ba'i mar me'am /
translated: or the oil of infinite colors.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i mar me dag de yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa na /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i mar me dag de yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa byed pa na /
translated: When they give and offer such lamps,

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad la bde ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'gro ba thams cad la bde ba dang / 'gro ba thams cad bsdu ba'i phyir 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: they dedicate the roots of virtue to all beings, in order to bring them happiness and gather them, in this way:

original: mar me sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la snang ba mtha' yas par gyur cig /
analyzed: mar me sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la snang ba mtha' yas par gyur cig /
translated: ‚ÄòThrough this root of virtue of gathering with the gift of lamps, may all beings have the infinite light of the Dharma of all the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad 'jig rten thams cad shin tu phra ba dmigs par bya ba'i phyir snang ba shin tu gsal zhing dang bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'jig rten thams cad shin tu phra ba dmigs par bya ba'i phyir snang ba shin tu gsal zhing dang bar gyur cig /
translated: May all beings have the clear and bright light in order to observe the subtle world.

original: sems can thams cad sems can med pa'i khams yongs su shes shing snang ba rab rib med par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sems can med pa'i khams yongs su shes shing snang ba rab rib med par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings know the realm of the absence of sentient beings and be free of the darkness of ignorance.

original: sems can thams cad 'od 'gyed pa'i lus su mngon par byung zhing @232b snang ba mtha' yas par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'od 'gyed pa'i lus su mngon par byung zhing @232b snang ba mtha' yas par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have bodies that radiate light and be endowed with infinite radiance.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad la phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'od kun tu snang ba dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos thams cad la phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dang ldan zhing 'od kun tu snang ba dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have minds that are irreversible from all the teachings of all the buddhas and be endowed with the light of universal illumination.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byed pa dang ldan zhing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byed pa dang ldan zhing /
translated: May all sentient beings be endowed with the radiance that illuminates all buddhafields.

original: sangs rgyas kyi 'od rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi 'od rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May they attain the light of the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad 'od gcig gis rgyas par byed cing thogs pa med pa'i snang ba dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad 'od gcig gis rgyas par byed cing thogs pa med pa'i snang ba dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be endowed with unobstructed radiance that fills the entire realm of phenomena with a single light.

original: sems can thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i zhing du 'od zer rab tu 'gyed cing snang ba dpag tu med par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i zhing du 'od zer rab tu 'gyed cing snang ba dpag tu med par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings radiate light rays in inconceivable realms and become immeasurable sources of light.

original: sems can thams cad ye shes kyi skar mdas 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan zhing 'od snang ba'i skar mda'i rgyal po lta bur gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ye shes kyi skar mdas 'gro ba thams cad snang bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan zhing 'od snang ba'i skar mda'i rgyal po lta bur gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the light that illuminates all beings with the light rays of wisdom, and may they become like the king of the light rays of the shining stars.

original: sems can thams cad zhing kun tu 'od 'gyed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung zhing snang ba kha dog mtha' yas par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad zhing kun tu 'od 'gyed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung zhing snang ba kha dog mtha' yas par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the light of infinite colors that arises through the emanations that radiate light in all realms.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mar me'i sbyin pa rab tu gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / sems can thams cad la bde ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mar me'i sbyin pa rab tu gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / sems can thams cad la bde ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: Thus, when the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva makes the gift of lamps, he dedicates those roots of virtue for the benefit of all sentient beings and for the happiness of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung bas yongs su 'dzin to //
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung bas yongs su 'dzin to //
translated: He takes care of all sentient beings by being sustained by roots of virtue.

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bzung bas yang dag par 'dzin to //
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas yang dag par bzung bas yang dag par 'dzin to //
translated: He takes hold of all beings by means of the roots of virtue.

original: sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skal pas bgo @233a *//üîΩbsha' byed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skal pas bgo @233a *// bsha' byed do //
translated: He shares the roots of virtue with all beings.

original: sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa bas snying brtse bar byad do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa bas snying brtse bar byad do //
translated: He has compassion for all beings through the roots of virtue.

original: sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skal ba sbyin par byed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba'i skal ba sbyin par byed do //
translated: He gives the roots of virtue to all beings.

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas rab tu 'dzin to //
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas rab tu 'dzin to //
translated: He takes hold of all beings through the roots of virtue.

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas sbyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas sbyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
translated: He perfects the generosity of all beings through the roots of virtue.

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas dmigs par byed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa bas dmigs par byed do //
translated: He takes hold of all beings through the roots of virtue.

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par byed de //
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par byed de //
translated: He makes all beings equal through the equality of the roots of virtue.

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba shes pas rnam par dpyod par byed de; de ltar mar me sbyin pas bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ci nas kyang sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba shes pas rnam par dpyod par byed de; de ltar mar me sbyin pas bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de ci nas kyang sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rab tu dgod pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo ba
translated: They analyze the roots of virtue of all sentient beings, and in this way they dedicate the roots of virtue gathered from giving lamps so that the roots of virtue of all sentient beings are fully established.

original: thogs pa med par 'gro pas de lta de ltar yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: thogs pa med par 'gro pas de lta de ltar yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They dedicate in such a way that they are not obstructed.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nad kyi rkyen sman dang / yo byad sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: ‚ÄúWhen bodhisattva great beings give medicine and provisions for illness, they dedicate the roots of virtue in the following way:

original: de dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad dmigs pa kun las shin tu 'das par gyur cig /
analyzed: de dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad dmigs pa kun las shin tu 'das par gyur cig /
translated: ‚ÄòThrough these roots of virtue, may all sentient beings transcend all reference points.

original: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu thob cing lus nad med par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rab tu thob cing lus nad med par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the body of the thus-gone ones and be free from physical illness.

original: sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i nad thams cad sos par gyur te sman lta bur gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i nad thams cad sos par gyur te sman lta bur gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be cured of all nonvirtuous illnesses and become like medicine.

original: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab @233b tu gnas pa'i tshul gyis sman aa ga ru lta bur gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la rab @233b tu gnas pa'i tshul gyis sman aa ga ru lta bur gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings become like the agarwood tree, in the sense that they are all bodhisattvas firmly established on the irreversible level.

original: sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i dug gi gsal shing 'byin cing sangs rgyas kyi sman du gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa'i dug gi gsal shing 'byin cing sangs rgyas kyi sman du gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings become the medicine of the buddhas, pulling out the poisonous thorns of the afflictions.

original: sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing nye bar bgrod pa'i ngang tshul can du gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing nye bar bgrod pa'i ngang tshul can du gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the conduct and the way of approaching others that purifies all afflictions.

original: sems can thams cad shin tu mi 'khrugs pa'i chos dang ldan zhing sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad shin tu mi 'khrugs pa'i chos dang ldan zhing sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the quality of being completely unperturbed and become like the king of medicines.

original: sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad gso ba la zhugs shing sman gyi sdong po lta bur gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad gso ba la zhugs shing sman gyi sdong po lta bur gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings become like a medicinal tree, engaging in healing all beings.

original: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba rab tu thob cing nad thams cad byang bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba rab tu thob cing nad thams cad byang bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the light of omniscience and be cured of all their illnesses.

original: sems can thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sman gyi sbyor ba la brtson pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi sman la mkhas par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sman gyi sbyor ba la brtson pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi sman la mkhas par gyur cig /
translated: May I be a doctor for all beings, skilled in curing all the diseases of the world.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad shin tu gso ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad shin tu gso ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: Thus, when the bodhisattva is practicing medicine, he dedicates the roots of virtue to the healing of all beings.

original: shin tu bde zhing dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o;/
analyzed: shin tu bde zhing dga' ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o;/
translated: He dedicates them to the happiness and joy of all beings.

original: sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates them to the purification of all beings.üîΩHe dedicates them to the attainment of the health of the Buddhas by all beings.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas snyun mi mnga' ba lta bu rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o; ;sems can thams cad kyi zug rngu thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas snyun mi mnga' ba lta bu rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o; ;sems can thams cad kyi zug rngu thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates them to the removal of all the sicknesses of all beings.

original: sems can thams cad kyi lus nyams pa med cing brtan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi lus nyams pa med cing brtan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates them to the stability of the bodies of all beings.

original: sems @234a *// can thams cad rdo rje'i ri khor yug lta bur gzhom du mi chom pa dang / stobs dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems @234a *// can thams cad rdo rje'i ri khor yug lta bur gzhom du mi chom pa dang / stobs dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate [this virtue] so that all sentient beings will be invincible like diamond mountains, and will be endowed with strength.

original: sems can thams cad stobs thams cad kyis brtan cing bsam pa shin tu mtho ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad stobs thams cad kyis brtan cing bsam pa shin tu mtho ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate [this virtue] so that all sentient beings will attain the highest aspirations, and will be firm in all their strengths.

original: sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i rnam pa zil gyis mi non pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i rnam pa zil gyis mi non pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate [this virtue] so that all sentient beings will attain the complete bliss of the buddhas, which is not overwhelmed by anything.

original: sems can thams cad kyi lus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brtan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi lus sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brtan pa'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: I dedicate [this virtue] so that the bodies of all sentient beings will be firm through the blessings of all the buddhas.

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snod sna tshogs dang / bre dang / lnga bre'i sbyin pa byed pa 'di lta ste /

analyzed: mu sa ra gal ba'i snod dang / mu sa ra gal ba'i bre dang / lnga bre mu tig dmar pos yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste /

analyzed: aasma garbha'i snod dang / aasma garbha'i bre dang / lnga bre rin po che byi @234b ru dang / nor bu rin po che 'od zer snang bas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: containers of asmagarbha, measures of asmagarbha, and five-measure containers filled with precious beryl, and precious jewels that shine with light;

analyzed: rin po che shi la'i snod dang / rin po che shi la'i bre dang / lnga bre kha zas zhim po ro'i mchog sna tshogs kyis yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste /

analyzed: tsandan gyi snod dang / tsandan gyi bre dang / lnga bre lha rdzas lta bu'i gos phrugs kyis yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste /

analyzed: snod sna tshogs dngos po rnam pa tha dad pa'i tshogs kyis bkang ba dang / bre dang lnga bre du ma sna tshogs bsags par bye ba tshad med pa nor gyi dbyig dang / dngul dang / gser phyes yongs su bkang ba de dag yon gyi gnas bsam gyis mi khyab par mos pa'i sems dang ldan pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'bul lam /
translated: Do you offer to the BhagavƒÅn buddhas with a mind of devotion to the inconceivable field of merit, filling various vessels with various things, and with countless billions of measures and half-measures of wealth, silver, and gold dust?

analyzed: dge ba'i bshes gnyen shin tu dkon par sems bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa' dkon mchog thams cad la 'bul lam /

analyzed: 'phags pa'i skye bo la shin tu mos pa'i sems kyis gang zag gi rnam pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la 'bul lam /
translated: Do you offer to the ≈õrƒÅvakas and pratyekabuddhas, who are individuals, with a mind that has great devotion for the noble ones?

analyzed: bla ma la bsnyen bkur zhing bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba'i sems kyis pha dang ma dag la sbyin pa byed dam /
translated: Do you give to your father and mother with a mind that serves and respects the guru and attends to the spiritual friend?

analyzed: de dang de dag tu yon tan gyi tshogs bsags pa dang / @235a *//
translated: Do you offer to the master, the guru, and the one worthy of offerings with a mind that accumulates the collection of qualities in those places,

analyzed: gdams ngag dang / bslab pa dang / 'phags pa'i bstan pa la gnas par brtson pas slob dpon dang / bla ma dang / sbyin pa'i gnas la 'bul lam /
translated: that is intent on the instructions, training, and abiding in the teaching of the noble ones, and that is intent on the perfection of generosity in the ma·πá·∏çala of all past, future, and present bodhisattvas?

original: sems can thams cad la zhe mi sdang ba'i mig gis byams pa yongs su bsgoms shing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la zhe mi sdang ba'i mig gis byams pa yongs su bsgoms shing /

analyzed: gtong ba'i sems kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gcig tu nges par zhugs pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa thams cad brtson zhing tshogs chen po grangs med pas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su mi gtong zhing
translated: Do you strive in all generosity with a mind that is intent on the perfection of generosity, and do you not abandon the great, innumerable collection for the sake of all beings?

original: mi spang ba'i sems la shin tu gnas te sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad la mngon par ma chags pa dang / yon gyi gnas thams cad rab tu bzung ba'i sems la gnas pas bkres pa dang phongs pa'i slong ba rnams la snod sna tshogs dang /
analyzed: mi spang ba'i sems la shin tu gnas te sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad la mngon par ma chags pa dang / yon gyi gnas thams cad rab tu bzung ba'i sems la gnas pas bkres pa dang phongs pa'i slong ba rnams la snod sna tshogs dang /
translated: They are stable in their minds, which are focused on all those who are worthy of offerings. When they give to beggars who are hungry and destitute, filling various vessels

original: bre dang / lnga bre yo byad kyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su bkang ba de dag sbyin pa dang / yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: bre dang / lnga bre yo byad kyi tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas yongs su bkang ba de dag sbyin pa dang / yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: with different kinds of provisions, such as bushels and half-bushels, they dedicate those roots of virtue in the following way:

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad dran pa'i dbang po nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa dang ldan te /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad dran pa'i dbang po nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa dang ldan te /
translated: ‚ÄòThrough these roots of virtue, may all beings have the faculty of memory that is as vast as the realm of space.

original: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skad thams cad gzung ba dang / blang ba dang / yid la bya ba'i dran pa rmongs pa med cing snod tshad med pa'i snying po can du gyur cig /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i skad thams cad gzung ba dang / blang ba dang / yid la bya ba'i dran pa rmongs pa med cing snod tshad med pa'i snying po can du gyur cig /
translated: May they have the undeluded mindfulness of retaining, taking up, and keeping in mind all mundane and supramundane languages, and may they become the essence of immeasurable vessels.‚Äô

original: sems can thams cad @235b sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i chos can du gyur te /
analyzed: sems can thams cad @235b sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i chos can du gyur te /
translated: May all sentient beings become vessels for the profound Dharma of the buddhas, which is uninterrupted.

original: snod bzang po rnam par dag par gyur cig /
analyzed: snod bzang po rnam par dag par gyur cig /
translated: May they become pure and excellent vessels.

original: sems can thams cad 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'dzin pa'i chos can du 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'dzin pa'i chos can du 'gyur te /
translated: May all sentient beings become vessels for upholding the Dharma of all the buddhas of the past, present, and future.

original: bla na med pa'i snod rin po che lta bur gyur cig /
analyzed: bla na med pa'i snod rin po che lta bur gyur cig /
translated: May they become vessels for the unsurpassed jewel.

original: sems can thams cad 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub dbyer med pa la mos pas yang dag par bzung zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos yangs pa'i snod du gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byang chub dbyer med pa la mos pas yang dag par bzung zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos yangs pa'i snod du gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings become vessels for the vast Dharma of the buddhas, upholding the aspiration for the indivisible enlightenment of all the buddhas of the past, present, and future.

original: sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rgya che zhing mthu che ba la yang dag par gzhol bas rin po che'i snod rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa shin tu brgyan pa lta bur gyur cig /üîΩsems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa tshad med pa la mos pa rnam par dag cing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rgya che zhing mthu che ba la yang dag par gzhol bas rin po che'i snod rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa shin tu brgyan pa lta bur gyur cig / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' dang dbus med pa tshad med pa la mos pa rnam par dag cing /
translated: May all sentient beings become like precious vessels, well adorned with all the most excellent qualities, by their vast and powerful generation of the mind of enlightenment.

original: yon tan thams cad kyi snod dang 'byung gnas su gyur cig /
analyzed: yon tan thams cad kyi snod dang 'byung gnas su gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be vessels and sources of all good qualities, with pure interest in the boundless and limitless wisdom of the buddhas.üîΩMay all sentient beings reach the end of the wisdom of omniscience, with the unobstructed liberation of the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar gtugs te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi khongs su chud par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar gtugs te thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi khongs su chud par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be included within the wisdom of omniscience.

original: sems can thams cad sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus par thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la rab tu gzhag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha' bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i snod du gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sems can gyi khams thams cad ma lus par thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la rab tu gzhag pa'i phyir phyi ma'i mtha' bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i snod du gyur cig /
translated: May they be vessels for the bodhisattva conduct for the duration of all future kalpas, in order to establish all sentient beings, all realms of sentient beings without exception, in the power of omniscience.

original: sems can thams cad sangs @236a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs @236a *//
translated: May all sentient beings

analyzed: rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi yan lag gis chos bstan pa yang dag par 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te /
translated: have the intention to uphold the Dharma teachings given by the speech of all the buddhas.

original: yon tan mchog thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi snod du gyur cig /
analyzed: yon tan mchog thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi snod du gyur cig /
translated: May they be vessels for all supreme qualities and for the lineage of the buddhas of the three times.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la gsol ba 'debs pa dang / chos yongs su 'dri ba la smra ba'i sngon du 'gro ba'i skyes bur gyur te /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la gsol ba 'debs pa dang / chos yongs su 'dri ba la smra ba'i sngon du 'gro ba'i skyes bur gyur te /
translated: May all sentient beings become people who supplicate all the buddhas to turn the wheel of the Dharma and who are leaders in asking questions about the Dharma.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa gang bar byed pa shod ba'i snod du gyur cig /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa gang bar byed pa shod ba'i snod du gyur cig /
translated: May I become a vessel for proclaiming the ma·πá·∏çala of the retinue of all tathƒÅgatas filling the realm of space with worlds.

translated: In this way, the bodhisattva dedicates those roots of virtue so that the entire realm of sentient beings may become a vessel for the bodhisattva Samantabhadra‚Äôs conduct and aspirations to be fulfilled.

analyzed: bla ma dang / ston pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / dge 'dun dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sbyin pa'i gnas sna tshogs slong zhing len pa dang / phyogs gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i gang zag sna tshogs dang / phongs pa @236b dang / bkren pa slong ba dpag tu med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sgra thos te 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid ches pas skabs phye ste 'ongs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang /
translated: They are the gurus, teachers, spiritual friends, the Sa·πÖgha, ≈õrƒÅvakas, pratyekabuddhas, and various worthy recipients of offerings. original: gser gyi shing rta la dril bu'i dran bu'i dran pa rab tu 'khor bas brgyan pa rin po che'i srad bu'i lnga ldi bkye ba sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: gser gyi shing rta la dril bu'i dran bu'i dran pa rab tu 'khor bas brgyan pa rin po che'i srad bu'i lnga ldi bkye ba sbyin pa'am /
translated: a golden chariot adorned with a tinkling network of bells and draped with garlands of jewels;

original: bee d'urya'i shing rta la rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu spras pa sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: bee d'urya'i shing rta la rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu spras pa sbyin pa'am /
translated: a beryl chariot adorned with many trillions of jewels of various kinds;

original: dngul gyi shing rta la shin tu dag pa'i gser rab tu bzang po'i dra bas g-yogs shing rta cang shes la bcas pa rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas brgyan cing klubs pa sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: dngul gyi shing rta la shin tu dag pa'i gser rab tu bzang po'i dra bas g-yogs shing rta cang shes la bcas pa rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas brgyan cing klubs pa sbyin pa'am /
