translated: a silver chariot covered with a very fine and pure golden latticework, yoked with thoroughbred horses, and adorned with many trillions of jewels;

original: gser gyi shing rta la rin po che'i dra ba dang / rgyan thams cad phun sum tshogs pas brgyan cing glang po che cang shes la bcas pa sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: gser gyi shing rta la rin po che'i dra ba dang / rgyan thams cad phun sum tshogs pas brgyan cing glang po che cang shes la bcas pa sbyin pa'am /
translated: a golden chariot adorned with a latticework of jewels and all kinds of ornaments, yoked with thoroughbred elephants;

original: tsandan gyi shing rta la rin po che'i dam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu spras te rin po che'i sengge'i khris brgyan pa /
analyzed: tsandan gyi shing rta la rin po che'i dam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu spras te rin po che'i sengge'i khris brgyan pa /
translated: a sandalwood chariot adorned with various precious gems and ornamented with precious lion thrones,

original: na chung brgya phrag stong zhon pa rgyan thams cad dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs phun sum tshogs pa /
analyzed: na chung brgya phrag stong zhon pa rgyan thams cad dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi gdugs phun sum tshogs pa /
translated: with hundreds of thousands of young women riding on it, with parasols of all ornaments and all various precious gems,

original: skyes bu cang shes brgya stong du mas drangs pa sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: skyes bu cang shes brgya stong du mas drangs pa sbyin pa'am /
translated: drawn by many hundreds of thousands of wise men,

original: shel gyi shing rta la rin @237a *//
analyzed: shel gyi shing rta la rin @237a *//
translated: a crystal chariot

original: po che du mas kha dog rnam par 'byed par shin tu mdzes par byas shing /
analyzed: po che du mas kha dog rnam par 'byed par shin tu mdzes par byas shing /
translated: adorned with various precious gems that are beautifully colored,

original: na chung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pas yongs su gang ba /
analyzed: na chung bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pas yongs su gang ba /
translated: filled with countless hundreds of thousands of millions of young women,

original: rin po che'i bla re yog par bres pa /
analyzed: rin po che'i bla re yog par bres pa /
translated: covered with a precious canopy,

original: rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis phyogs bzhi nas brgyan pa sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis phyogs bzhi nas brgyan pa sbyin pa'am /
translated: adorned on the four sides with various banners and flags,

original: aasma garbha'i shing rta la rin po che sna tshogs du mas shin tu mdzes par byas te spos sna tshogs dri zhim pos bdugs pa /
analyzed: aasma garbha'i shing rta la rin po che sna tshogs du mas shin tu mdzes par byas te spos sna tshogs dri zhim pos bdugs pa /
translated: perfumed with the sweet scent of various incense,

original: spos kyi dam pa thams cad kyi byug pas rab tu byugs pa /
analyzed: spos kyi dam pa thams cad kyi byug pas rab tu byugs pa /
translated: smeared with the finest ointments,

original: me tog gi rgyan thams cad kyis chal par bkang ba /
analyzed: me tog gi rgyan thams cad kyis chal par bkang ba /
translated: filled with all kinds of flower garlands,

original: bu mo brgya phrag stong gis rin po che'i srad bu thogs te 'khrul pa med par drangs pa sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: bu mo brgya phrag stong gis rin po che'i srad bu thogs te 'khrul pa med par drangs pa sbyin pa'am /
translated: drawn by a hundred thousand girls holding precious cords,üîΩa chariot of various sweet scents, covered with a canopy of various cloths and garments,

original: dri zhim po sna tshogs kyi shing rta la ras dang gos sna tshogs kyi bla re bres pa rin po che'i dra bas yog par khebs pa /
analyzed: dri zhim po sna tshogs kyi shing rta la ras dang gos sna tshogs kyi bla re bres pa rin po che'i dra bas yog par khebs pa /
translated: covered with a precious net,üîΩpervaded by the sweet scent of incense,üîΩvery pleasing, pure, and agreeable,

original: spos dri zhim po shin tu yid du 'ong ba rnam par dag pa mi mthun pa med pa tshor na dga' ba shin tu 'thul ba mtshams kyi lha'i bus drangs pa /
analyzed: spos dri zhim po shin tu yid du 'ong ba rnam par dag pa mi mthun pa med pa tshor na dga' ba shin tu 'thul ba mtshams kyi lha'i bus drangs pa /
translated: drawn by the sons of the gods of the border regions,üîΩa precious wheel,

original: rin po che'i 'khor lo rin po che thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa sbyin pa'am /
analyzed: rin po che'i 'khor lo rin po che thams cad kyis shin tu brgyan cing mdzes par byas pa sbyin pa'am /
translated: adorned with all precious substances,

original: rin po che thams cad tshogs pa'i 'od 'byung ba'i shing rta la kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i rin po che rnam pa du ma'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: rin po che thams cad tshogs pa'i 'od 'byung ba'i shing rta la kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs su snang ba'i rin po che rnam pa du ma'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: The chariots are made of all precious substances and emit light. They are adorned with ornaments of many different precious substances with various colors.

original: rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i bla re bres pa /
analyzed: rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i bla re bres pa /
translated: They are covered with canopies of nets of various precious substances.

original: rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba mtha' yas pa kun nas dbyangs pa /
analyzed: rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba mtha' yas pa kun nas dbyangs pa /
translated: They are surrounded by endless garlands of various precious substances.

original: bu dang @237b bu mo bskyon pa /
analyzed: bu dang @237b bu mo bskyon pa /
translated: They are filled with sons and daughters.

original: spos sna tshogs kyi phye mas mtha' 'khor shin tu sbyangs pa /
analyzed: spos sna tshogs kyi phye mas mtha' 'khor shin tu sbyangs pa /
translated: They are surrounded by the finest powders of various incenses.

original: sbyin pa byed pa na de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa byed pa na de dag las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: When they give chariots to the Blessed Buddhas, they dedicate the goodness in this way:

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la yon tshad med pa 'bul bar dad cing sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam pa la shin tu mos par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas la yon tshad med pa 'bul bar dad cing sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam pa la shin tu mos par gyur cig /
translated: ‚ÄòMay all sentient beings have faith in making limitless offerings to the Buddhas, and may they be devoted to the highest object of giving.‚Äô

original: sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas la rab tu brten par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas mtha' yas pa rnam par dag pas sangs rgyas la rab tu brten par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be supported by the Buddha, through infinite purity as an object of generosity.

original: sems can thams cad gtong ba rgya chen po yongs su grub pas sangs rgyas thams cad la yongs su gtong bar mos par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad gtong ba rgya chen po yongs su grub pas sangs rgyas thams cad la yongs su gtong bar mos par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be intent on giving to all the Buddhas, through the perfection of vast generosity.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa rab tu thob cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi smon lam dang bral te sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis myong bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa rab tu thob cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi smon lam dang bral te sangs rgyas la bskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis myong bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the unobstructed liberation of the Buddhas, free from the aspirations of the Shravakas and Pratyekabuddhas, and experience the wisdom of omniscience, which is the quality of having generated the Buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad mtha' yas pa'i ye shes la shin tu mos shing sangs rgyas la yon gsol ba zad mi shes par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad mtha' yas pa'i ye shes la shin tu mos shing sangs rgyas la yon gsol ba zad mi shes par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be intent on infinite wisdom and make inexhaustible offerings to the Buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal pos rnam par dag cing ye shes kyi mchog la rab tu brten par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi rgyal pos rnam par dag cing ye shes kyi mchog la rab tu brten par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings become kings of unsurpassable pristine awareness, pure and well-established in the highest pristine awareness.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad du 'gro ba thob ste gang du dga' bar 'gro bar gyur cig /üîΩsems can thams cad ye shes mtha' yas pa'i @238a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul thams cad du 'gro ba thob ste gang du dga' bar 'gro bar gyur cig / sems can thams cad ye shes mtha' yas pa'i @238a *//
translated: May all sentient beings attain the miraculous powers of the Buddhas and go wherever they wish.

original: 'byung gnas la rab tu 'khod pa 'grub pa'i phyir ye shes chen po la rab tu brten par gyur cig /üîΩsems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zhing las rnam par skye ba'i chos can du gyur te bsod nams kyi zhing dam par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'byung gnas la rab tu 'khod pa 'grub pa'i phyir ye shes chen po la rab tu brten par gyur cig / sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zhing las rnam par skye ba'i chos can du gyur te bsod nams kyi zhing dam par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be well-established in great pristine awareness, in order to achieve the state of being a source of infinite pristine awareness.üîΩMay all sentient beings become the highest field of merit, born from the field of omniscience.

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing sangs rgyas thams cad la mi dga' ba med pa'i sems su gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bskyed pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos shing sangs rgyas thams cad la mi dga' ba med pa'i sems su gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be filled with devotion to the pristine awareness of the Buddhas, having planted all the roots of virtue, and may they never be displeased with any of the Buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du ngal ba med par zhugs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sgrub pa lhun gyis grub par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad du ngal ba med par zhugs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sgrub pa lhun gyis grub par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings effortlessly enter into all the realms of phenomena in a single instant of mind and spontaneously accomplish all the buddhafields.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad kyi drung du phyin pas byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du shin tu rnam par phye ba'i lus la rab tu zhugs par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas skye ba thams cad kyi drung du phyin pas byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du shin tu rnam par phye ba'i lus la rab tu zhugs par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings, having gone into the presence of all the buddhas, enter into the bodies that pervade the entire realm of space through the super-knowledge of the bodhisattvas.

original: sems can thams cad gnas dpe med pa'i lus rab tu thob pas ngal zhing dub pa med par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad gnas dpe med pa'i lus rab tu thob pas ngal zhing dub pa med par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the body of the incomparable abode and go to all the world systems without any fatigue.

original: sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i yid kyis 'gro ba dang ldan zhing lus kyi mgyogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i yid kyis 'gro ba dang ldan zhing lus kyi mgyogs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the mind of non-returning and have the perfect swiftness of body.

original: sems can thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig gis bsam pa dang khams khyab par byed pas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba @238b thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i snang ba gzhan zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sems kyi skad cig gcig gis bsam pa dang khams khyab par byed pas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul ba @238b thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i snang ba gzhan zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / khyu mchog gi mthu 'byin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the perfection of the power of the supreme leader, the blessing of all the buddhas, and the manifestation that reveals all the emanations of the buddhas by pervading the thoughts and dispositions of all sentient beings in a single instant of mind.

original: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'gro ba la bde bar 'gro bas rab tu brtson par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rjes su 'gro ba la bde bar 'gro bas rab tu brtson par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be diligent in following the conduct of all bodhisattvas with a happy gait.

original: sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i ye shes thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par 'gro ba thob pas shin tu myur du 'gro bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i ye shes thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug par 'gro ba thob pas shin tu myur du 'gro bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings go very quickly, having attained the perfection of going to the ultimate end of all the wisdoms of the ten powers without exception.

original: sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad tha mi dad par 'jug pa la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad du 'gro ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad tha mi dad par 'jug pa la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad du 'gro ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the perfection of going to all the realms of the world, so that they may enter into the non-differentiation of the realm of reality.

original: sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / tshul shes te byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa khong du chud pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas 'dod par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / tshul shes te byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa khong du chud pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas 'dod par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the perfection of understanding the domain of omniscience that is irreversible, and may they come to understand the way of the conduct of the bodhisattva Samantabhadra.

original: sems can thams cad chos nyid thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing chos ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bas 'dra ba med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos nyid thams cad kyi rjes su song zhing chos ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bas 'dra ba med pa'i ye shes kyi tshul thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the way of non-dual wisdom, and may they see reality just as it is, in accordance with the nature of reality.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon du gyur pa'am /
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mngon du gyur pa'am /
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva should practice in the presence of the tathƒÅgatas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la shing rta 'bul pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa bsgribs pa med par @239a *//üîΩ'byung ba'i mthar phyin par yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mchod rten la shing rta 'bul pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa bsgribs pa med par @239a *// 'byung ba'i mthar phyin par yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: When they offer a chariot to a st≈´pa of a TathƒÅgata who has entered NirvƒÅ·πáa, they dedicate the wholesome roots to the attainment of the TathƒÅgatas‚Äô vehicle, which is unobstructed and reaches the end of the world.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad la 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: When Bodhisattva-MahƒÅsattvas offer a chariot to a good and wise advisor, they dedicate the wholesome roots to sentient beings in the following way:

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad byas pa'i drin mi gtong ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi gtong ba'i sems stong ba med par gyur cig /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad byas pa'i drin mi gtong ba'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi gtong ba'i sems stong ba med par gyur cig /
translated: ‚ÄúMay all sentient beings never abandon a good and wise advisor, because they do not forget the kindness of others.

original: sems can thams cad skal pa mnyam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang don mthun par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad skal pa mnyam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang don mthun par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the same wholesome roots as their good and wise advisors.

original: sems can thams cad gtong ba dang / yongs su gtong ba thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bla ma'i rim gros cher brtson par gyur cig /üîΩsems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang nye bar byas te spyad pa bsgrub pa'i phyir bsam pa dge ba dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad gtong ba dang / yongs su gtong ba thams cad kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bla ma'i rim gros cher brtson par gyur cig / sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang nye bar byas te spyad pa bsgrub pa'i phyir bsam pa dge ba dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be devoted to spiritual teachers, striving with the highest respect to serve them, giving up all they have and all sentient beings.üîΩMay all sentient beings have virtuous thoughts, so that they may practice the spiritual teachers‚Äô instructions.

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mthun pa'i bsnyen bkur la nan tan byed pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mthun pa'i bsnyen bkur la nan tan byed pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be diligent in serving the spiritual teachers, so that they may always see them.

original: sems can thams cad sems 'khrul pa med cing nyams pa med pa dang 'dres pa med cing rnyog pa med pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la grol ba'i bsam pa can du gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sems 'khrul pa med cing nyams pa med pa dang 'dres pa med cing rnyog pa med pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la grol ba'i bsam pa can du gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the intention to be free, so that their minds may be free from confusion, decline, mixing, and turbidity.

original: sems can thams cad yo byad ci 'dod pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la lus @239b yongs su gtong bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad yo byad ci 'dod pa rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen la lus @239b yongs su gtong bar gyur cig /
translated: May I give my body to spiritual teachers in order to provide all sentient beings with whatever material necessities they wish for.

original: sems can thams cad byams pa dang ldan zhing 'khon med par rim gro byed pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung zhing rab tu brtan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad byams pa dang ldan zhing 'khon med par rim gro byed pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung zhing rab tu brtan par gyur cig /
translated: May I be sustained by spiritual teachers and be very stable in order to be loving to all sentient beings and to serve them without resentment.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kun tu mthun pa yang dag par mnyam pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mthun par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kun tu mthun pa yang dag par mnyam pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mthun par gyur cig /
translated: May I be in harmony with spiritual teachers in order to be in harmony with all the teachings of the Buddha.

original: sems can thams cad smon lam gcig pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las 'byung ba dang / stobs kyi mthar gtugs pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa dang mthun zhing gcig par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad smon lam gcig pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las 'byung ba dang / stobs kyi mthar gtugs pa'i phyir dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa yongs su dag pa dang mthun zhing gcig par gyur cig /
translated: May I be in harmony with the roots of virtue and the ripening of karma of spiritual teachers in order to be in harmony with all sentient beings through a single aspiration, and in order to reach the end of the power of the bodhisattva way of life.

original: sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa ye shes mngon par shes pas shes rab bzang pos chos kyi brtson 'grus la shin tu byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul pa ye shes mngon par shes pas shes rab bzang pos chos kyi brtson 'grus la shin tu byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have excellent wisdom, knowing the miracles of all the objects of samadhi through higher knowledge, and may they be completely dedicated to the practice of the Dharma.

original: sems can thams cad chos thams cad gzung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthas gtugs par khong du chud pas rig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos thams cad gzung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthas gtugs par khong du chud pas rig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the perfection of knowledge, having understood the ultimate perfection of the retention of all the teachings.

original: sems can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i theg pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar gtugs te theg pa chen pos mngon par spyod cing yang dag par gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i theg pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar gtugs te theg pa chen pos mngon par spyod cing yang dag par gnas par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings practice and abide in the Great Vehicle, having reached the state of omniscience through the unobstructed vehicle.

original: sems can thams cad bde ba'i phyogs las phyir mi ldog pa'i yid dang ldan zhing 'gro ba thams cad shes pa'i ye shes 'dzin par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bde ba'i phyogs las phyir mi ldog pa'i yid dang ldan zhing 'gro ba thams cad shes pa'i ye shes 'dzin par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have minds that never turn back from the side of happiness and may they hold the wisdom that knows all beings.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos @240a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos @240a *//
translated: May all sentient beings

original: la ji ltar thos pa bzhin du rmongs pa med pas chos thams cad la rab tu gzhol zhing ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: la ji ltar thos pa bzhin du rmongs pa med pas chos thams cad la rab tu gzhol zhing ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i mngon par shes pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the supernormal knowledge of realizing things as they are, and may they be dedicated to all the teachings, free of confusion about them, just as they have heard them.

original: sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad la 'byung ba'i mthar thug ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad la 'byung ba'i mthar thug ste sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba'i yid dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have minds that are accepted by all the buddhas, with unobstructed pristine awareness with respect to all phenomena, reaching the ultimate point of their manifestation.

original: sems can thams cad nyams pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dpe med pa rab tu thob pas mgyogs pa dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad nyams pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dpe med pa rab tu thob pas mgyogs pa dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas 'gro bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings go with the highest speed, having attained the incomparable miraculous powers that are not subject to decline.

original: sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / theg pa chen pos 'dul ba la rab tu zhugs pas 'gro zhing 'ong ba phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang / theg pa chen pos 'dul ba la rab tu zhugs pas 'gro zhing 'ong ba phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have perfect coming and going, having set out to ripen all beings and to train them in the Great Vehicle.

original: sems can thams cad ye shes kyi shing rtas 'gro ba'i mthar thug pas gti mug med par 'gro bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ye shes kyi shing rtas 'gro ba'i mthar thug pas gti mug med par 'gro bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings go without delusion, having reached the ultimate destination of the chariot of wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul shes shing chags pa med pa'i shing rta bzhon pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyis thams cad du 'gro ba'i tshul shes shing chags pa med pa'i shing rta bzhon pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings know the way to go everywhere with unobstructed wisdom, and may they have the chariot of nonattachment.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shing rta 'bul ba dang / yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad @240b la tshul gyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas bsnyen cing bkur ba'i yongs su sgrub pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shing rta 'bul ba dang / yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad @240b la tshul gyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas bsnyen cing bkur ba'i yongs su sgrub pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: Thus, when the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva offers a chariot to the spiritual friend, he dedicates those roots of virtue that are taken hold of by the offering and giving in this way for the sake of all sentient beings, so that they may be purified by the practice of serving and venerating all the buddhas and bodhisattvas, and so that they may become of one taste with the continuum of the buddhas and bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa thams cad la shin tu bslab pa'i sems dang ldan pa shes rab kyis shin tu rtogs pa'i bsam pa can /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa thams cad la shin tu bslab pa'i sems dang ldan pa shes rab kyis shin tu rtogs pa'i bsam pa can /
translated: the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva who had the intention of training well in all generosity, who had the intention of understanding well through wisdom,

original: yon tan gyis rnam par dag pa'i yid dang ldan pa /
analyzed: yon tan gyis rnam par dag pa'i yid dang ldan pa /
translated: who had the mind that was pure with good qualities,

original: mthun par yongs su gtong pa'i bsam pa can; dge 'dun rin po che shin tu dkon pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: mthun par yongs su gtong pa'i bsam pa can; dge 'dun rin po che shin tu dkon pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: who had the intention of giving away in accordance with the Dharma, who had the mind that the precious sa·πÖgha was extremely rare,

original: tshogs rin po che la shin tu mos pa'i bsam pa can /
analyzed: tshogs rin po che la shin tu mos pa'i bsam pa can /
translated: who had the intention of being devoted to the precious accumulation,

original: bstan pa rab tu gzung ba'i yid dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bstan pa rab tu gzung ba'i yid dang ldan pa /
translated: who had the mind of upholding the teachings,

original: lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu brtan pa'i bsam pa can /
analyzed: lhag pa'i bsam pa shin tu brtan pa'i bsam pa can /
translated: who had the intention of having a very firm superior intention,

original: rim gro byed pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: rim gro byed pa dang ldan pa /
translated: who had the service,

original: mchod sbyin chen po'i mchod sbyin shin tu byas pa /
analyzed: mchod sbyin chen po'i mchod sbyin shin tu byas pa /
translated: who had made the sacrifice of a great sacrifice,

original: bstan pa'i yon tan chen po brjod pa /
analyzed: bstan pa'i yon tan chen po brjod pa /
translated: who had described the great qualities of the teachings,

original: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yon tan tha mi dad pas 'od gsal zhing rnyog pa med par dag pa de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yon tan tha mi dad pas 'od gsal zhing rnyog pa med par dag pa de /
translated: and who had the pure, stainless, and clear teachings of the Buddha that were not different in quality.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe dge 'dun dkon mchog la shing rta phul bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe dge 'dun dkon mchog la shing rta phul bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: When offering a chariot to the Jewel of the Sa·πÖgha of the TathƒÅgatas, they dedicate the roots of virtue in the following way:

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la yang dag par gzhol bas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la yang dag par gzhol bas yang dag par zin par gyur cig /
translated: ‚ÄòThrough these roots of virtue, may all sentient beings be sustained by engaging in the teachings of the Buddha.

original: sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i skye mched las chos gzhan med par shin tu grub pas sems nang du gzhol bar gyur cig /üîΩsems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos gcig nas gcig tu @241a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i skye mched las chos gzhan med par shin tu grub pas sems nang du gzhol bar gyur cig / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos gcig nas gcig tu @241a *//
translated: May all sentient beings be sustained by the inner mind, since they are established in the noble spheres without any other phenomena.

original: brgyud pas yang dag par bzung bas 'phags par red par gyur cig /
analyzed: brgyud pas yang dag par bzung bas 'phags par red par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be sustained by the noble lineage of the buddhas, since they are sustained by the transmission of the Dharma from one buddha to the next.

original: sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyi shes pas yid ches par bya bas grangs su bgrang bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'jig rten kun gyi shes pas yid ches par bya bas grangs su bgrang bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be counted among the noble ones, since they are trusted by the knowledge of the entire world.

original: sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings mi gnyis pa'i rang bzhin shes pa khong du chud pas chags pa med pa'i dbyings la yang dag par gzhol bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings mi gnyis pa'i rang bzhin shes pa khong du chud pas chags pa med pa'i dbyings la yang dag par gzhol bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings enter the realm of nonattachment, having understood the nature of the nondual basic space of phenomena.

original: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul gyis yang dag par byung bas cang shes kyi kun nas bskor bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul gyis yang dag par byung bas cang shes kyi kun nas bskor bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be surrounded by those who are spiritually advanced, having emerged through the domain of the wisdom of the tathagatas.

original: sems can thams cad nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad dang bral bas nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la spyod par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rdul thams cad dang bral bas nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la spyod par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings engage in the practice of the Dharma free of afflictive emotions, being free of the dust of the subsidiary afflictive emotions.

original: sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i dge 'dun so so'i skye bo med pa'i sas bla na med pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog rab tu brjod par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'phags pa'i dge 'dun so so'i skye bo med pa'i sas bla na med pa'i dge 'dun dkon mchog rab tu brjod par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings proclaim the unsurpassed jewel of the spiritual community, the level of the noble community that is free of ordinary individuals.

original: sems can thams cad chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes la shin tu brtson pa'i chos can du gyur te 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chags pa med par gyur pa'i ye shes la shin tu brtson pa'i chos can du gyur te 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings possess the Dharma of the noble ones, being endowed with the wisdom of nonattachment and being dedicated to practice.

original: sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad kyis gos pa med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing tshogs kyi rgyal po dam par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad khams gsum thams cad kyis gos pa med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing tshogs kyi rgyal po dam par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have a mind that is unstained by the three worlds and become the supreme king of assemblies.

original: sems can thams cad ye shes kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la mkhas pas legs par bcas pa'i ye shes kyi bzhon pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ye shes kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la mkhas pas legs par bcas pa'i ye shes kyi bzhon pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the wisdom vehicle that is well-equipped with the skill to turn the wheel of the Dharma of wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud brjod du med pa'i yang @241b brjod du med par shin tu 'gro ba'i 'gros la mkhas pas sems skad cig gi rdzu 'phrul rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud brjod du med pa'i yang @241b brjod du med par shin tu 'gro ba'i 'gros la mkhas pas sems skad cig gi rdzu 'phrul rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the miraculous power of a single instant of mind, with skill in the way of going to the indescribable, indescribable number of world systems.

original: sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing nam mkha' lta bu'i lus kyi shing rta sgrub par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing nam mkha' lta bu'i lus kyi shing rta sgrub par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the wisdom that is unobstructed in all world systems and accomplish the chariot of the space-like body.

original: sems can thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par khyab par byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par khyab par byed pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'gro ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings reach the perfection of going to the circle of followers of all the tathagatas, pervading the realm of space and the realm of the Dharma of the tathagatas.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par gang du dga' bar 'gro zhing rgyu ba dang ldan pas lus yang ba'i khyad par rjes su rtogs pa rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ma lus par gang du dga' bar 'gro zhing rgyu ba dang ldan pas lus yang ba'i khyad par rjes su rtogs pa rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the special lightness of body that comes from being able to go and move about in all the buddhafields without exception, wherever they wish.

original: sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus yang dag par ston pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi 'khor mtha' yas pa la mkhas par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus yang dag par ston pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul gyi 'khor mtha' yas pa la mkhas par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be skilled in the infinite circles of miracles, in order to manifest their bodies in all the world systems.

original: sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus 'phos pa med par 'gro ba yang dag par ston pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul chen po'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus 'phos pa med par 'gro ba yang dag par ston pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul chen po'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig /
translated: May they attain the perfection of the power of the supreme miraculous abilities of the great miracles, in order to manifest the bodies of all sentient beings in all world systems without moving from their own place.

original: sems can thams cad mig yor lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la mi gnas pa'i lus rab tu thob par gyur cig /üîΩsems can thams cad dus la ji ltar bab par sems can yongs su @242a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad mig yor lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba mngon par sgrub pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la mi gnas pa'i lus rab tu thob par gyur cig / sems can thams cad dus la ji ltar bab par sems can yongs su @242a *//
translated: May all sentient beings attain a body that is not located in any buddha realm, through the attainment of the wisdom that manifests the going of beings by means of the miraculous abilities of optical illusions.

original: smin par byed cing 'dul ba mi gtong ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par ston par gyur cig /
analyzed: smin par byed cing 'dul ba mi gtong ba'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par ston par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings manifest the power of the supreme miraculous abilities of the inconceivable, in order to never give up the ripening and taming of sentient beings in accordance with the right time.

original: sems can thams cad skad cig gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad la chags pa med cing bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul gyis sems skad cig gcig gis phyogs thams cad du 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul la mngon par mkhas par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad skad cig gcig gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad la chags pa med cing bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul gyis sems skad cig gcig gis phyogs thams cad du 'gro ba'i rdzu 'phrul la mngon par mkhas par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings become skilled in the magic power of going in all directions in a single instant of mind, without attachment and without obstruction in the entire realm of phenomena.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge 'dun la shing rta 'bul zhing yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de ltar sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta la gnas pa
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge 'dun la shing rta 'bul zhing yongs su gtong bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag de ltar sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta la gnas pa
translated: In this way, when the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva offers and gives a chariot to the Sa·πÖgha, he dedicates those roots of virtue in this way: ‚ÄòMay all sentient beings ride the chariot of unsurpassed wisdom

original: rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad shes pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: rnam par dag par 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo dang / chos kyi dbyings thams cad shes pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: and attain the pure Dharma wheel and the wisdom wheel that turns the wheel of the Dharma in the entire realm of phenomena.‚Äô

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes nye bar gzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pa /üîΩrim gro can /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i gnas kyi 'du shes nye bar gzhag pa'i sems dang ldan pa / rim gro can /
translated: Moreover, the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva had a mind that was imbued with the perception of being a recipient of generosity.üîΩHe was respectful,

original: zhes dang ldan pa /
analyzed: zhes dang ldan pa /
translated: devoted,

original: bdag nyid che ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho'i tshul la mkhas pa /
analyzed: bdag nyid che ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho'i tshul la mkhas pa /
translated: skilled in the ways of the ocean of the great qualities of greatness,

original: yon tan dang ye shes kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs dang ldan pa /
analyzed: yon tan dang ye shes kyi 'byung gnas kyi rigs dang ldan pa /
translated: endowed with the family that is the source of qualities and wisdom,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la rnam par sems pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la rnam par sems pa /
translated: contemplating the qualities of the tathƒÅgatas,

original: mthu chen por skyes pa /
analyzed: mthu chen por skyes pa /
translated: born with great power,

original: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems dang @242b ldan pa; byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dus brjod du med pa thams cad du spyod pa rnam par spyad pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
analyzed: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems dang @242b ldan pa; byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dus brjod du med pa thams cad du spyod pa rnam par spyad pa la rab tu zhugs pa /
translated: with a mind that had been cultivated for quintillions of eons, engaged in the conduct of all the inexpressible eons of bodhisattva conduct,

original: bdud kyi bcings pa thams cad las sems rab tu grol ba /
analyzed: bdud kyi bcings pa thams cad las sems rab tu grol ba /
translated: with a mind completely liberated from all the bonds of MƒÅra,

original: bdud du ma'i sde dang bdud thams cad kyi shes pa'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
analyzed: bdud du ma'i sde dang bdud thams cad kyi shes pa'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
translated: He had the power to destroy the armies of many mƒÅras and the power of knowledge to destroy all mƒÅras.

original: gzhal du med pa'i chos la mkhas pas snang bar gyur pa de /
analyzed: gzhal du med pa'i chos la mkhas pas snang bar gyur pa de /
translated: He was illuminated by his skill in the Dharma of the unfathomable.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe shing rta yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe shing rta yongs su btang bas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: ‚ÄúWhen he gave a chariot to the ≈õrƒÅvakas and pratyeka¬≠buddhas, he dedicated that root of merit in the following way:

original: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i sbyin pa yongs su smin pa grub pas sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam par yid ches par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i sbyin pa yongs su smin pa grub pas sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam par yid ches par gyur cig /
translated: ‚ÄòThrough the accomplishment of the ripening of unsurpassed generosity, may all beings come to have confidence in the highest object of generosity.

original: sems can thams cad gcig tu spyod cing mi gnyis par yang dag par spyod pas 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad gcig tu spyod cing mi gnyis par yang dag par spyod pas 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' bar gyur cig /
translated: Through the practice of the single conduct and the practice of nonduality, may all beings come to delight in solitude.

original: sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyis yang dag par bsdu ba la brtson pas sbyin pa rnam par dag par byed pa'i mchog tu gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyis yang dag par bsdu ba la brtson pas sbyin pa rnam par dag par byed pa'i mchog tu gyur cig /
translated: Through the practice of the highest pure generosity, may all beings be diligent in gathering the merit of all beings.‚Äô

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med pa'i 'bras bu rab tu gtong bas ye shes kyi mu stegs las byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba grangs med pa'i 'bras bu rab tu gtong bas ye shes kyi mu stegs las byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be born in the island of wisdom, giving the fruit of their innumerable roots of virtue.

original: sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog gis rnam par dag pas bsgribs pa med par rtogs par khong du chud par gyur cig /üîΩsems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin byed pa med par khong du chud pas nyon mongs pa med pa'i @243a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog gis rnam par dag pas bsgribs pa med par rtogs par khong du chud par gyur cig / sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin byed pa med par khong du chud pas nyon mongs pa med pa'i @243a *//
translated: May all sentient beings understand the absence of obscurations through the supreme mandala of generosity.

original: chos la rnam par spyod par gyur cig /üîΩsems can thams cad bsod nams kyi zhing sbyin pa'i gnas 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar byas pas bsod nams tshad med pa shin tu bsags par gyur cig /
analyzed: chos la rnam par spyod par gyur cig / sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi zhing sbyin pa'i gnas 'gro ba thams cad dga' bar byas pas bsod nams tshad med pa shin tu bsags par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings understand the nature of all phenomena to be without action and thus experience the Dharma free of afflictions.üîΩMay all sentient beings be fields of merit, objects of generosity, and sources of delight for all beings, thus accumulating immeasurable merit.

original: sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas su byas te phan 'dogs pa rnam par dag pas cho 'phrul mtha' yas pas rnam par rol ba yang dag par ston par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i gnas su byas te phan 'dogs pa rnam par dag pas cho 'phrul mtha' yas pas rnam par rol ba yang dag par ston par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be objects of generosity, and may they display infinite miracles through the purity of their beneficial deeds.

original: sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i theg pa mchog gi 'bras bu yongs su stobs pas sbyin pa'i gnas yon tan zad mi shes par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad stobs bcu'i theg pa mchog gi 'bras bu yongs su stobs pas sbyin pa'i gnas yon tan zad mi shes par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings become objects of generosity whose good qualities are inexhaustible, by perfecting the result of the supreme vehicle of the ten powers.

original: sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi phung po mi zad pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i mthar thug par gyur te sbyin pa'i gnas don yod pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi phung po mi zad pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i mthar thug par gyur te sbyin pa'i gnas don yod pa'i 'bras bu dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings become objects of generosity who have the result of the inexhaustible mass of merit, and who have reached the ultimate omniscience.

original: sems can thams cad ma thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos tshig dang / yi ge 'dzin cing sdig pa'i chos rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad ma thos pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos tshig dang / yi ge 'dzin cing sdig pa'i chos rab tu zhi bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be holders of the words and letters of the unheard Buddha Dharma, and may they pacify evil dharmas.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sgra don yod pa ye shes kyis rnam par rig pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyan pa la mos shing brtson par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sgra don yod pa ye shes kyis rnam par rig pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyan pa la mos shing brtson par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be devoted to listening to all the Buddha Dharmas, and may they be diligent, by means of the awareness of the meaningful Buddha sound.

original: sems can thams cad la thos pa rjes su bsgrags pa'i chos can du gyur te sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la thos pa rjes su bsgrags pa'i chos can du gyur te sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thos pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings become endowed with the Dharma of proclaiming what they have heard, and may they attain the perfection of hearing all the teachings of the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad zhags pa thub pa dgu bcu rtsa drug gi lta ba las rnam par @243b 'das te bstan pa la gnas pa'i bya ba la mos par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad zhags pa thub pa dgu bcu rtsa drug gi lta ba las rnam par @243b 'das te bstan pa la gnas pa'i bya ba la mos par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings transcend the views of the ninety-six non-Buddhist traditions and may they aspire to the activities of those who uphold the teachings.

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog rnam par spel bar byed cing 'phags pa mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog rnam par spel bar byed cing 'phags pa mthong ba rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings increase their roots of virtue and may they attain the vision of the noble ones.

original: sems can thams cad 'phags pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa'i bde ba dang ldan zhing ye shes kyis spyod pa'i gang zag la mos par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'phags pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa'i bde ba dang ldan zhing ye shes kyis spyod pa'i gang zag la mos par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the happiness of seeing and associating with the noble ones, and may they aspire to the individuals who practice with wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi lta ba rjes su thos pa las byung bas thos pa don yod par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi lta ba rjes su thos pa las byung bas thos pa don yod par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have meaningful hearing, by hearing the view of the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad bstan pa rab tu gzung ba dang yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ye shes kyi mkhas pa rab tu thob par gyur cig /üîΩsems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gsal bar bya ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pas chos thams cad thos pa shin tu 'dzin pa la zhugs par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bstan pa rab tu gzung ba dang yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ye shes kyi mkhas pa rab tu thob par gyur cig / sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa gsal bar bya ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pas chos thams cad thos pa shin tu 'dzin pa la zhugs par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings enter into upholding and protecting the teachings, and thus attain the wisdom of the Buddha‚Äôs teachings.üîΩMay all sentient beings enter into retaining all the teachings they hear, having attained the illumination that illuminates the Buddha‚Äôs teachings.

original: sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i mdzod kyis dga' bar spyod cing gtong ba shin tu byed pa dang / mchod sbyin shin tu byas pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la yon tan ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sbyin pa'i mdzod kyis dga' bar spyod cing gtong ba shin tu byed pa dang / mchod sbyin shin tu byas pas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la yon tan ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings enter into the practice of giving, and through the joy of the treasure of generosity and the practice of giving and sacrifice, may they perfectly realize the qualities of the Buddha‚Äôs teachings.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa mchog dam pa phul rab tu 'thob cing /üîΩci nas kyang @244a *//
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas la shing rta 'bul ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad kyis ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pa mchog dam pa phul rab tu 'thob cing / ci nas kyang @244a *//
translated: When bodhisattva great beings offer a chariot to the hearers and solitary buddhas, they dedicate the roots of virtue in this way: ‚ÄòMay all sentient beings attain the supreme, holy, and sublime wisdom and super-knowledge.

original: mi 'jigs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa rab tu 'thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: They should be dedicated so that they attain the fearlessness, the power of omniscience, and fearlessness.

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i gnas dang len pa sna tshogs phyogs gzhan dang gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i gang zag dang / slong ba phongs pa dang / bkren pa mang po tshad med pa byang chub sems dpa'i sgra thos te 'ongs pa dang /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i gnas dang len pa sna tshogs phyogs gzhan dang gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i gang zag dang / slong ba phongs pa dang / bkren pa mang po tshad med pa byang chub sems dpa'i sgra thos te 'ongs pa dang /
translated: In this way, bodhisattva great beings dedicate the roots of virtue so that the many destitute, poor, and needy people who come from various directions to the bodhisattva, the recipient of generosity, and who come after hearing the bodhisattva‚Äôs name,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang sems bskyed pas mos shing bstabs pa thams cad gtong bas shin tu re ba'i yid can de dag 'ongs pa mthong nas slong ba la rim gro bya bas mi ngoms pa'i sems kyis slong ba 'ongs pa rnams la bzod pa gsol
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang sems bskyed pas mos shing bstabs pa thams cad gtong bas shin tu re ba'i yid can de dag 'ongs pa mthong nas slong ba la rim gro bya bas mi ngoms pa'i sems kyis slong ba 'ongs pa rnams la bzod pa gsol
translated: Seeing that they had come with a very hopeful attitude, having been invited by the bodhisattvas‚Äô aspirations and the generation of bodhicitta, and having given everything away, he asked for their forgiveness with a mind that was never satisfied in serving those who asked.

original: ba'i sems bskyed de /
analyzed: ba'i sems bskyed de /
translated: He generated the following thought:

original: 'di ltar bdag nyid phyogs de dag tu khyod kyi drung du song ste rim gror bya ba zhig na /
analyzed: 'di ltar bdag nyid phyogs de dag tu khyod kyi drung du song ste rim gror bya ba zhig na /
translated: ‚ÄúIf I were to go to you in those directions to serve you,

original: de 'di ltar khyod 'dir phyin te shin tu ngal bar gyur to //üîΩzhes spyi bos btud de bzod pa gsol bas slong ba thams cad bzod pa byas /
analyzed: de 'di ltar khyod 'dir phyin te shin tu ngal bar gyur to // zhes spyi bos btud de bzod pa gsol bas slong ba thams cad bzod pa byas /
translated: you would have come here and become very tired.‚ÄùüîΩThus he bowed his head to the ground and asked for their forgiveness.

original: rim gror byas /
analyzed: rim gror byas /
translated: He served all those who had asked for his forgiveness,

original: ngal ba bstis nas ci 'dod pa sbyin pa de dag gis shin tu rim gro byed de /
analyzed: ngal ba bstis nas ci 'dod pa sbyin pa de dag gis shin tu rim gro byed de /
translated: and he served them well, asking about their fatigue and giving them whatever they wanted.üîΩHe served them well with the following:

original: 'di ltar nor bu'i shing rta 'dzam bu'i gling gi na chung bzang mo rin po ches yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di ltar nor bu'i shing rta 'dzam bu'i gling gi na chung bzang mo rin po ches yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: a jeweled chariot filled with the most beautiful young women of Jambudvƒ´pa,

original: gser gyi shing rta yul gyi na chung rin po che shin tu rnam par dag pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gser gyi shing rta yul gyi na chung rin po che shin tu rnam par dag pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: golden chariots filled with precious young women of the land,üîΩberyl chariots filled with young women singing and playing musical instruments,

original: bee d'urya'i shing rta na chung ma'i 'khor glu dang rol mo brdung zhing dkrol ba dang ldan pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta @244b ste; dngul gyi shing rta shin tu mdzes pa bud med gzhon nu lha'i bu mo lta bus yongs su bkang ba dang /üîΩ'di lta ste /
analyzed: bee d'urya'i shing rta na chung ma'i 'khor glu dang rol mo brdung zhing dkrol ba dang ldan pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta @244b ste; dngul gyi shing rta shin tu mdzes pa bud med gzhon nu lha'i bu mo lta bus yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: silver chariots filled with beautiful young women,

original: rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i shing rta bud med cang shes rin po che rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa tshul mkhas pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i shing rta bud med cang shes rin po che rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa tshul mkhas pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: chariots adorned with trillions of precious ornaments filled with skilled and well-trained women adorned with all kinds of precious ornaments,

original: tsandan gyi shing rta byang chub sems dpa' bzhon par 'os pa dang; 'di lta ste /
analyzed: tsandan gyi shing rta byang chub sems dpa' bzhon par 'os pa dang; 'di lta ste /
translated: sandalwood chariots fit for a bodhisattva,

original: shel gyi shing rta bud med bzang mo bzhin bzang ba /
analyzed: shel gyi shing rta bud med bzang mo bzhin bzang ba /
translated: crystal chariots filled with beautiful women with beautiful faces,

original: cha byad sdug gu shin tu brgyan pa /
analyzed: cha byad sdug gu shin tu brgyan pa /
translated: They are well adorned with beautiful attire,

original: gzugs mdzes pa /
analyzed: gzugs mdzes pa /
translated: have beautiful bodies,

original: blta na sdug cing mi mthun pa med pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: blta na sdug cing mi mthun pa med pas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: are pleasing to behold, and are without any unpleasantness.

original: aasma garbha'i shing rta dbang bskur bas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: aasma garbha'i shing rta dbang bskur bas yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: They are filled with anointed chariots of asmagarbha,

original: spos dam pa'i shing rta bu dang bu mos yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste /
analyzed: spos dam pa'i shing rta bu dang bu mos yongs su bkang ba dang / 'di lta ste /
translated: with chariots of excellent incense filled with sons and daughters,üîΩand with chariots adorned with all kinds of precious substances filled with inseparable inner friends.

original: rin po che'i tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i shing rta nang gi bshes gnyen dbyer mi phyed pas yongs su bkang ba dang / de rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shing rta grangs med pa rnam pa sna tshogs slong mo pa thams cad la sbyin zhing yongs su gtong bas /
analyzed: rin po che'i tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i shing rta nang gi bshes gnyen dbyer mi phyed pas yongs su bkang ba dang / de rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shing rta grangs med pa rnam pa sna tshogs slong mo pa thams cad la sbyin zhing yongs su gtong bas /
translated: In this way, they give and completely give away countless various kinds of chariots to all beggars.

original: slong ba 'dod par bya ba'i dngos po rab tu thob pas yid la bsam pa shin tu rdzogs nas slong ba de dag thams cad sbyin pa thams cad sbyin pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bzung ste shin tu tshim par byas shing bsam pa rdzogs par byas nas
analyzed: slong ba 'dod par bya ba'i dngos po rab tu thob pas yid la bsam pa shin tu rdzogs nas slong ba de dag thams cad sbyin pa thams cad sbyin pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bzung ste shin tu tshim par byas shing bsam pa rdzogs par byas nas
translated: Having completely fulfilled the wishes of those who ask, having taken up all those who ask with the method of giving all gifts, having satisfied them completely and fulfilled their wishes,üîΩhaving caused them to be happy, delighted, joyful, and content,

original: dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes par byas te dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag @245a *//
analyzed: dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes par byas te dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag @245a *//
translated: he dedicates those wholesome roots

original: 'di ltar yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: in this way:

original: sems can thams cad byang chub kyi shing drung du bsam gyis mi khyab cing thogs pa med pa'i shing rta'i 'khor lo phyir mi ldog pas 'gro ba dang ldan te theg pa chen po'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad byang chub kyi shing drung du bsam gyis mi khyab cing thogs pa med pa'i shing rta'i 'khor lo phyir mi ldog pas 'gro ba dang ldan te theg pa chen po'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig /
translated: ‚ÄúMay all sentient beings be seated in the great vehicle, riding in the chariot of the Great Vehicle, going to the foot of the tree of enlightenment with an irreversible wheel, with inconceivable, unobstructed progress.

original: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la spyod cing phyi ma'i mtha' bskal ba'i mur thug par phyir mi ldog par chos kyi shing rta cang shes la zhon par gyur cig /üîΩsems can thams cad chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa'i rlom sems med cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rigs kyi lam la brtson pas chos thams cad ci yang ma yin pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la spyod cing phyi ma'i mtha' bskal ba'i mur thug par phyir mi ldog par chos kyi shing rta cang shes la zhon par gyur cig / sems can thams cad chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa'i rlom sems med cing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rigs kyi lam la brtson pas chos thams cad ci yang ma yin pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings practice all the bodhisattva activities and, riding the chariot of the Dharma, may they never turn back until the end of time.üîΩMay all sentient beings ride the chariot of the Dharma, which is nothing whatsoever, and, by being diligent on the path of the family of omniscience, may they be free of the conceit of conceptualizing all phenomena.

original: sems can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba la brtson pas kun tu 'gro ba dri ma med pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad thogs pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba la brtson pas kun tu 'gro ba dri ma med pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings ride the stainless, all-pervading chariot and, by being diligent in going to all the buddhafields with unimpeded miraculous powers, may they go everywhere.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la dga' bas mos shing yang dag par 'gro ba la brtson pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa'i shing rta rjes su mthun pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la dga' bas mos shing yang dag par 'gro ba la brtson pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa'i shing rta rjes su mthun pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be filled with joy in the Dharma of all the Buddhas, and may they strive to attain it. May they be established in the vehicle of omniscience, which is like a chariot.

original: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i lam bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par @245b dag pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i lam bcu dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad la rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang ldan zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par @245b dag pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have a joyful mind with respect to the ten bodhisattva levels, which are the path of the bodhisattvas, and to all the bodhisattva concentrations. May they ride in the chariot of the bodhisattva conduct, which is completely pure.

original: sems can thams cad tshul dang 'dra ba'i yul na gnas pa dang ldan pa dang / skyes bu dam pa la brten pa thob pas sngon byas pa'i bsod nams shin tu bsags pa dang / yang dag pa'i smon lam la shin tu brtson pa dang /
analyzed: sems can thams cad tshul dang 'dra ba'i yul na gnas pa dang ldan pa dang / skyes bu dam pa la brten pa thob pas sngon byas pa'i bsod nams shin tu bsags pa dang / yang dag pa'i smon lam la shin tu brtson pa dang /
translated: May all sentient beings live in a country that is suitable, and may they be able to rely on holy beings. May they accumulate the merit that has been created in the past. May they strive in the right aspirations.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyad pa rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pas 'khor lo bzhi pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i tshangs par spyad pa rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs pa phun sum tshogs pas 'khor lo bzhi pa'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings ride in the chariot of the fourfold wheel, with the perfection of the complete and pure conduct of the bodhisattvas.

original: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa'i stobs dang / ye shes la brtson pas phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings su chos kyi snang ba gtong ba la bslab par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa'i stobs dang / ye shes la brtson pas phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings su chos kyi snang ba gtong ba la bslab par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings train in the wisdom and strength of all the tathagatas without exception, and thus spread the light of Dharma throughout the entire realm of phenomena.

original: sems can thams cad chos kyi shing rtas 'byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi shing rta la zhon par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos kyi shing rtas 'byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi shing rta la zhon par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain the perfection of the Dharma chariot and ride in the chariot of the Dharma of the buddhas.

original: sems can thams cad phyogs thams cad du legs pa dang / bde ba yang dag par ston pas bsod nams thams cad dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa dang / chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shing rta la mkhas par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad phyogs thams cad du legs pa dang / bde ba yang dag par ston pas bsod nams thams cad dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa dang / chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shing rta la mkhas par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings become skilled in the chariot of all merit, all roots of virtue, and all inconceivable Dharma, and thus reveal what is good and wholesome in all directions.

original: sems can thams cad 'jungs pa'i dri ma rab tu byang ste sbyin pa gtong bas 'byung ba'i shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'jungs pa'i dri ma rab tu byang ste sbyin pa gtong bas 'byung ba'i shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the chariot that comes from giving, having purified the stain of stinginess.

original: sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa ma lus par tshul khrims rnam par dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig /üîΩsems can thams cad sems 'khrugs pa med par gnas @246a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa ma lus par tshul khrims rnam par dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig / sems can thams cad sems 'khrugs pa med par gnas @246a *//
translated: May all sentient beings have the chariot of the wisdom of the perfection of moral discipline, having purified the entire realm of phenomena without end or middle through pure moral discipline.

original: pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa 'khrug pa med cing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa 'khrug pa med cing bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the chariot of the wisdom of the perfection of patience, with minds that are undisturbed and with the thoughts of all beings undisturbed.

original: sems can thams cad 'byung ba'i shing rtas snying po byang chub tu 'gro bar spyod pa'i go cha bgos pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'byung ba'i shing rtas snying po byang chub tu 'gro bar spyod pa'i go cha bgos pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the chariot of the wisdom of the perfection of effort, having put on the armor of practice that goes to the essence of enlightenment.

original: sems can thams cad shin tu mgyogs pa'i shing rtas snying po byang chub tu byung ste bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig /üîΩsems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi shing rta la shin tu zhon zhing sangs rgyas kyi yul sprul pas rgyas par byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad shin tu mgyogs pa'i shing rtas snying po byang chub tu byung ste bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig / sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi shing rta la shin tu zhon zhing sangs rgyas kyi yul sprul pas rgyas par byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings ride in the chariot of the perfection of meditation and the wisdom of enlightenment, having gone to the site of enlightenment.üîΩMay all sentient beings ride in the chariot of the perfection of wisdom, riding in the chariot of the realm of phenomena, and spreading the domain of the Buddha through emanations.

original: sems can thams cad chos yongs su gtong ba la 'jigs pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du sbyin pa gtong ba'i phyir chos kyi rgyal po'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos yongs su gtong ba la 'jigs pa med pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi don du sbyin pa gtong ba'i phyir chos kyi rgyal po'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings ride in the chariot of the Dharma King, giving gifts for the sake of omniscience, fearless in giving away all things.

original: sems can thams cad chos kyi mtshan nyid dang / rang bzhin gyi phyogs thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa rmongs pa med pa'i phyir smon lam la mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos kyi mtshan nyid dang / rang bzhin gyi phyogs thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa rmongs pa med pa'i phyir smon lam la mi gnas pa'i ye shes kyi shing rta dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the chariot of wisdom that does not abide in aspirations, in order to be unconfused about all the aspects of the characteristics and nature of phenomena.

original: sems can thams cad theg pa chen po mnor bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye zhing lus yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi shing rta la @246b zhon par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad theg pa chen po mnor bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye zhing lus yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi shing rta la @246b zhon par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings ride the chariot of the Dharma of all the buddhas, in order to be born in all the world systems and manifest their bodies through the Great Vehicle.

original: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam skyo ba med par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa rin po che'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i smon lam skyo ba med par yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa rin po che'i shing rta la zhon par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings ride the chariot of the precious omniscience, in order to perfect the bodhisattva Samantabhadra‚Äôs aspirations without weariness.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i gnas dang / len pa dang / slong ba sna tshogs la shing rta dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / spro ba'i yid kyi rnam par rtog pas sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa la zhon pa shin tu bsgrubs pas ye shes dang /
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i gnas dang / len pa dang / slong ba sna tshogs la shing rta dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / spro ba'i yid kyi rnam par rtog pas sbyin pas yongs su bsdus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad mkhyen pa'i theg pa la zhon pa shin tu bsgrubs pas ye shes dang /
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva, with various recipients, givers, and beggars, with a mind that is joyful, very joyful, devoted, and enthusiastic, dedicates the roots of virtue gathered through generosity so that all sentient beings will ride the vehicle of omniscience and accomplish the infinite aspects of wisdom and mind.

original: sems kyi rnam pa mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //üîΩbam po sum cu rtsa drug pa /
analyzed: sems kyi rnam pa mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o // bam po sum cu rtsa drug pa /
translated: He dedicates so that they will be perfected.

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glang po cang shes yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glang po cang shes yan lag bdun shin tu gnas pa /
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva, with various recipients, givers, and beggars, with a mind that is joyful, very joyful, devoted, and enthusiastic, dedicates the roots of virtue gathered through generosity so that all sentient beings will ride the vehicle of omniscience and accomplish the infinite aspects of wisdom and mind.

original: lo drug cu lon pa /
analyzed: lo drug cu lon pa /
translated: He dedicates so that they will be perfected.

original: mche ba drug dang ldan pa /
analyzed: mche ba drug dang ldan pa /
translated: In this way, the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva, with various recipients, givers, and beggars, with a mind that is joyful, very joyful, devoted, and enthusiastic, dedicates the roots of virtue gathered through generosity so that all sentient beings will ride the vehicle of omniscience and accomplish the infinite aspects of wisdom and mind.

original: kha dog padma lta bu /

translated: He dedicates so that they will be perfected.üîΩIn this way, the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva, with various recipients, givers, and beggars, with a mind that is joyful, very joyful, devoted, and enthusiastic, dedicates the roots of virtue gathered through generosity so that all sentient beings will ride the vehicle of omniscience and accomplish the infinite aspects of wisdom and mind.

original: gdong rnam par dag pa /üîΩdkar zhing dri ma med pa /
analyzed: gdong rnam par dag pa /üîΩdkar zhing dri ma med pa /
translated: He dedicates so that they will be perfected.

analyzed: gser gyi rgyan dang ldan pa /

analyzed: gser ltar blta na mdzes pa /
translated: beautiful to behold like gold,

analyzed: dpag tshad stong gis khyon du ngal ba med par 'gro ba sbyin zhing gtong ba'am /
