original: lus la byams pa; shin tu mgyogs pa /
analyzed: lus la byams pa; shin tu mgyogs pa /
translated: They were loving toward the body, and very swift.

original: phyogs bzhir yid ltar mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa /üîΩlha rdzas lta bu'i lhab lhub thams cad dang ldan pa de lta bus bla ma'i skye bo dang / bla mar bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / pha dang / ma dang / phongs pa dang / bkren pa dang / slong ba dang /
analyzed: phyogs bzhir yid ltar mgyogs pa'i shugs dang ldan pa / lha rdzas lta bu'i lhab lhub thams cad dang ldan pa de lta bus bla ma'i skye bo dang / bla mar bya ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / pha dang / ma dang / phongs pa dang / bkren pa dang / slong ba dang /
translated: They had the speed of thought in the four directions.üîΩThey were endowed with all the ornaments of divine substances. In this way, they gave and bestowed upon all beings, including those who were gurus, those who were worthy of respect, spiritual benefactors, fathers, mothers, the poor, the destitute, beggars,

original: len pa'i 'gro ba thams cad la sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / sems yangs pas sbyin pa dang / sems la chags pa med pas gtong ba dang / rjes su 'gyod pa med pas yid mgu bar byed pa dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i bsam pas gtang ba chen po rab tu gtong zhing byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la rab tu brtson pa dang /
analyzed: len pa'i 'gro ba thams cad la sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / sems yangs pas sbyin pa dang / sems la chags pa med pas gtong ba dang / rjes su 'gyod pa med pas yid mgu bar byed pa dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su rgyas pa'i bsam pas gtang ba chen po rab tu gtong zhing byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad la rab tu brtson pa dang /
translated: and those who were in need. They gave with an expansive mind, gave without attachment, gave with a joyful mind without regret, and gave with a vast intention that was filled with great compassion. They gave greatly and were diligent in all the qualities of bodhisattvas.

original: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su mngon par skyes pa'i bsam pa yongs su spyong pa'i che dge ba'i rtsa bde dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su mngon par skyes pa'i bsam pa yongs su spyong pa'i che dge ba'i rtsa bde dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: They dedicate those roots of virtue in this way:

original: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyis byung ste cang shes kyi @247b theg pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyis byung ste cang shes kyi @247b theg pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig /
translated: ‚ÄòMay all sentient beings have the ornaments of the qualities of all bodhisattvas and may they be established in the vehicle of the clever.

original: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi theg pas byung ste theg pa bzang po'i bzhon pa la mngon par zhon par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su 'gro ba'i chos kyi theg pas byung ste theg pa bzang po'i bzhon pa la mngon par zhon par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the vehicle of the good Dharma that follows all buddhas and may they mount the vehicle of the good.

original: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi theg pas snang bar gyur te theg pa chen po la shin tu mos par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgribs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi theg pas snang bar gyur te theg pa chen po la shin tu mos par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be illuminated by the vehicle of the wisdom of the unobstructed power of the tathƒÅgatas and may they have great interest in the Great Vehicle.

original: sems can thams cad smon lam thams cad sgrol ba la rab tu zhugs pas brtsam pa chen po'i theg pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad smon lam thams cad sgrol ba la rab tu zhugs pas brtsam pa chen po'i theg pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the vehicle of great undertakings, having set out to liberate all their aspirations.

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam par sgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rab tu 'thob pa la pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam par sgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rab tu 'thob pa la pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa mnyam pa nyid kyis byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May they attain the perfection of the practice of the roots of virtue equally for all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes rin po che sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la shin tu 'byung ba'i chos can du gyur te theg pa rin po che yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i ye shes rin po che sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la shin tu 'byung ba'i chos can du gyur te theg pa rin po che yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the Dharma of all the buddhas, the precious jewel of unsurpassed wisdom, and may they have the precious vehicle that is completely perfect.

original: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pa'i sems dang rgyud du gyur te byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan rnam par bsags pa'i theg pas shin tu byung bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi me tog rgyas pa'i sems dang rgyud du gyur te byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyan rnam par bsags pa'i theg pas shin tu byung bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings have the mind and the continuum of the blooming flowers of all the bodhisattvas‚Äô meditative absorptions, and may they have the vehicle that is the accumulation of the ornaments of bodhisattva conduct.

original: sems can thams cad mtha' yas pa'i theg pa myur ba la mngon par brtson pa'i ye shes kyi chos can du gyur te bskal pa grangs med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su bsam pa rjes su sems @248a *//üîΩshing rnam par sbyong bar gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad mtha' yas pa'i theg pa myur ba la mngon par brtson pa'i ye shes kyi chos can du gyur te bskal pa grangs med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rjes su bsam pa rjes su sems @248a *// shing rnam par sbyong bar gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings become endowed with the Dharma of the wisdom of striving in the infinite vehicles, and may they contemplate and reflect on the bodhisattva conduct of countless eons.

original: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yang dag par sgrub pa la mkhas pas longs spyod kyi mchog thams cad dang / cang shes kyi theg pa chen po'i sbyin pa byed par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis yang dag par sgrub pa la mkhas pas longs spyod kyi mchog thams cad dang / cang shes kyi theg pa chen po'i sbyin pa byed par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be skilled in the perfect accomplishment of all bodhisattvas, and may they give the supreme enjoyments and the great vehicle of the skilled.

original: sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi mthar gtugs par mngon par gzung bar bya ba'i phyir theg pa shin tu mtho bar gnas shing rab tu brten pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi mthar gtugs par mngon par gzung bar bya ba'i phyir theg pa shin tu mtho bar gnas shing rab tu brten pa dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings be endowed with the great vehicle that is very high and well-founded, in order to uphold all beings and bring them to the end of the path of omniscience.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glang po cang shes dang / rta cang shes bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad chags pa med pa'i theg pa la mngon par bskyon zhing ye shes kyi bzhon pa yongs su 'grub pa dang /
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po glang po cang shes dang / rta cang shes bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa'i sbyin pa byed pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad chags pa med pa'i theg pa la mngon par bskyon zhing ye shes kyi bzhon pa yongs su 'grub pa dang /
translated: When the bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva makes the gift of countless quintillions of elephants and horses that are tame, well-trained, and obedient, he dedicates those roots of virtue to all beings, so that they may mount the vehicle of nonattachment and perfect the vehicle of wisdom.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa bsgribs pa med pas 'byung ba'i mthar thug par yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i theg pa bsgribs pa med pas 'byung ba'i mthar thug par yongs su bsngo'o //
translated: He dedicates so that they may reach the ultimate end of the vehicle of the tathƒÅgatas, which is free of obscurations.

original: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa /
analyzed: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa /
translated: ‚ÄúThe bodhisattva mahƒÅsattva who is a universal monarch

original: chos kyi dbang byed pa stan gyi sbyin pa byed cing rgyal po bzhugs pa'i khri stan bzang po beed'urya'i rkang pa can sengge'i khri la gnas pa gser gyi rgyu dang / rin po che'i dri bas blas pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbang byed pa stan gyi sbyin pa byed cing rgyal po bzhugs pa'i khri stan bzang po beed'urya'i rkang pa can sengge'i khri la gnas pa gser gyi rgyu dang / rin po che'i dri bas blas pa /
translated: who rules by the power of the Dharma makes the gift of seats. He gives the excellent seats of the king, which are lion thrones with legs of beryl,

original: stan reg na bde ba grangs med pa du ma bting ba /
analyzed: stan reg na bde ba grangs med pa du ma bting ba /
translated: It was covered with countless soft cushions.

original: nyen kor spos kyi dam pa thams cad kyis shin tu dri zhim par byas pa /üîΩ@248b nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bsgrengs pa /
analyzed: nyen kor spos kyi dam pa thams cad kyis shin tu dri zhim par byas pa / @248b nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bsgrengs pa /
translated: It was perfumed with the finest incense.üîΩIt was raised with victory banners of various precious jewels.

original: rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
analyzed: rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa /
translated: It was adorned with ornaments of many quintillions of jewels.

original: gser gyi dra ba'i bla re bres pa /
analyzed: gser gyi dra ba'i bla re bres pa /
translated: It was covered with a golden latticework canopy.

original: gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs 'byung ba /
analyzed: gser gyi dril bu'i dra ba 'khrol ba'i sgra yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs 'byung ba /
translated: It was hung with nets of golden bells that produced beautiful sounds.

original: rin po che'i 'bru bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor te rnam par phye bas shin tu 'phags shing blta na mdzes pa /üîΩsrog chags bye ba /
analyzed: rin po che'i 'bru bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor te rnam par phye bas shin tu 'phags shing blta na mdzes pa / srog chags bye ba /
translated: It was surrounded by ten quintillion precious grains, and it was exalted and beautiful to behold.

original: khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pas kun nas blta ba /
analyzed: khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pas kun nas blta ba /

analyzed: gdugs khab gcig gis sa chen po thams cad skyong bar dbang bskur ba /

original: rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad la dbang ba'i stan du bya ba de la 'dug cing /
analyzed: rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad la dbang ba'i stan du bya ba de la 'dug cing /
translated: He sat on a throne that was the seat of dominion over all the riches of the kingdom.

original: 'khor lo thogs pa med pas bskyang ba dang chis bya ba la rgyal po'i bka' thams cad nyams pa med par nyan pa dpal rnam par snang ba dang / aindra n'i la dang / nor bu rin po che'i snying pos spras pa /
analyzed: 'khor lo thogs pa med pas bskyang ba dang chis bya ba la rgyal po'i bka' thams cad nyams pa med par nyan pa dpal rnam par snang ba dang / aindra n'i la dang / nor bu rin po che'i snying pos spras pa /
translated: He was protected by the unimpeded wheel and listened to all the king‚Äôs commands without fail. He was adorned with the splendor of Vairocana, sapphire, and the essence of precious jewels.

original: nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma che phra lta bu rab tu brgyan pa /
analyzed: nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma che phra lta bu rab tu brgyan pa /
translated: He was adorned with the sun, the moon, and the great and small stars.

original: rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs rmad du byung bas brgyan pa /
analyzed: rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs rmad du byung bas brgyan pa /
translated: He was adorned with various marvelous ornaments.

original: rin po che khyad par du 'phags pa rgya mtshos spras pa; rgya mtsho dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bkra shis dang / bum pa sna tshogs yongs su gang ba dang / dga' ba 'khyil ba'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
analyzed: rin po che khyad par du 'phags pa rgya mtshos spras pa; rgya mtsho dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bkra shis dang / bum pa sna tshogs yongs su gang ba dang / dga' ba 'khyil ba'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
translated: He was adorned with the ocean of especially exalted jewels, the ocean, the victory banner, the auspicious, the various full vases, and the various ornaments of the coiled joy.

original: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi gyim pag dri ma med cing rdul dang bral bas bkab pa de la 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi bdag po spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba'i bsod nams kyi stobs dang @249a *//
analyzed: 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi gyim pag dri ma med cing rdul dang bral bas bkab pa de la 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi bdag po spyi bo nas dbang bskur bas mngon par dbang bskur ba'i bsod nams kyi stobs dang @249a *//
translated: He would offer to the Thus-Gone One a seat covered with stainless, dust-free gold from the Jamb≈´ River, and he would offer it to the one who has been consecrated with the consecration of the head of all the lords of Jambudvƒ´pa, who possesses the power of merit,

original: ldan pa; byams pas dbang bskur ba /
analyzed: ldan pa; byams pas dbang bskur ba /
translated: who has been consecrated with love,

original: pha rol gyi 'khor bcom pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: pha rol gyi 'khor bcom pa dang ldan pa /
translated: who has conquered the armies of others,

original: bka' la zlog pa med pa /
analyzed: bka' la zlog pa med pa /
translated: whose words are not to be contradicted,üîΩand who is delightful to behold. He would offer such a seat to countless quintillions of kings,

original: 'dug na dga' ba de lta bu'i stan gyi rnam pa tshul de 'dra ba sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / de dang de dag gis rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa la khri stan bzang po'i rnam pa de lta bu'i sbyin pa byed cing yongs su gtong ba dang /üîΩyang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam pa la gsol ba'am /
analyzed: 'dug na dga' ba de lta bu'i stan gyi rnam pa tshul de 'dra ba sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba dang / de dang de dag gis rgyal po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa la khri stan bzang po'i rnam pa de lta bu'i sbyin pa byed cing yongs su gtong ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gnas kyi dam pa la gsol ba'am /
translated: and he would offer it to the Thus-Gone One, the highest recipient of offerings,

original: skyes bu dam pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen nam /
analyzed: skyes bu dam pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen nam /
translated: or to a holy being, a spiritual friend,üîΩor to a bodhisattva great being.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad dam /

translated: or in order to make offerings to the st≈´pas of all the tathƒÅgatas,

analyzed: phongs pa dang / bkren pa slong ba dpag tu med pa dag gam /
translated: or to countless poor, destitute beggars,

original: sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir yang rung ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir yang rung ste /
translated: or in order to benefit all sentient beings,

original: sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ba'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag 'di ltar yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: when one is practicing generosity and giving, one should dedicate the roots of virtue in the following way:

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes dang ldan zhing shin tu byang chub pa'i stan dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par 'tshang rgya ba'i ye shes dang ldan zhing shin tu byang chub pa'i stan dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: By this root of virtue, may all sentient beings have the wisdom of the perfect enlightenment of all the qualities of the Buddha and have the seat of complete enlightenment.

original: sems can thams cad bdud kyi dkrug ma dang dpung rab tu gzhom pa'i @249b phyir chos kyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ri rnam pa thams cad du thub pa med pa'i lus dang ldan zhing 'gro ba thams cad la dbang ba'i stan rab tu thob par
analyzed: sems can thams cad bdud kyi dkrug ma dang dpung rab tu gzhom pa'i @249b phyir chos kyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ri rnam pa thams cad du thub pa med pa'i lus dang ldan zhing 'gro ba thams cad la dbang ba'i stan rab tu thob par
translated: May all sentient beings have the body of the vajra mountain of all lords of the Dharma, which is invincible in every way, in order to completely defeat the army of Mara, and may they obtain the seat of power over all beings.

original: gyur cig / sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta bar 'os shing sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa'i sengge'i gdan rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: gyur cig / sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis blta bar 'os shing sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa'i sengge'i gdan rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings obtain the lion seat of the Buddha‚Äôs play, which is worthy of being seen by all beings.

original: sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dbang phyug gis skyong ba'i phyir stan gyi rgyan dang 'khor rnam par dag pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dbang phyug gis skyong ba'i phyir stan gyi rgyan dang 'khor rnam par dag pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain seats that are adorned with the ornaments of the Dharma and that are pure and perfect retinues, which are beyond description and beyond description again, because they are sustained by the sovereignty of the Dharma for all beings.

original: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba tshogs chen po rnam par dag pas khams gsum pas zil gyis mi non pa'i stan rab tu thob par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba tshogs chen po rnam par dag pas khams gsum pas zil gyis mi non pa'i stan rab tu thob par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings attain seats that are not overwhelmed by the three worlds, due to the purity of their great accumulation of roots of virtue.

original: sems can thams cad bskal pa grangs med par sangs rgyas kyi gdan gyi yon tan bsngags pa mthar thug pa med pa dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa /
analyzed: sems can thams cad bskal pa grangs med par sangs rgyas kyi gdan gyi yon tan bsngags pa mthar thug pa med pa dang ldan zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa /
translated: May all sentient beings have seats that are praised by the buddhas as being endowed with inexhaustible qualities and that are as vast as inexpressibly numerous world systems.

original: stan gyis rgyas par byed pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan par gyur cig /
analyzed: stan gyis rgyas par byed pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan par gyur cig /
translated: May they be endowed with the blessings that spread out to cover all seats.

original: sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad lus kyis rgyas par byed pa'i phyir gter chen po'i tshogs kyi stan la gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: sems can thams cad chos kyi dbyings thams cad lus kyis rgyas par byed pa'i phyir gter chen po'i tshogs kyi stan la gnas par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings sit on a seat of a great treasure store, in order to pervade with their bodies the entire realm of phenomena.

original: sems can thams cad ji ltar dam bcas pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas rim gro byed pa'i phyir rgyan gyi rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i stan rab tu thob par gyur cig /üîΩsems can thams cad rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa @250a *//
analyzed: sems can thams cad ji ltar dam bcas pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas rim gro byed pa'i phyir rgyan gyi rnam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i stan rab tu thob par gyur cig / sems can thams cad rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa @250a *//
translated: May all sentient beings obtain a seat endowed with an inconceivable variety of ornaments, in order to serve all realms of sentient beings with the gift of the Dharma, in accordance with their commitments.

original: thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par ston pa'i phyir dge ba'i stan la rab tu gnas par gyur cig /
analyzed: thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par ston pa'i phyir dge ba'i stan la rab tu gnas par gyur cig /
translated: May all sentient beings sit on a seat of virtue, in order to demonstrate all miracles and magical transformations and the power of the Buddha‚Äôs supremacy.

original: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par 'tshang rgya zhing /
translated: May all sentient beings sit on a seat of the TathƒÅgata‚Äôs wisdom, in order to attain the seat of enlightenment and the seat of the TathƒÅgata‚Äôs wisdom.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid che ba thams cad dang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par ston pa'i phyir rin po che thams cad kyi stan dang / spos thams cad kyi stan dang / me tog thams cad kyi stan dang / gos thams cad kyi stan dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid che ba thams cad dang khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yang dag par ston pa'i phyir rin po che thams cad kyi stan dang / spos thams cad kyi stan dang / me tog thams cad kyi stan dang / gos thams cad kyi stan dang /
translated: In order to demonstrate the greatness of the TathƒÅgata‚Äôs own being and the power of the supreme leader, may there be seats of all jewels, seats of all fragrances, seats of all flowers, seats of all garments,

original: phreng ba thams cad kyi stan dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi stan dang / beed'urya sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stan dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa ltar tshad med pa'i stan dang /
analyzed: phreng ba thams cad kyi stan dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi stan dang / beed'urya sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stan dang / 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa ltar tshad med pa'i stan dang /
translated: seats of all garlands, seats of all precious jewels, seats of inconceivable varieties of beryl, seats of the immeasurability of inexpressibly inexpressible world systems,

original: 'gro ba thams cad ma lus par rgyan gyis rnam par dag pa'i stan dang / rdo rje'i gdan thams cad la 'khod par gyur cig /
analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad ma lus par rgyan gyis rnam par dag pa'i stan dang / rdo rje'i gdan thams cad la 'khod par gyur cig /
translated: seats of the purity of the adornments of all beings without exception, and seats of all vajra thrones.

original: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' stan gyi sbyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis mgos btud pa'i byang chub kyi stan rab tu 'thob cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par 'tshang
analyzed: ces de ltar byang chub sems dpa' stan gyi sbyin pas yang dag par bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis mgos btud pa'i byang chub kyi stan rab tu 'thob cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par 'tshang
translated: In this way, bodhisattvas dedicate the root of virtue of having given seats so that all sentient beings may attain the seat of enlightenment, which is bowed to by all reincarnating beings, and so that they may fully realize all the qualities of a buddha.

original: rgya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //
analyzed: rgya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo'o //

original: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdugs kyi sbyin pa byed cing /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba btsun par bya ba dag gam /
